header: 5 new mobile games to try this week - March 24 2022
content: who doesn love new games we certainly do there just something about the exhilaration of a new title you can wait to dive into as the loading screen pops up and you enter a brave new worldof course new mobile games are a dime a dozen these days and who has the time to scour the iphone ipad andor android stores to catch the latest title that drops this is exactly why we gathered a quick list of new mobile games you should try this week from undiscovered indie gems to highprofile aaa masterpiecesby the way if you got an unquenchable thirst for curated games you can obsess over each week be sure to check out our new weekly mobile games hub or join our lively community on twitteror discordlet get on with it

name: pocketgamer
header: Identity V - Best hunters
content: there are a lot of things to take into consideration when you try to make an identity v hunters tier list for example what kind of game mode are we talking about there are champions who excel in certain situations but they lose a lot of what makes them great in a different game mode i talking about you feasterits a totally different scenario when you play as a solo hunter in a rank game compared to lets say tournament mode five versus five team play synergies team awareness and so forth the reasons are obvious so we wont get too much into it but you get the ideaof course personal preference comes into play and how comfortable one is playing the champion someone can climb the ladder playing an offmeta character if they are that good at the specific champion but those people are the exception not the so if your favourite identity v hunter didnt make the list dont get mad we are just trying to be objective here and help out playershow to check which are the best hunters in identity vyou can just check top players profiles on the leaderboards youll see that most favour certain hunters youll notice a trend a meta and these are people who understand the game very well so they dont pick a character just because theres a reason what reason not all champions are equalof course every server has its own meta in a way for example youll see some champions getting picked a lot more in asian servers compared to westso with all that being said we tried to put together a tier list for identity v hunters taking into consideration all of the above how characters perform in different game modes the ones who can perform great in every game mode will be at the top of our listweve also taken into consideration the new skill adjustments from the latest patch please note that the order within each tier is random and it doesn mean anythingwithout any further ado lets get right into it

name: pocketgamer
header: Cookie Run: Kingdom review - "Cute game with so much to do!"
content: from the creators of cookie run ovenbreak comes another new free to play game featuring adorable cookie creatures youve grown to know and love these cookies are cute they are adorable and in cookie run kingdom they are trying to save a world overrun with cake monsters through building collecting resources and battling against evilcookie run kingdom graphicscookie run kingdom is a game full of cutscenes and adorable graphics as you progress you will be shown loads of animations bits of story and backstory to the kingdom and the characters that you meet and hang out with your main character is gingerbrave a gingerbread cookie who was made by an evil witch and now must fight against the monster cake to restore the world these cutscenes are masterfully made they look amazing and so do the little bits of the story its a game that feels just so cutecookie run kingdom gameplaythere are two main gameplay loops in cookie run kingdom building up your kingdom and fighting in battles your bit of the kingdom where your cookies hang out is something that you need to constantly be using to create more resources collect them and develop the place you are building not only do you need to decorate it to make sure that the town looks nice but you will also need to drag cookies around assigning them roles to create new resources and allowing them to play on the stuff that you have put down developing your kingdom actually unlocks more stuff to do and boy does this game have a lot to do there are so many new areas to unlock adventures to undertake and wishes to fulfilalong with managing your kingdom you can start fighting youll need to set out your squad making sure they are upgraded to where they need to be have different equipment and are in good order before a battle the game has a bunch of auto features which are great for those who may not have a good head when it comes to strategy and using cookies to the best of their abilities you see these cookies all have different powers and class types which can work with each other to make a brutal team when it comes to fighting you can also hit an auto button so that the game basically fights itself or you can choose the moves that each cookie makes when they make it and wait for the timers to tick down so you can use them again even in auto mode there are times when the level becomes an area where you need to jump and grab coins and your characters do not automatically jump so this encourages players to keep paying attention to the actiondefeating levels will unlock more levels with little cutscenes between them though some areas require resources to get too a lot of my game has been spent letting the fighting happen automatically but watching my squad to make sure that if they are struggling i take the time to level them up and make sure they have everything they need to continue to fight forward with all of the bosses and battles looming its always good to make sure everyone is in good shape to continuewhen it comes to the game there is just a lot going on there are so many daily rewards so many little quests loads of locations to constantly check and play around with despite having a bunch of timers when it comes to having to wait around there is so much to do that i am never really waiting i quite enjoy having so many options though it is a bit tough to keep track of all of the little that show you various things that you can and should be doing with so much to keep track of its easily a game that you can lose quite a lot of time tooas such one of the downsides to the game is almost how much is going on its very easy to forget about fulfilling wishes in the wishing tree or to forget to top up your resources a game with a lot of options and so many quests to do can sometimes feel overwhelming as you tap through the tab but many people do like that the other little issue i have is the distracting overlay of names constantly streaming in on the righthand side of the screen showing whenever a user has gained a new cookie though this might be interesting its more distracting to me and often results in a blank box without a name appearing over whatever i am trying to do if i tap in between loading times

name: pocketgamer
header: Albion Online: What to expect from the fantasy sandbox MMORPG in 2022
content: whether you fancy gearing up as a bulky tank or a dps powerhouse sandbox interactive albion online lets you be whatever you want to be with its unique classless you are what you wear system and no enforced questlines the game offers players all over the world a true hardcore sandbox experienceby constantly updating its content and regularly adding qualityoflife improvements the game has been keeping things fresh for players since its launch in here we take a quick look at what albion brought to players in and preview some exciting developments coming in albion online you always known and lovedplatform compatibility and content expansions aside the freetoplay game has always evolved and improved its content to cater to the needs and wants of its eager fanbase the crossplatform title offers an accessible flexible gameplay experience as players can switch between pc and mobile with a seamless and innovative control schemeother qol updates in the past have included the option to buy loadouts straight from the marketplace customizable guild roles and chest access rights streamlined farming of crops and animals improved feedback when crafting refining and rerolling numerous customization options for characters and mounts and morea core part of the game is the dynamic economy where weapons and equipment are crafted by the players themselves users can customise their own character paths with their choice of equipment letting everyone enjoy that refreshing flexibility to suit varying playstyles and strategiesa look back at the call to arms update dropped in march players were able to immerse themselves in a revamped faction warfare that breathed new life into small and mediumscale pvp while introducing the new carleon faction a few months later the full mobile launch expanded the game crossplatform flexibilitywith daily active users going over the mark albion online boasted a thriving community filled with players both new and old across the globe the game ended with a bang as the lands awakened update revitalised albion biomes with stunning visual improvements the addition of the brawlerstyle war gloves weapon line and new guild warfare mechanics offered numerous gameplay options to keep the entire player base deeply engagedto and beyondthis year albion online aims to keep its guild warfare fresh and exciting with smaller guilds empowered by the lands awakened update territories in the outlands are more competitive than ever keeping guilds of all sizes on their toesthose that enjoy the tighter gameplay of playing in smaller groups will be pleased to hear that the roads of avalon maps are set to be updated with more rewards content and optimisation for small group play and for those who prefer to go it alone there will be a new soloplayer road this can be accessed via mistshrouded portals that will allow players to explore new regions without the risk of ambush from groups of enemiesthere will also be an overhaul of the existing magic staff weapon line with new weapons and spells added improved designs and vfx and a rework to their current spells this will breathe new life into this weapon line further diversifying the range of combat styles that players can employalbion online will remain a dynamic and everevolving game and further expanded playability options are coming with controller support this includes availability on the new steam deck opening the mmorpg doors to even more players all over the worldif you keen on experiencing the freedom of albion online yourself you can download the game on the ios app store and on the google play store for android devices it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases

name: pocketgamer
header: Summoners War: Lost Centuria interview: Gary Park discusses the game's first year and its future
content: summoners war lost centuria is currently celebrating its first anniversary which has proven incredibly successful for developer to celebrate the game is hosting an ingame event alongside introducing some major changes which you can learn more about in our recent articlewe recently had the chance to chat with gary park director of production at usa about the anniversary the game success over the past year and what players can expect in the future we also talk about the company approach to creating any updates and how the game community plays a role in any changescould you please introduce yourself to our readers and your role at usai am gary park director of production here at usa i oversee the overall operations of summoner war sky arena and lost centuria its been about years since i worked on the summoners war franchiseduring its first year lost centuria has been downloaded around million times were you surprised by this figure or is it in line with what you were expectingi have to say it was something of a surprise we were worried at times of how our users that are familiar with summoners war would react to summoners war lost centuria we didnt expect our existing users to enjoy a new genre where lost centuria is more focused on pvp while summoners war was more about collectingfarming monsterssubscribe to pocket gamer on the latest update to lost centuria introduces new currencies and the ancient rune system what do you think these changes will bring to the game and help it to evolveas we are heading into a new path for our game i believe this will give more playability to lost centuria for existing returning and new players this new update will give our users a gentle introduction to the gaming and the ecosystem where i would believe this would give more a competitive drive to our users since the ancient crystals are obtained through rewards in the world tournament as season tally rewards and ranked rewardsthis has been described as a major update do you discuss these changes with fans at all if so how valuable is there feedback for helping the game continue to growyes we have spoken to our fans and asked for their opinions of the upcoming changes within lost centuria weve also created a couple of guide videos to empower our players through education i would say it is always important to listen to our community members and we as a company always appreciate the feedback of our community memberscan you talk a little about how the summoners war franchise has grown over the last eight years and the challenges you have faced along the waythere were many challenges mainly adapting to the growth of the summoners war ip following the huge success of the first title summoners war sky arena summoners war lost centuria was introduced with different art and play styles the third title summoners war chronicles has been in production for many years to bring out the optimal qualitythe ip also expanded into indifferent media including esports animation and comics summoners war grew at a fast rate and there were times to make sure that we were able to adapt quickly to this change personally i started off as a community manager for summoners war back in when the game launched and i had to learn at a fast pace to ensure that our users are being acknowledged and aware that they have contributed to our growth as a company and as a communitysubscribe to pocket gamer on the summoners war world arena championship was a huge success what can fans expect over the next year in the esports scenewe hope that we continue to see our fans enjoying our world arena championships and we hope that we can bring back offline esports events once again as long as our fans are willing to participate with their fellow guildmates and friends from summoners warcan you tell us a little bit about what we can expect from summoners war chronicles when it arrives later this year and what are your plans for the game postlaunchwe have conducted multiple focus group testings and recently launched a beta test in thailand and we will continue to here out our users that have played and supplied great feedback throughout the years and we continue to make those types of plans to ensure that this game is the game that our users expected all these years once it hits the global market this will be the game that gives our users that have waited so long to dive deep into the story of the game and that you are able to interact with your summoned monsterssimilarly what can we expect from the summoners war franchise generally over the next few yearsyou can expect more of an expansion of our current efforts where we have already created comic books figurines merchandises and other games that expand into more storylines of summoners war as we head into the realm of gaming people can expect more implementations of the ecosystem into our games which will present more ownership to the players

name: pocketgamer
header: Need some Nintendo Switch friends? Share your friend codes here!
content: there is nothing quite like playing a good game on switch especially more so when you just acquired the handheld console but if you want to dive into a cool multiplayer game and none of your friends can join in because they don have a nintendo switch what could you do it simple find some online nintendo switch friend codesand add random players to enjoy withby adding other players to your ingame list of friends you can all play together and why not even get to know each other better we created this post to help you find more friends by sharing yourswitch friend code you don have to of course maybe you like being the lone wolf but just in case you do check out our instructions below to find out how to find yourswhat where is the switch friend codeif you new to the console and are wondering what a friend code is look no further this code is the equivalent to your profile id in pretty much any other game except it a unique number that each player gets when creating the nintendo accountthe code can be used to find more friends and invite them to join your switch friends listadditionally you can also issue a new friend if you want to make it more difficult for people to add you but you have to wait for days before changing it againwhat my nintendo switch friend codeif you not sure where to find your own code follow the steps belowswitch friend codes exchangenow that you a pro at finding your nintendo switch friend code it time to add some friends share your code with your pocket gamer friends below if you like to and wreck faces and test those new friendships in competitive multiplayeror y just drop a message to say you can also add the other players by heading to the add friend option on the profile page and writing in each username be wary though you can have up to friends only that might be a big number if you more of a singleplayer type of gamer but if you all about that multiplayer bonanza then it might not nearly be enoughthus being said get to sharing your switch codes below there nothing quite like a bunch of pocket gamers gathered together in a match of mario kart

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Kayle guide: Best build, items, runes
content: the righteous one is probably the ultimate endgame champion let take a look at the best build for kayle in wild riftshe is able to destroy enemies in lategame scenarios since her kit is extremely powerful once she ascends of course that can only happen with time and exp and items so in the early stages of the game she can be rather weakfor those who don follow the lore kayle is morgana sister another powerful champion with the mandatory wings showing off her back unlike morgana kayle falls somewhere between a melee and ranged fighter slash mage slash marksman if that even a thing she less of a support although she can provide a little bit of healing and movement speed to one ally however calling herdedicatedsupport would be a longshotin our wild rift kayleguide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the kayle guide belowkayle attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains attack speed movement speed attack range and waves of fire on her attackskayle conjures a portal summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies slowing damaging and reducing the resistances of anyone who gets hitblessed by the divine kayle heals and grants movement speed to herself and the nearest allypassive kayle celestial sword virtue deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks active kayle next attack smites her target with celestial fire dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing healthkayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former aspects of justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swordshow to combo as kayle in wild riftunlike many other champions in wild rift kayle doesn have any signature combos that will give her a damage burst or anything like that on the contrary her main weapon is her auto attacks which get stronger as she stacks auto after auto here are some tips to help you outwild rift kayle in what order to level up the skillsfor kayle this is the order in which you want to level up the skillskeep leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spells for kayle in wild riftigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by it comes to items rabadon deathcap is also an optionbootsnot sure how good kayle is then check our updated wild rift character tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: Shrouded Citadel Interview: revisiting the epic-sized AR adventure one year on from release
content: its been exactly one year since shrouded citadel first arrived on the app stores and whilst some of the ar aficionados among you might be forgiven for not catching it on release given the pandemic and spate of lockdowns now really is the perfect time to try it with the epicsized ar adventure puzzler having just launched for oculus questhaving tested the game ourselves last year we can tell you first hand that shrouded citadel truly embraces ar technology on a scale seldom attempted on the platform utilising a scale environment that places you in the depths of a daunting dungeon youll find yourself both bewildered and enthralled by the scope of the game as you navigate its myriad of puzzles and ghoulish enemies youll need plenty of room to get the full experience so an outdoor space is advised however youll always have the option available to reorientate the games axis to avoid running out of space or risk falling into a stream as our very own james gilmour narrowly avoided during our play testshrouded citadels launch on oculus quest also comes with a range of improvements to its gameplay including a greater range of interaction capabilities to learn more about how shrouded citadel has fared since its launch and how the future looks for this brilliant adventure game we had a catchup interview with its developer robert piferfirst off how has shrouded citadel performed so far and has it met with expectationsi wanted to develop an ar project that was quite different from anything else available i also went into this project to help me build experience in developing arvr games and apps so far i feel like shrouded citadel has done better than i initially thought it would and all the feedback i have received has been very constructive and positivewhat lessons have you learned which you carry with you into your next projectstraditional ways of developing games has its purpose but don be afraid to think outside the box that why i think the ar version is so unique the issues i had to work through immediately made the development process less this is how you make a game and more this is how you make this game tools i was able to utilise in the vr version i couldn in the ar version such as occlusion culling and light mapping with the combined experience from both versions of the game i confident in bringing a more conceptual mindset to future projectswhat improvements have been made to shrouded citadel since launchi had to make the usual minor bug fixes frame rate on specific devices texture popping adjusting mechanic balance in the vr version since you not physically moving i made everything faster and anything that does damage hits harder in my opinion it made the vr version more fun and challengingsubscribe to pocket gamer on with a lot of attention currently on the metaverse how do you see the future of arvr developing in the coming years are we set to see it embraced on a much grander scalei think we should embrace it on a grander scale not only is it the most immersive media platform we currently have we free of the hardware limitations of owning a pc that can run vr obviously the pc required headsets will have more power behind them but products like the quest are making vr incredibly more inclusivedo you have anything planned in terms of future updates for the game and if so can you give us any details of what these might includei currently have plans for a future project that will function similarly to shrouded citadel in the arvr environments this may be a continuation to the story where we go to a different environment and have completely new traps puzzles enemies and bosses maybe rework some aspects of combat and add to the foundation i already haveif you like to enjoy shrouded citadels unique arvr experience for yourself you can download it now from the ios app store and on the google play store for android devices or oculus store for playing on oculus quest it a premium title that costs or your local equivalent but you can also find liteversions available if youd like to try before you buy

name: pocketgamer
header: App Army Assemble: Another Tomorrow - "Should you play this point-and-click adventure today?"
content: another tomorrow is a recently released pointandclick adventure from developer glitch games it sees players solving a series of puzzles presented through beautifullooking dioramas our app army is wellversed in puzzling adventures so we handed the game over to them to see what they thoughthere what they saidtorbjrn kmbladsince the early days of the app store i have been a fan of escape the room puzzlers there is usually something soothing about trying to get out or get the idea of why you are stuck where you are quality has always been an issue and most of the games have looked quite poor in the graphics department this is sadly true for another tomorrow as well with a definite throwback ten years back it looks jagged and muddy considering that the first true escape the roommystery game was myst that looked better way back in the days of the pentiumprocessor i dot really understandthe puzzles are a bit disjointed and quite hard due to being well weird i had to resort to getting hints early on as i didt get what part was the puzzle and what part was the solution i get it that all studios dot have the muscles to create a quality game like agent a a puzzle in disguise but given the quality that these kinds of games can have it is hard to recommend another tomorrowrobert mainesanother tomorrow is a neat twist on the point and click adventure as you play you will pick up objects take photos and combine objects to progress in the adventure while suffering from occasional flashbacks that give you a clue about your situation the rooms are nicely rendered and the music is sublime the usual problem of point and click adventures is that frustration can quickly set in if you encounter a problempuzzle that stumps you its here that the game hint system is invaluable all in all another tomorrow is a good game that i look forward to completingsubscribe to pocket gamer on oksana ryanthis is a brilliant example of a puzzle game great graphics great puzzles and a great storyline that moves you forward there is an added facet to the game which entails taking photos of scenes for later reference there are all the usual codecracking key finding and headscratching puzzles that make this genre so enjoyable and to help in case your inner sherlock holmes has failed you there are clues to help you over the blank moments i also notice it has no inapp purchase all in all although i havent finished it yet this is definitely a game im enjoying and can recommend it for all puzzle fansmark abukoffas a point and click mystery this stands above the crowd in many ways the music was excellent and a perfect fit that added to the experience the environments have dimensions and atmosphere i like that you actually have to combine things and that yes youll have to sometimes in order to affect nonspoiler that environment the story and cutscenes and unique mechanics kept me interested and the clue system helped me the few times i needed itplus the ingame camera lets you take pictures to refer back to important clues comes in very handy if theres any complaint and its a small one id like the ability to zoom in for some of the smaller clues old eyes looking at an iphone screen would very much appreciate that overall however i found it a very good game that fans of the genre should enjoy happily recommendjc gathe first look at the game is very refreshing the isometric graphics are precise and offer a change from the usual firstperson pictures we generally find in this kind of investigationpuzzle game the great slow and serious music and the sounds give these nocturnal places a very successful twilight atmosphere the short cutscenes inserted in a violent way during the investigation insist subtly on the traumatic nature of the reminiscences of the character that we playi therefore found the atmosphere in which the game abruptly plunges us brilliantly immersive and very motivating to delve into the puzzles that make up the main gameplay they are neither too simple nor too complicated and do not give the feeling of dj vu as one might have feared the progression by adding new places gives a real satisfaction of discovering a new part of the investigation even the clues system is very clever and allows you not to get stuck without spoiling the reflection the time needed to complete the game is adequate and the story is interesting until the conclusionanother tomorrow is a beautiful challenging and innovative game it offers a very successful addition to this genre which is nevertheless very represented i therefore absolutely recommend it even for players feeling tired of a genre they would have already played a lotdiane closeif you enjoy finding clues and solving the puzzles in adventure games from syntaxity fire maple games and mediacity games then youll love glitch games another tomorrow the hook in this one that makes it different from those others is the set pieces are detailed dioramas rather than flat images you approach them from a firstperson perspective to zero in on their details exposing both clues and puzzles to solve and this game is definitely all about the puzzlesyou find clues and solve puzzles to unlock more clues and more puzzles until you finally reach the end of the mystery im loving it the overarching story arc is fed to you in extremely short cut scenes phone calls and bits of paper strewn around the environment but there are enough early reveals that you can figure out pretty quickly whats going onthis is a large game gb that takes hours to complete it runs seamlessly on my older ipad air running ios the graphics are crisp and detailed the sound effects and voice work are very well done the only gotcha here is its a british production which is sure to mess with north americans when they tackle the elevator problemwhat is the app armythe app army is pocket gamer lovely community of mobile game experts as often as possible we ask them for their thoughts on the latest games and share them with youto join simply head over to either our discord channel or facebook group and request access by answering the three questions we then get you in right away

name: pocketgamer
header: Rainbow Six Mobile release date and everything else we know
content: everyone who seen the title can already picture what we about to dive into in today article and no it not a late april fool joke it a fact rainbow six has officially been confirmed on mobile and it every bit as exciting just like the other games in the franchiseby now it impossible not to have heard of tom clancy rainbow six franchise since it one of the biggest most exhilarating experiences for fps enthusiasts on pc and console rainbow six mobile now brings that experience to mobile too with all its signature features from highly trained operators to destructible environments and lots of tactical planningalso readin this article you can find everything you need to know about rainbow six mobile including the release date so if you want to know what to expect from the game and most importantly when to expect it then you in the right place we going to share all the key information you need in order to help you get ready to rollwhat is rainbow six mobilelet start with the basics if you not familiar with the game then i give you a quick walkthrough in rainbow six mobile you find a tactical fps similar to apex legends fortnite valorant and overwatch where you can join one of two sides attack or defense and strategise with your other teammates in order to win the most roundsclassic games are usually the best of three but there will be multiple game modes that can all have a different approacheach player will pick one operator that features a unique set of abilities and gadgets and join four other players in fastpaced intense battles that require quick thinking and swift reflexes players can set traps destroy walls and ceilings and build various structures in order to help their team achieve victoryrainbow six mobile release dateyou probably want to know when rainbow six mobile is coming out and while we don have a set date we do know that rainbow six mobile will be released in on the release date of some of the previous rainbow six games except for rainbow six extraction which was out earlier this year we can also guess that it will come in the second half of the yearhowever if we were to guess we say somewhere between novemberdecember let hope we won have to wait that long though we make sure to keep you updated whenever we learn something new so stay tunedwho is developing rainbow six mobileubisoft is the company that will publish rainbow six mobilewhen you think about ubisoft and the games they released chances are rainbow six is one of them rainbow six siege rainbow six vegas some of their most wellknown games include assassin creed watch dogs and far cry as well as some mobileexclusive titles such as clash of beasts city of love paris the mighty quest for epic loot which is truly awesome and you need to try it and many otherswhich platform will rainbow six mobile be available onit been confirmed that rainbow six mobile will be available on both ios and androidhow is the mobile version different from the pcconsole onein order to adapt to the fastpaced mobile gameplay will feature shorter matches if we see a game lasting between to minutes and anywhere in between sometimes even more on mobile my guess would be a match lasting between to witha maximum of minuteswe seen something similar in league of legends wild rift which has games lasting for a similar length of time while pc ones last slightly longeranother difference we could expect but has not been confirmed yet is the map while in the pcconsole version maps and environments can be massive in rainbow six mobile we can expect some of these features to be slightly toned downin terms of similarities between the pcconsole and mobile version you can expect the followingis there an betaso far we don know about beta testing or beta access to but we let you know as soon as we have news currently the game is still in the prealpha stagewill rainbow six mobile be freeubisoft has confirmed that rainbow six mobile will be a freetoplay gamenow that we mentioned iaps it probably a good idea to also talk about the battle pass we know from rainbow six siege that it already features one so it safe to say that will probably include this toothat all that we have for now when it comes to the rainbow six mobile release date and the rest you need to know bookmark this page and revisit it whenever you can as we will share all of the info we get from the developers in the following months of course you should take a quick look at the apex legends mobile release date as we have more info regarding that one

name: pocketgamer
header: App Army Assemble: Silent Dot - "Is this minamilist puzzler worth shouting about?"
content: silent dot is a minimalist puzzler from indie developer sander vanhove that draws inspiration from barte bonte colour series and studio waterzooi please touch the artwork it promises to provide a simple but engaging puzzling experience so we handed the game to our app army to see if they thought it deliveredhere what they saidmike lisagorsilent dot is a rather simple straightforward puzzler that has you getting a dot to the finish in the fewest moves possible if you do you earn a star but the game doesnt tell you the number of moves necessary to get that star that is one of my gripes with the game you have to do trial and error other than that the game is ok and i breezed through about levels and decided to take a break nice game for short bursts of time but nothing special i have not seen a new mechanic introduced which makes the game sort of boring after a whileeduard pandelesilent dot is a beautiful minimalist abstract puzzler where you must traverse a hexagonal maze each move you make changes the state of most maze cells that is turns their floors on or off needless to say you don want to go into a cell whose floor will disappear on your next move so you need to carefully count your steps and that it there a single gameplay mechanic at work here which is interesting at first but as with all the purely logicbased puzzles it soon gets a little boring as you reach your own intellectual limit also who knew counting can get boring huhanother problem is that easy and medium puzzles are very simple actually because they almost always reduce to dilly dally around until you can pass through the last couple maze cells and then the difficulty skyrockets in hard mode where oftentimes there a single path to victory and every misstep sends you back to cell one with all the frustration that entails it might seem like a negative review but i actually had fun with this game and i think it worth the yup it a premium game with no ads a rarity these days so if you like abstract puzzles give this a shotsubscribe to pocket gamer on mark abukoffit took me a while to figure out the secret to this game but once i did i sailed through most levels with little difficulty in ways this is very much like a bunch of other similar games find a way to get through to the end of the level or try again or reset your progress on the level truth is i dont play many of this type of game because theyre more alike than different and so the attraction wears off quickly for me it does remind me vaguely of some of the go stealthtactical games where you have to find a way through a level while avoiding guards and cameras i liked that aspect of this gamewhat i didnt like was that i had to find a youtube video to show how to safely pass through each cell without getting sent back to the beginning in my opinion you shouldnt have to do that not early in the game a quick and simple tutorial could have eliminated that bit of early if brief frustration but thats not a dealbreaker overall i thought it was an interesting game and if you iike games like this its worth the inexpensive purchasetorbjrn kmbladsilent dot is a streamlined mellow puzzler where you basically have to move a dot into a triangle the levels challenge you by introducing different obstacles that have to be traversed to reach the end initially the difficulty is low but it soon ramps up with no tutorial i had to get into quite a bit of trial and error to get past the obstacles and quite a lot of backtracking with my dot to get past as mellow puzzlers go it i a quite nice experience playing silent dot the presentation is sleek with relaxing music i have however seen and played this kind of game before many times there is little to nothing special or innovative making it hard to recommendrobert mainessilent dot is a rather charming puzzler where you guide your dot across a field of hexagons to reach a triangle in the fewest moves possible you can only move one hexagon at a time and things start off very simple the difficulty soon ramps up with revolving hexagons that open and close hexagons to your dot land on a closed hexagon and you are sent back to the beginning of the level graphics are simple music is chilled and there are levels over three stages of difficulty some instructions would have been nice as it can be frustrating trying to work out what you need to do still its a keeper for meoksana ryanthere isnt a lot to this game but it is enjoyable to play the graphics and sound are simple and the gameplay straightforward moving the dot to the triangle without falling through the highlighted blocks i didnt find a tutorial and it took me a couple of levels to get into the rhythm of the game but once i did it was plain sailing through the levels i found it a good game in small doses and returned to it when i had ten minutes to spare its not a game that offers anything revolutionary but its a steady game that has enough challenge to keep me happypierpaolo morgantesilent dot is a puzzle game whose goal is to guide a little ball towards the end of the level represented by a tile with a triangle the levels are organized by difficulty roughly sixty in easy medium and hard the game is very simple and one picks up the rules very quickly maybe in the first five levels the challenging part is that the tiles switch continuously between solid and transparent and if you get stuck on one of them while the floor is not there the level starts againthe concept of the game is simple yet captivating the difficulty ramps up so that the last levels of the easy difficulty prepare the player for the first levels of medium as of now i played around levels and i tried some of the hard ones another strong point of the game is the graphics simple yet very polished the music is relaxing and it is enjoyable to listen to maybe the only drawback of the game is that it becomes a little repetitive somewhat boring perhaps but it is definitely worth the pricewhat is the app armythe app army is pocket gamer lovely community of mobile game experts as often as possible we ask them for their thoughts on the latest games and share them with youto join simply head over to either our discord channel or facebook group and request access by answering the three questions we then get you in right away

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire's collaboration with Assassin's Creed reaches its peak this weekend with the Creed of Fire collection
content: garena free fires exciting collaboration with the assassins creed franchise has been underway for a week now titled the leap of faith the event has brought in numerous themed quests updates skins an amazing theme song and much more with the weekend the crossover is set to hit its peak as garena has a lot planned for playersplayers can expect the creed of fire collection to go live over the weekend alongside a tonne of other goodies logging in tomorrow will grant everyone exclusive ac x free fire rewards like the hooded skyboard completing quests will also award players with the metal wings skin ornate treasure box vengeful brotherhood bundle and morea new gameplay mode called lone wolf strike out also goes live tomorrow it takes place on a scifi map involving eight players of which four fight and four spectate players will have three lives and rounds take place between players based on their remaining lives the last person standing with one or more wins this is a limitedtime mode so make sure you spend your weekend battling it out to grab all the rewardsthe hallmark of the event is however the creed of fire collection a set crafted to perfectly imbibe the classic look of characters from assassins creed into the free fire universe the male ac x free fire costume takes uses the iconic colour scheme and hoodie and creates an epic streetwear costume with it but the one to look out for is a recreation of the fanfavourite master assassin ezio auditore outfit that also sports senu a female bonelli eagle that was bayeks loyal companionif you think that is cool then wait until you see ac odysseys talon dagger which was inspired by athena additionally free fire weapons will also be retouched with the classic red and white colours and the assassin creed logodont miss this opportunity to win a bunch of assassins creedthemed rewards by downloading free fire on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Thresh guide: Best build, items, runes
content: thresh is the chain warden a warden once tasked with keeping secrets later engulfed by a greater power which turned him into a merciless tormentor of souls thresh was once the keeper of senna soul who miraculously escaped thanks to lucians countless efforts to bring her back that just part of thresh interesting lore thoughother than a character with a great story he is also a truly wonderful support character able to inflict crowd control and reposition his allies with the help of his lantern he is not exactly easy to play but with enough practice he one of the few supports that can be viable no matter the meta and the matchupin this league of legends wild rift thresh guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the thresh guide belowthresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him permanently granting him armor and ability powerthresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him activating this ability a second time pulls thresh to the enemythrows a lantern to a target location if an ally collects it thresh will pull the ally to himthresh attacks wind up dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks when activated thresh sweeps his chain knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blowcasts a prison of walls that slow and deal damage to enemies that pass through ithow to combo as thresh in wild riftthresh has quite a lot of combos but many of them are extremely difficult to pull off since they not only dependant on you casting them but also on the ally to whom you throw the lantern therefore thresh is not the ideal beginner champion but rather a more advanced support that requires quite a bit of practice beforehandhere are some of the basic combos you can pull as threshthis is the main combo you have as thresh it pretty straightforward and all you need to do is hook the opponent and pull them back towards you with flaythis is yet another similar combo but it is a little bit more flashy you need to use flash to close the gap between you and the opponent then use flay towards you to impair the movement speed of the enemy and then quickly follow up with skill before they get awayhere are some advanced tips consider yourself warned they will require some practicethis rather big combo is in fact quite simple you will start with the simple combo mentioned above the one with flash but you also add your skill the lantern to reposition your ally and help them close the gap between themselves and the enemythis combo is great if you pull it off from a bush or over a wall with an unexpecting enemythis is often overlooked but it extremely useful in some situations for instance you can hook a monster from above the wall and then quickly get to them the same works with enemiesthresh has empowered autoattacks and they work wonders in lane for tradingwild rift thresh in what order to level up the skillsfor thresh this is the order in which you want to level up the skillskeep leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spells for thresh in wild riftigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by sure how good thresh is then check our updated wild rift champions tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: Wild Rift introduces champions Shen and Karma in Protectors of Ionia event
content: the ever so popular mobile moba wild rift is hosting a new eventbased around the inworld nation of ionia with this event players can expect lots of new challenges to complete to earn not only the two new champions being added to the roster but also new icons emotes and moreany wild rift or league of legends fan in general will recognize the two new champions that are arriving alongside this new event shen and karma are two of the oldest champs on the league roster and its frankly shocking they werent part of the initial wild rift on launch regardless the silent ninja and the spiritual priestess have arrived offering players new ways to dominate the rift to unlock these two new characters players will simply have to complete some of the missions being added in alongside one repeatable challengethese missions involve some pretty basic things that will likely be completed by just playing matches during the course of the event things such as simply visiting the event page within the client playing a game with a premade party or three solo games earning gold and much much more as the event progresses new rewards will progressively become available allowing you to spend tokens that youll earn from completing these missions of course two of the purchasable rewards are karma and shen themselvesprotectors of ionia will run from now to april allowing players plenty of time to get in and begin hunting down those tokens and if youre concerned about not being able to spend all of your currency during that time the token shop will remain open for an extra week closing april so youll have ample time to buy whatever you please for more information on the protectors of ionia event check out the official websitewith generous handouts aplenty and two whole new characters sure to shake up the meta wild rift is in a great place right now and theres no better time to get involved if youre interested you can find wild rift for free on both the app store andgoogle play

header: The best games like Animal Crossing: New Horizons for iOS and Android
content: updated on original list by cameron bald updated by pocketgamer staffanimal crossing new horizons is finally out and it really rather good so good in fact that it become a little bastion of joy for many new and returning playersit everywhere right now specifically my twitter feed where folk simply can get enough of its upbeat tone and engaging busywork it also incredibly cute and worrying engrossing though i been balancing this out with regular bouts of games likedoom eternalwhile it swell that us lucky switch owners can get stuck in right now mobile gamers have once again been left out in the cold don worry though as we gone and put together this here list of vaguely similar titles for you to play instead on your ios or android device

name: pocketgamer
header: GODDESS OF VICTORY: NIKKE Preview: The gorgeous new third person shooter enters closed beta, heres what to expect
content: in the midst of malevolent forces that threaten humanity existence humanoid weapons rise to the occasion as the last hope for a dying world set in a postapocalyptic world where humans live underground goddess of victory nikke lets players defend against invaders in a thirdperson shooter rpg on mobile apart from the stunning visuals and fastpaced combat what the gameplay experience like for this action shooterthe story of nikkehumans live lives as if there a guarantee of tomorrow but what happens when the end of the world comes without warning in goddess of victory nikke that invaders called rapture came in the form of a sudden attack no warnings no negotiations no room for preparations all humanity could do was to watch in helpless horror as the world they knew and loved crumbled in a heartbeat as the end of the world raged on in the midst of mindless slaughter the last remaining humans were forced to retreat underground waiting on bated breath until they could resurface and claim their homeland once moredecades pass and humanity resilience gives birth to a light at the end of the tunnel humanoid weapons in the form of female soldiers awakening from their slumber inside the ark and ready to take back what humans have lost codenamed nikke these soldiers carry the hope of humanity on their shoulders will they succeed or will mankind final struggle be to no availgoddess of victory nikke gameplay and graphicsfrom the getgo the mobile thirdperson shooter game lets you take control of humanoid weapons to fend off the invaders it clear from the combat alone that each new battle is meant to be as adrenalinepumping as the last and the realistic character movements add to the actionpacked feel during battle combat engages you with convenient onehand controls all you have to do is direct your nikkes and they shoot reload and fight the good fight for youwhat makes each battle different is the fact that the nikkes themselves possess various specialisations that can be more effective against certain types of enemies for instance a nikke with a sniper rifle can help you take down foes from afar by hitting their cores while a rocket launcher can be charged to its full potential to deal massive aoe damage against a cluster of raptures a rifle is good for fast firing and fast reloading while a shotgun can clear out enemies at close range when you in a pinchthe enemies themselves are as varied as your nikkes as they will also have challenging attacks you need to survive or even protective shields you have to disable to make a dent in their armour thankfully nikkes have special burst skills that range from dealing devastating damage via fullscreen missile bombs to support skills that buff up your hp all these add to the enjoyable experience of shooting down enemies in gorgeous backgrounds along with the stunning animated illustrations of the nikkes as they shoot take cover and execute special skills for youthe nikkes themselves of course look stunning as they are each one has a unique look characteristics and personality that are charmingly revealed as you go through the main campaign as the nikkes interact with one another you can discover more about their backstoriesgame content and gacha galorenikke has just entered its closed beta testing phase and the game definitely scratches that itch to collect as many characters as you can apart from the gorgeous character designs of the humanoids the world itself is breathtaking in fact even the monsters have meticulous designs that are pure eye candythe summons pool aside the game also features a pvp mode map exploration multiplayer cooperative shooting a tower defense mode and limitedtime activities during special events in particular the map exploration lets you send out your nikkes across various sectors not only for the main campaign where you encounter challenging boss fights but also for side quests you can also interact with different elements on the field itself for instance stumbling upon raptures engages you in combat while encountering an npc may trigger a unique event you may also discover ancient relics that can offer you a usable bonus or a fun little collectiblegoddess of victory nikke will soon be available to download on the ios app store and on the google play store as a freetoplay game with inapp purchases if you eager to get in on the action yourself you can stay tuned for more announcements on the official website and the games twitter page

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Morgana Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: morgana the fallen is one of the newest champions in wild rift and a truly amazing one at that she is a support mage similar to lux who is able to build damage items as well as support items and act as a second carry at times her crowd control is one of the best and most feared in the game and could be considered the exact opposite of blitzcrankshe is able to stun enemies in place for what can feel like forever and that huge in team fights paired up with champions like caitlyn the duo will make dragon lane one of the most dangerous places to adventure into when it comes to wild rift due to their huge range both morgana and caitlyn laning against them as a duo will be especially difficulthowever if we talking about a mid lane morgana with a full mage build it a completely different story she is not as strong in the midlane as she is in dragon lane but she can be a key counter to certain champions regardless if morgana is ahead in farm and items she is going to be a force to be reckoned with just like her sister kaylein this league of legends wild rift morgana guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the morgana guide belowmorgana drains spirit from her enemies healing as she deals damage to champions large minions and medium and larger jungle monstersmorgana binds an enemy in place with dark magic forcing them to feel the pain they caused and dealing magic damagemorgana casts a cursed shadow on an area damaging enemies who dare stand in her dark circle they receive magic damage over time which increases the lower health they aremorgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier that absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is brokenmorgana unleashes the full force of her celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground she lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions gaining movement speed towards them the chains slow and deal initial damage and after a delay stun those who are unable to break themhow to combo as morgana in wild riftmorgana doesn have many combos apart from one main combo that can be used in any situation that combo is as followsthis super simple combo will rely on you landing the skill bind and holding the enemy in place and then casting the tormented shadow underneath the enemy to slowly chip away at their hp it a very basic yet good combo that is viable for both support and mid lane morganahere are a couple of other useful tips for playing herif an ally is under any sort of crowd control then black shield will automatically remove it if cast before the cc is applied the cc will not apply at all for example if you use black shield on an ally and an enemy like blitzcrank hooks them then the hook will only deal the initial damage and not pull the allyof course as a full engage support morgana can sometimes pull stunts like flash ultimate in the middle of the enemy team which can end up getting her killed but result in a huge advantage for the ally team that is always something to consider especially if the enemy is positioned in a great way for the ultimate to work if they are all gathered togetherwild rift morgana in what order to level up the skillsfor morgana depending on whether you play as support or mage you want to adjust the way you level up your skillskeep leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblekeep leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spells for morgana in wild riftigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by could swap some of the offensive items luden echo for example for some support options such as athene but in wild rift it easier to go for full damage morgana since she is truly powerful at the momentnot sure how good morgana is then check our updated wild rift tier list

content: what could be more terrifying than hordes of the undead threatening to break down your settlement barriers to feast on your insides at a moment notice age of origins is certainly brave enough to ask the question and only players who have the guts to find out can experience the latest update to the strategic tower defense game on mobilepreviously titled age of z origins the game welcomes all kinds of creatures that go beyond brainhungry zombies what kind of horrors can players expect from the game this time arounda brand new islandcamel games is letting stuff that nightmares are made of join the fray in celebration of age of origins fourth anniversary with the mysterious island event after the epic milestone that was the crossnation gameplay duel of dominance in previous years the game is welcoming a completely revamped phase beginning with its name changewith this new title comes a fresh locale to explore but while the new mysterious island may seem like heaven on earth there are other issues for cattie and her companion lucky to tackle what surprising truths will players discover in this deceptive paradiseinfinite possibilitieswhile the mysterious island is uncontaminated by zombies players will still have to protect its resources to make sure history doesn repeat itself here you can keep the zombie corps from polluting the pristine waters in the drinking water war eventmore than the exploration itself you can also prettify your new island with special decorations for cool stats bonuses cosmetics include the hammock dining car parasol helicopter fountain beachfront mansion surfer statue dolphin statue and moresubscribe to pocket gamer on ingame goodies galoreafter discovering a totally rad surfing spot on the island zeus is sharing his beach bonanza with commanders with a special gift that can be claimed every eight hours meanwhile the lucky stolen treasure event lets players score the ultimate beachfront mansion prize and the super benefits cards will reward players each day of the week for seven days for instance a surfer statue reward will grant a recruitment speed upgrade on day the quest bingo event tasks players with connecting the dots and completing quests to win luxurious gifts and the special purple decoration dining car itemif you curious to see what other changes are in store for you with age of origins rebranding you can download the game on the ios app store and on the google play store for android devices it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases you can also join the community of followers on the official facebook page to stay updated on all the latest developmentsnew players that download and play before april can receive extra goodies by redeeming the following code

name: pocketgamer
header: Blue Orchid preview - "An interactive thriller that lacks a little bit of pull at the moment"
content: indie studio elia games has launched the first chapter for blue orchid its narrative thriller that puts you in the shoes of an outsider helping a group of people escape an unfortunate fate out now in early access on android the game sort of takes over your phone in that you be forced to work with these strangers and answer their plea for help from your device but is it all worth the time and efforttable of contentsthe story of blue orchidfor a narrativedriven game there really isn much story at the moment since only the first chapter is playable you start blue orchid by playing a game which is a casual tapping game that interrupted by an unknown phone call you can by the way play this little tapping minigame at your leisure and try to hit the high score someone then contacts you with a cry for help and things spiral down from therei won spoil anything for you but you basically need to help a group of people you don know who are trapped in a mysterious hotel somewhere they somehow found your number and opted to ask for help which will set off a series of escaperoom puzzles that you need to solve to help those people make it out of the hotel aliveblue orchid gameplaythe people on your phone the game adopts a phone interface where you interact with characters via group texts are essentially trapped in a game of death where a random hooded figure contacts you from time to time to taunt you you get to know the strangers in the hotel via their interactions with you on the messaging app of your phone and occasionally they send you photos of where they are and you have to help them figure things outfor instance they might send you a picture of a room where you can tap to look for clues investigate codes ace logic puzzles and so on each puzzle isn really much of a headscratcher at least in the first chapter but i suppose the focus is the narrative of these people asking for your help rather than the puzzles themselvesthe game is meant to engage you by asking you to input your name and profile and the answers you give aren always in a multiplechoice format you have to answer carefully and pick your choices wisely though as the fate of these random people is for better or worse in your handswhat the appealof course that where my biggest issue with the game lies at the moment i don really feel connected or invested in these characters which kind of waters down my motivation to keep helping them the dialogue choices also sometimes break my suspension of disbelief as reactions to certain situations are a little unrealistic in some instances my character would have overly heightened reactions to things when in truth my reaction would be meh at bestanother thing that broke my suspension of disbelief was that the characters were all interacting via a group chat they may be separated into different rooms at times but they also often physically together in the same place and yet they all communicating with each other via text messages i as the only outsider was supposed to be the only one they should be sending updates to they shouldn be updating each other via texts when they all right there beside each other in real life it just a little odd to be honesti suppose that the greatest shame here that for a supposedly interactive game the engagement isn really as strong as it should be nor is the narrative intriguing enough as of yetstill it a good effort for a first chapter and perhaps it get better as the next chapters roll in the developers have expressed their intent to include the discord community in writing the actual narrative so the engagement there might just improve for now if you in the mood for a little bit of an escaperoom thrill you can try out the first chapter it only about half an hour long and is absolutely free

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Renekton Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: renekton is a fairly simple champion but he a powerful one nonetheless even though the butcher of sands used to be a champion that not many people saw success with after the introduction of new items the ones we have currently he was played more often and even in professional gamesin wild rift renekton is a pretty decent top laner that can see success and is able to carry games in scenarios that makes him a solid contender for top tier even if he not in the s tier all the time it also worth noting that he an easytolearn champion and a fun one if you love handson battles and crocsfun fact he the brother of nasus another shuriman championin our wild rift renektonguide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the renekton guide belowrenekton attacks generate fury which is increased when he is low on life this fury can empower his abilities with bonus effectsrenekton swings his blade dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him and healing for a small portion of the damage dealt if he has more than fury his damage and heal are increasedrenekton slashes his target twice dealing moderate physical damage and a stun if renekton has more than fury he slashes his target three times dealing high physical damage and stunning for longerrenekton dashes dealing damage to units along the way empowered renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the armor of units hitrenekton transforms into the tyrant form gaining bonus health and dealing damage to enemies around him while in this form renekton gains fury periodicallyhow to combo as renekton in wild riftrenekton has a couple of useful combos that help him trade in the laning phase and initiate team fightsthis combo works perfectly if you want to dash in and out and trade with an opponent you can make great use of this before level and if you manage to get your enemy low on hp you might even be able to secure a killthis combo is the most basic one and it lets renekton dive in and trade with the opponent and then dive out without any issuesthis would be one of renekton allin combos you can probably win most trades with this since you can catch enemies by surprise and stun them dealing quite a bit of damage in the processkeep in mindin what order to level up the skillsfor renekton this is the order in which you want to level up the skillskeep leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spells for renekton in wild riftigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by for the main boots i prefer the gluttonous greaves however because no two matches are the same depending on what your enemies are building and what role you need to fulfill in your team you can go for either ninja tabis or mercury treadsnot sure how good renekton is take a look at how he fares on thewild rift champions tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: Wild Rift patch 2.5 preview - What to expect in the next update
content: after a long delay in the wild rifts upcoming patch due to hurricane ida riot has finally released a preview of the upcoming patchs content patch will have loads of skins and will add new champions to the roster in addition it has some major changes to the gameplay and modesthe announcement mentions that the patch update will go live on october and we will make sure to create a detailed breakdown of the changes and additions for now lets take a look at the patch previewcaitlyn is one of the longest ranged marksmen in the game when ahead in gold and xp level any adc hero without armour can be melted by her she is usually played in the bottom lane remember to plant traps to trigger a critical hit from her weaponveigarveigar is a midlaner mage with impressive burst damage his unique skills allow him to gain extra burst damage by clearing creeps and minions make sure to equip him with penetration items to bring the best out of him during the late gamejaycejayce is all about timing and combos while playing jayce always carefully switch between the mercury canon and the mercury hammer according to the enemy youre facing he will be available ingame from november onwardsgameplay changes in patch systemfrom october the players who have reached and crossed level nine can join or create guilds those who are willing to join other guilds can do it for free while creating a new one will cost you wild cores or poro coinsafter joining a guild you can invite its members to join in your lobby there will also be inter guild wars where you compete against other guilds to earn huge rewardssecond rift heraldin the upcoming patch there will be two rift heralds before baron nashor spawns this addition is aimed to improve the rotation as previously players stuck to the dragon lane to slay the only rift heraldmatchmaking changesthere were a lot of complaints about matchmaking especially in the ranked games from the upcoming patch the game will use ratings rather than ranking while matchmaking an icon will appear right next to the players ingame name if their rank is too low or much higher than yoursaram changeshowling abyss the aram map will now have the scryers bloom which helps reveal champions hiding in the bushtwitch supportplayers can now start streaming to twitch by simply tapping an icon that will appear on the top while playing a match in order to do that make sure you have already connected your accountnew event and skinsa new theme event way of the dragonmancer is scheduled to take place during the next month there will be various tasks along with exciting rewards and of course there will be plenty of skins available to purchase below are the skins thatll be available throughout the eventwhile you are waiting for the wild rift patch to get out you should get familiar with the champions that got released so far and we have a detailed guide for each one

name: pocketgamer
header: Diablo Immortal classes guide - Abilities and playstyles
content: with the official release of diablo immortal just around the corner hopefully everybody excited to learn a little more about the popular mobile arpg apart from the initial announcement for the game which dates back a few years now there hasn been much in terms of the actual gamehowever that all changed when we finally received some information regarding the classes intheir latest announcement so it only natural that we would create a complete guide for diablo immortal classes to give you some more information about what is to come and how you can pick the best one according to your playstyleif you played diablo in the past chances are you already familiar with some of the features the different classes gave however if you completely new and are excited about this upandcoming action rpg then you surely going to enjoy every new piece of information coming your wayhow many classes are in diablo immortalfirst and foremost we only know about six diablo immortal classes so far barbarian crusader demon hunter monk wizard and necromancer these are all pretty standard when it comes to diablo and if you played diablo iii you probably noticed one of the characters missing in diablo immortal and that is the witch doctorwhile we haven been able to play as the witch doctor just yet the other six are pretty similar to what we used to in diablo as for the release date of this seventh class there has been no information so far we make sure to keep you up to speed in case some new information gets revealed but in the meantime we shift our attention towards the other sixhow to pick the best class in diablo immortalthat suits youdepending on your play style each of these classes has a different approach some of them are more handson while others are ranged or command various summons of course there is no best class since all of them are viable and equally strong in terms of power the only difference is how you play them the ranged and summon characters are arguably less tanky than the melee ones as is the custom with most rpgsof course you can enhance various stats by equipping specific gear but that a whole different story the main point is that you want to pick a class that you like the gameplay of since all of them are viable in the end game the point is getting thereare the diablo immortal classes gender lockedthe answer for this is a swift no or at least that how things seem at this moment with the information we have right now it appears that you can pick the gender you like for each of the six classes so worry not if you want to play a wizard but want it to be male that totally possibleso let start with the beginning and work our way through each and every one revealed so far shall we
