name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Veigar Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: veigar or the tiny master of evil is one of the most downright broken champions in wild rift in the hands of the right person veigar is like senna in a way in the sense that he can scale indefinitely that means each time he gains a passive stack he will get more apin turn that makes veigar a champion that is extremely weak in the early game but a true master of evil in the long run if given the chance to scale as a veigar player advice from another veigar player all you need to do is play it safe until level and until you know you have the damage to oneshot dismantle the enemy the best way to do so is to just slowly stack up the passive by hitting the enemy with skill while farming i elaborate more belowin this league of legends wild rift veigar guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the veigar guide belowveigar now gains passive stacks by hitting enemy champions once againveigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit units killed by this bolt grant veigar some ability power permanentlyveigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location dealing magic damage when it lands stacks of phenomenal evil reduce dark matter cooldownveigar twists the edges of space creating a cage that stuns enemies that pass throughblasts target enemy champion dealing a large amount of magic damage increasing based on the target missing healthhow to combo as veigar in wild riftall of veigar combos are situational but make sure you use the following tips when playing veigar in order to have the utmost successfairly simple and selfexplanatory you want to stun your opponent before you hit skill then quickly follow up with skill while skill is still charging you can also add in an extra skill if you learned it if you are sure it will kill the enemyif an enemy is following you in the jungle or in lane use skill on your position to escape most enemies won risk getting caught and potentially giving veigar a free kill you can also use it underneath the tower in case an enemy decides to dive you even though i doubt many will try that for this reasonit will be fairly difficult to do at first but once you get the hang of it you manage to pull it off nicely what you aim to do is carefully read veigar skill it can only damage two enemies use one of the charges to last hit a minion and since the skill still has one charge left make sure you positioned in such a way so that when it travels it will hit the enemy that way you gain stacks and farm reliablyit not easy to pull off since you need to learn the skill exact damage as well as how to position accordingly however it one of the few things every good veigar player will use when laning especially against melee targetsit shouldn come as a surprise but in the early game veigar mana pool is extremely shaky you don want to use skills unless you are confident you can kill an enemy or get an assist otherwise you want to keep mana since a veigar with mana is extremely weakthe ultimate skill deals more damage based on the enemy missing hp so you can use that to snipe off low health enemies that try to escape or secure kills for extra stackswild rift veigar in what order to level up the skillsfor veigar the best way is to max your skill first then skill and finally skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spells for veigar in wild riftigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by sure how good veigar is you can take a look at how well he is ranking on our wr tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Caitlyn Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: caitlyn is one of the staple characters in wild rift released soon after netflix arcane tv show which showcased the story of jinx or should i say powder singed heimerdinger soon to be released in wild rift jayce vi and many othersshe is a powerful marksman third in rank in terms of range only surpassed by senna infinite range scaling and aphelios marked enemy range regardless she is an adc with crowd control thanks to her traps and an empowered auto attack that can be rather deadlyin this league of legends wild rift caitlyn guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the caitlyn guide belowevery few basic attacks or against a target she has trapped or netted caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance on trapped or netted targets caitlyn headshot attack range is doubledcaitlyn revs up her rifle for second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage deals less damage to subsequent targetscaitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles when sprung the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for a brief period granting caitlyn an empowered headshotcaitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target the recoil knocks caitlyn backcaitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their allyhow to combo as caitlyncaitlyn has several combos but more often than not you will use her skills based on the situation and plan ahead by placing various traps strategically use the following tips to make the most out of caitlyn kit use the traps skill to close off any areas that are prone to gankingby placing a couple of traps in the tribush or in lane brushes you can catch sneaky enemies since the traps grant you vision of whoever steps in them for a brief moment you can also use them in the brush in the lane to scout ahead use skill to move over a low wall or disengagegain distance from the enemyunlike most marksmen caitlyn is rather mobile she can use skill to move away from an incoming enemy or even hop over a low wall you can combo this with the trap to activate the passive and hit two headshots for a massive burst of damage combo the traps with skill and skill then ultimate to an enemyif you have the chance try to catch the enemy with a trap then quickly autoattack them to activate the passive skill once follow up with skill and skill to slow them down and apply the passive headshot one more time if necessary cast a couple of autoattack to finish them off or use your ultimate and that should ensure you a killin what order to level up the skillsfirstly you want to max out caitlyn skill then skill and finally skill make sure to also level up the ultimate every time you cankeep levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly skill best summoner spells for caitlynheal restores health and grants bonus movement speed for second to you and the most wounded nearby ally champion healing is halved for champions recently affected by healthe best items for caitlynbootsgluttonous stasis is the one you want in case the enemy has a lot of allins or assassins like zed or akali who can kill you instantlyif you would like to check if caitlyn is a meta champion take a look at our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Zed Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: zed is one of the famous assassins in the world of league of legends and one of the most difficulttolearn and play champions you can get your hands on zed has a number of skills that you need to time perfectly in order to make him viable and his positioning matters a big dealzed is one of the ninjas who started off in the kinkou order alongside akali and shen he soon found himself venturing the catacombs of the temple he was once a student of and found an object that engulfed him in shadows those shadows shaped him into the dreadful and brilliant at the same time champion he is now being able to manipulate his shadow in order to damage enemies and move with easewhen it comes to gameplay he by no means easy to master of course you can pull off a combo or two but a truly great zed player will make the right decisions based on more than just allins and damage they will know when to roam and get kills how to get ahead of opponents and maximise their advantages each time they given the opportunityso the bottom line is that i don personally recommend him to any beginner it will take tens of hours of practice to be great with him and just one second to end up behind in farm and gold and be useless to the teamin our wild rift zedguide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the zed guide belowzed basic attacks against low health targets deals bonus magic damage this effect can only occur once every few seconds on the same targetzed and his shadows throw their shurikens each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hitpassive zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability energy can only be gained once per ability cast active zed shadow dashes forward remaining in place for a few seconds reactivating living shadow will cause zed to switch positions with this shadowzed and his shadows slash dealing damage to nearby enemieszed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion marking them after a few seconds the mark triggers repeating a portion of all the damage zed dealt to the target while they were marked zed leaves a shadow behind and can reactive death mark to switch places with this shadowhow to combo as zed in wild riftit rather complicated trying to write down zed combos without any video proof so the most useful resource in that regard would be as per usual when it comes to assassin champions providing a link to someone who knows better than i how to play zed assassin davehe will briefly explain how his combos work and when to use each one so check it outwild rift zed in what order to level up the skillsfor zed this is the order in which you want to level up the skillskeep leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spells for zed in wild name: pocketgamer
header: Top 13 best MOBA games for iPhone and iPad (iOS)
content: updated february changed the text to fit the current date added another titlemobas that multiplayer online battle arena are big business in the competitive online gaming space since mobile gaming is taking up a lot of gaming space at the moment because most of the population owns a phone a lot of big companies have shifted towards them as you would expect from a genre as popular as moba games they are taking over the iphone gaming market by the daythese highly tactical games combine the basic baseassaulting principles of real time strategy gameplay with the clicky combat and heroic abilities of an action rpgwhile this popular genre started out life on pc it since become massively popular on mobile some of these mobile mobas are clearly identifiable with their pc forbears while others have streamlined the formula for portable play and spun it out into all new shapesamong this list of top mobile mobas you find elements of card battling some turnbased tactics and even a little platforming the mobile moba genre is basically wide open to interpretation which makes it a pretty exciting place to be without further ado click on the big blue button below to open up the list of best moba for iosoriginal list by jon mundy updated by pocketgamer staff

name: pocketgamer
header: League of Legends: Wild Rift adds character adjustments, a new event, new skins and more in latest updates
content: riot has released a massive update to league of legends wild rift letting players enjoy new skins fresh events the return of elemental rift and a handful of buffs and character nerfs in the patch update players can also expect item balancing a scuttle crab adjustment and morethe latest update to league of legends wild rift will feature both a comeback and some adjustments to elemental rift for instance the terrain will shift after the first dragon is slain plus one of the powerful souls will be rewarded to the team who slays two dragons you can give the new mode a go from april to may players can also expect new skins on april for marauder brand and marauder graves as well as new accessories such as the captain of the fluft icon and the why whatd you say emoteadditionally the join the fluft bilgewater event will be available beginning april and new adjustments to characters include blitzcrank darius fiora jhin kaisa lucian master yi olaf rakan sett and yuumi you can find out more about the specific buffs and nerfs on the official patch notes of course you can check how these changes affected the position of wild rift champions on the tier listthere are other adjustments to expect from the massive update so if you eager to give the new improvements a go you can download league of legends wild rift on the ios app store and on the google play store for android devices it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases you can also join the community of followers on the official facebookpage to stay updated on all the latest developmentsare you on the hunt for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of thebest moba games for android

name: pocketgamer
header: 5 new mobile games to try this week - April 14, 2022
content: who doesn love new games we certainly do there just something about the exhilaration of a new title you can wait to dive into as the loading screen pops up and you enter a brave new worldof course new mobile games are a dime a dozen these days and who has the time to scour the iphone ipad andor android stores to catch the latest title that drops this is exactly why we gathered a quick list of new mobile games you should try this week from undiscovered indie gems to highprofile aaa masterpiecesby the way if you got an unquenchable thirst for curated games you can obsess over each week be sure to check out our new weekly mobile games hub or join our lively community on twitteror discordlet get on with it

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Vayne Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: vayne is the next champion we got lined up and while she is a rather simple champion it hard to master her kit and play her like a pro unless you dedicate a lot of time to playing her and learning her damage output the night hunter vayne is the ideal antitank marksman since she is able to melt through the tankiest units in the game if she has the right itemseven if she is behind a good vayne will find a way to snowball back and turn the game in her favour in the long run that means playing against a vayne who knows what they doing can seem simple but the smallest mistake can cost you the gamelike with most powerful lategame scaling champions vayne is super weak in the early game her range is low she has no mobility and is extremely prone to divesganks however if she gets ahead she will be able to dive towers and melt through any enemy in a maximum of six auto attacksin this league of legends wild rift vayne guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the vayne guide belowvayne ruthlessly hunts evildoers gaining move speed when moving toward nearby enemy championsvayne tumbles manoeuvring to carefully place her next shot her next attack deals bonus damagevayne tips her bolts with a rare metal toxic to evil things the third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target max health as bonus true damage activating this ability gives vayne bonus attack speed and she heals for some of silver bolts damagevayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back and fires a huge bolt at her target knocking them back and dealing damage if they collide with terrain they are impaled dealing bonus damage and stunning themreadying herself for an epic confrontation vayne gains increased attack damage invisibility during tumble and more bonus movement speed from night hunter when an enemy champion damaged by vayne dies within a few seconds final hour duration is extendedhow to combo as vaynevayne is a straightforward champion who doesn have any specific combos but the sequence in which her skills are used as well as her positioning are the most important parts of her kit use these tips to help you play vayne better use skill to dodge enemy skillsif you see an incoming blitzcrank hook or any other dangerous skill use skill to tumble away from the hitbox it also a great skill to use when you are trying to chase an opponent always condemn skill your enemies against terrain for a guaranteed stunmake sure you position yourself well even tumble skill in the direction you want to be before casting skill and condemning an enemy against the wall if an enemy is trying to run towards you use skill and then skill away from them to gain distancethat will most likely discourage anyone trying to gank youin what order to level up the skillsvayne kit first revolves around her auto attacks and secondly around her mobility skills so you want to make sure that skill is a prioritylevel skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly skill whenever you can add a point in skill ultimatethe best summoner spells for vaynehealrestores health and grants bonus movement speed for second to you and the most wounded nearby ally champion healing is halved for champions recently affected by healon vayne you want any type of attack speed items since her kit revolves around autoattacks depending on the situation you want to go for either something a little tankier like wit end which can swap out infinity edge or phantom dancer or even guardian angel if you think you don lack the damagebootsgluttonous quicksilver are the boots you want on her because she has no means of escaping enemy crowd controlshow good is vayne in comparison with other champions well we have an answer to that one in our updated tier list where we have sorted each wild rift champion from the best to the worst one

name: pocketgamer
header: Wild Rift Patch 2.4c patch notes - What's changing in Riot's mobile MOBA?
content: just a couple of weeks back riot games released a major patch updatefor league of legends wild riftthat brought a lot of new adjustments and optimization along with new content that was supposed to be evenly distributed in the future patch updatestoday the developers have once again rolled out a new update which is basically a minor update that introduces the previously scheduled skins stats and attributes adjustments and of course the freetoplay champions rotationimage via riot gamesnew skinson september skins for lucian and senna will be released globally the skins are named high noon lucian and high noon sennanew accessoriesplayers can now have a nice collection of emotes and babble as this update adds new options although remember that the accessories wont be available instantlybase statsrelentless pursuitin previous patches lucian was nerfed due to a huge amount of damage from the midgame the nerf resulted in low pick rates and threw him out of meta the recent buff will help him hold his lane and provide decent sustain and damagepowerballdefensive ball curlthe ratio reduction on his passive and active will make him slightly vulnerable and allow the enemy to counter him during the early gamelately wild rift has been seen a lot of champions be overly dominant in the early game the developers have been nerfing some of the champions who fall in this category and rengar is one of them from this patch in the early game rengar will slightly struggle as his armor and ad is significantly nerfedhymn of valorcrescendosonas attack power when combined with decent items along with active damage scaled up way too much with low cd she was able to spam her skills in a short period of time this patch focussed on nerfing her cd ap and active damage attributesnot a major nerf but teemo might struggle while facing a heavy ap champion on the enemy side this update has slightly nerfed multiple attributes and is aiming to balance themimage via riot gamesthe adjustment to the item is a great piece of news for all tank users

name: pocketgamer
header: Top 25 best iOS multiplayer games for iPhone and iPad
content: updated on february ios multiplayer games added to the listgames are great but as is the case with most things in life they can be a lot more fun with other people whether you stalking strangers online wait that sounds weird in a tense battle royale clobbering your buddies in a local multiplayer brawler or teaming up on the same device for an rpg adventure playing with others takes things to the next level that why we come together as a team to create this a list of the top best mobile multiplayer games for your iphone or ipadas that last paragraph suggests multiplayer games aren a genre in themselves rather they incorporate all other genres but they all draw on the desire to congregate in virtual worlds and share our love for our common hobby or y blast a bunch of dummies into smithereens whatever floats your boatbest multiplayer iphone and ipad gamesthe following list of ios multiplayer games is an eclectic thing we dare say there something for everyone to enjoy regardless of how social or antisocial you feeling from smashing towns to smashing balls into the back of a net we sure you find something for youis your favourite iphone multiplayer title nowhere to be seen sorry there are too many shining examples out there but you can let us all know about it in the comments belowanyway without further delay click on the button below to check out our list of the best ios multiplayer games available for iphone and ipadoriginal article by jon mundy updated by pocketgamer staff

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire is hosting two new virtual tournaments in November 2021
content: november is looking packed for fans of free fire garena has just announced that it will be hosting two virtual championships for their battle royale soon these contests are the free fire asia championship ffac and emea europe middle east and africa invitational regional tournaments will allow more local teams to participate and win these kinds of events garena has always made an effort to provide fans with competitive as well as professional esports content and these two tournaments will let players from asia and emea get a taste of that winning at these regional levels will allow players to qualify for larger championships and participate on a global stagethe ffac and emea invitational promise to be actionpacked for free fire fans and spectators as there will be much more entertainment because the gates have opened up for more professional local teams to enter the asian championship will feature teams from seven regions of asia while its emea counterpart will showcase teams across europe middle east and africafor both the free fire asia championship and emea invitational the group stages and preliminary matches will take place on november and they will also follow the same format in the preliminaries teams will battle it out in six rounds taking place in bermuda purgatory and kalahari teams will receive points based on the number of kills and their rankingthe regions participating in the ffac are india indonesia malaysia cambodia and the philippines mcp pakistan taiwan thailand and vietnam the emea invitational will see teams from the commonwealth of independent states cis europe and the middle east and northafrica menathe finals will follow a similar format except that there will be seven rounds and the last map will be selected randomly the emea invitational finals will be on november while the asian championship finals take place on november free fire for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire's 4th anniversary celebration launches with new song Reunion, featuring Dimitri Vegas, Like Mike, Alok and KSHMR
content: free fire is turning four and four renowned individuals the worldfamous djs dimitri vegas and like mike and free fires very own alok and kshmr are coming together to create free fires fourthanniversary theme song reunionyou can vibe to reunion on free fires official youtube channel and also see how these four djs were given their invites through falcon free fires very own pet see our heroes don the coolest outfits that their ingame counterparts wear and groove with themalok and kshmr have been at the forefront of free fire for a few years now producing the most amazing songs exclusively for free fire like vale vale and one more round alok also won the award for free fires most popular character who doesnt love these guys you can play as them with them and even against themfree fires begins today and garena has promised to bring everyone together into the free fire universe for the ultimate celebration the entire training ground is brimming with exclusive anniversarythemed events and theres an entire music party stage that has been set up so put on your dancing shoes for that until september you can also enjoy the projection mapping and minigamethe entire celebration will last a week until september but on august everything will culminate into the biggest event free fire has ever celebrateda brandnew mode called the clash squad cup will be playable on the and of august where teams of four will compete against each other in a tierbased system each team will play three matches and will be rewarded according to their resultsall matches played on august will grant you magic cube fragments with the exception of the new mode logging in on the will also give you access to like mikes character thiva for free theres a lot to do so keep your schedule empty on the cos youre partying nonstop in free fireuntil september there will also be daily login rewards gifts daily missions and lots of other minigames you can also unlock the free fire birthday image to get an exclusive male bundle for freedownload free fire on the ios app store and google play store and enjoy the celebrations

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire Pro Series North America fires up the competition as Group Stages starts this November 13th
content: garena is taking things up a notch with the free fire pro series north america heating up the competition in the insanely popular battle royale game as the game firstever official esports the tournament opened its doors for registration on october and will soon hold group stages this saturday november free fire pro series north america will hold its grand finals from december to december until then players and spectators can catch all the heartstopping action from the official website or check out the explainer video embedded below to know all about how the competition worksin particular a proper team should have a minimum of four eligible competitors with a maximum of six four of which shall be defined as the primary roster the other remaining competitors will be considered as substitutes for the team all competitors should also be seventeen years old or older at the start of the tournamentif you not familiar with the game free fire is garena incredibly popular survival shooter that pits players against each other in an epic arena the battle royale game sets a timer as survivors parachute onto a remote island against other players you free to pick a starting point and strategize the best course of action to take in order to survive for as long as you can you can drive vehicles ambush enemies snipe other players or just find a safe place to hide in the wildif you eager to experience the game for yourself you can download free fire on the ios app store or on the google play store for android devices it a freetoplay game with inapp purchaseswant more survival shooters on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best battle royale games for android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire's Squad BEATz is launching a new music video alongside a new game mode and lots of rewards
content: garena free fires latest campaign is set to end with a bang with the launch of a new music video free fires new squad beatz music video features a new song called beatz go boom which will be released on february additionally garena is also adding multiple new ingame events rewards a new mode and so much more check it all out belowbeatz go boom is squad beatzs debut track and it will be a mix of reggae funk pop and kpop it is a groovy song that preaches everyone to march to their own drum the lyrics celebrate individuality and players can enjoy the beat as they battle ingame catch the teaser for the music video below you can also listen to beatz go boom now on spotifymoving on to the new game mode from february onwards players can engage in pet ludo with their friends the basic premise is of course classic ludo but garena has added its own twist to the traditional format so that players can enjoy it even more pet ludo will feature everyones favourite pets mrwaggor moony sensei tig and ottero as the playable characterstheres also a horde of rewards coming to free fire as we draw closer to the peak of the squad beatz campaign theres an entire collection of exclusive squad beatz rewards waiting to be won logging in on february will grant everyone a limitededition loot box featuring exclusive goodies and completing challenges before february can unlock the grand prize the jewel mystified bundle featuring an amazing skin that players would not want to misslastly players can also get their hands on squad beatz themed collectibles like the maroon laser pan and sword purple rev bike the aurora and brassy cores groza weapon skins and more catch beatz go booms music video that launches worldwide on february download free fire now for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire: A few tips to take note when exploring Alpine
content: free fire is not only one of the biggest mobile games in the world but one of the biggest games period it has received several updates since its inception in and that includes new maps recently the developers introduced the purgatory map for clash squadnow we see a fresh new map for the classic battle royale mode this location is called alpine and is one of the prettier maps you see in a battle royale it features several mini locations each with its own unique setting or weather element this is pretty similar to fortniteas with any br location alpine is huge it can seem pretty overwhelming since it new but you get the hang of it pretty quickly but here are some things to take note of when exploring this fresh new map if you haven had the chance to dive in yet

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire's latest campaign is called New Age and will feature a brand new map
content: a storm is coming to free fire and it is going to change everything garena is releasing a new campaign for its battle royale called new age which will begin with a blizzard that will change the world of free firethe climate goes haywire on december and players can enjoy a brand new map thanks to it called alpine this new terrain promises to freeze everything on it and cause utter chaos there is a desperate need for warmth and wolfrahh misha and mr waggor are trying to create that warmth by delivering an energy core however these were stolen by villains and now the entire island is stuck in what seems like an eternal frost explore these uncharted lands fight enemies and relocate those the energy corethe new age campaign is also set to feature multiple new activities for players to enjoy a survivallike mode is being added to the game where players will have to manage their resources build basecamps and protect the innocent citizens of alpine complete this event to win exclusive themed rewards and other itemsdecember will see the addition of a new ranked system for the lone wolf mode the iron cage has been made bigger to make the return of and battles even more fun these changes aim to level the playing field and also increase the competition between survivors while preparing to be the last person standing players can also engage in harmless snowball fights with each other on the spawn islandwith christmas just around the corner free fire is also adding seasonal items that include new skins bundles and pet lots of more additions are coming to free fire and garena will keep releasing them slowly for all usersbrace yourselves for a cold winter in the world of free fire enjoy the new campaign by downloading the game for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Brand Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: brand the burning vengeance is our next wild rift champion to receive full coverage he is just like morgana one of the few champions that can fit right into multiple roles and deliver exceptionally no matter how you play though you want to make sure that you always build ap on brand because he will do tons of damagealthough most people play brand as a solo queue support character because of his insane damage and ability to scale well into the late game he is pretty good in the middle lane too of course because he is rather slow and immobile brand will be prone to dying to assassins and other allin champions quite a lot that why it recommended to always pick him as a counter and not blind pickin this league of legends wild rift brand guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the brand guide belowbrand spells light his targets ablaze dealing damage over seconds stacking up to times if brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana when blaze reaches max stacks on a champion or large monster it becomes unstable it detonates in seconds applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victimlaunches a projectile that stops on the first enemy hit dealing damage and applying a stack of brands passive if the target was previously afflicted by brands passive they are also briefly stunnedafter a short delay brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area dealing magic damage to enemy units within the areabrand conjures a powerful blast at his target that spreads to nearby enemies dealing magic damage if the target is ablaze conflagration spread is doubledlaunches a projectile that travels to the target dealing damage and applying a stack of brands passive the projectile will then bounce to a nearby target the skill doesn damage brandhow to combo as brand in wild riftthere are several combos for brand depending on the situationthis is brand main combo with this you will instantly proc his passive as well as dealing damage to the opponent you want to cast this in every straightup trade or situation where you have to face an enemy headon since with skill you will stun the enemy and then once you hit skill the passive will activate dealing even more damage over timeanother great combo for brand but this time viable for most team fights since the ultimate skill automatically procs the passive it stacks up even if you use it against people you can probably still end up killing both even in situationsif you hit skill or skill on the minion wave and then cast skill while an opponent is behind the minions the passive and skill will spread to the enemy it a nice little poke damage that doesn require you to aim your skills just point and clickwild rift brand in what order to level up the skillsfor brand no matter if you are support or mage you want to max your skill first then skill and finally skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spells for brand in wild riftigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by sure how good brand is then check our updated wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Nunu & Willump Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: nunu willump make up one of the wild rift champions that perform exceptionally well in the jungle not only because they have a skill that lets them be faster than your average champion but also because they have enough crowd control to survive many situationsfor those unfamiliar with the duo nunu is the little boy riding the yeti and willump is the yeti doing all the heavy lifting basically the duo revolves mostly around willump pulling stunts and rolling snowballs while nunu is there to him it heaps of fun pulling off a successful gank with them since unless the opponent has some crowd control there literally nothing standing in the way of a huge snowball knocking up enemiesin our wild rift nunu willumpguide you find everything you need to know about the champion duo from their skills and how to allocate them to their build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the nunu willump guide belownunu increases the attack speed and movement speed of willump and a nearby ally and causes willump basic attacks to damage enemies around the targetwillump takes a bite out of a minion monster or enemy champion dealing damage and healing himselfwillump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it the snowball damages and knocks up enemiesnunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies when he finished willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowballnunu willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the endhow to combo as nunu willump in wild riftnunu willump have a couple of interesting combos but most importantly everything comes down to how well you drive your snowball into the enemy or enemies thus being said the other skills can combo nicely depending on the situationthis is an exceptional ganking combo that will help you basically crowd control lock your enemy while you still doing plenty of damagewith this combo you be able to initiate teamfights and deal quite a bit of damage as well it works great against multiple enemieswild rift nunu willump in what order to level up the skillsfor nunu willump this is the order in which you want to level up the skillskeep leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spells for nunu willump in wild riftsmite deal true damage to a large or epic monster or minion smiting monsters restores hp slaying large monsters upgrades smite to chilling smite or challenging smite which can target enemy champions the bonuses from hunting license and tooth and nail from smite that charge once every sure how good nunu willump are then check our updated wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Jayce Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: jayce the defender of tomorrow is the nextwild rift championwe discuss he one of the main characters from arcane the netflix show and as many have guessed he equally powerful in the game in wild rift jayce is a fighter similar to darius and wukong but on top of his normal fighter kit he also has ranged skillsthe reason why jayce is such a powerful and beloved character is pretty simple he can fit into any role be it of a damage dealer or engaging champion that means you aren very tanky so you will need a rather tanky junglersupport to be able to rock him in the baron lanein this league of legends wild rift jayce guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the jayce guide belowwhen jayce swaps weapons he gains movement speed for a short durationhammer stance leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies cannon stance fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its path dealing physical damage to all enemies hithammer stance passive restores mana per strike active creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several secondscannon stance gains a burst of energy increasing attack speed to the maximum for several attackshammer stance deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance cannon stance deploys an acceleration gate increasing the movement speed of all allied champions who pass through it if shock blast is fired through the gate the missile speed range and damage will increasehammer stance transforms the mercury hammer into the mercury cannon gaining new abilities and increased range the first attack in this form reduces the target armor and magic resist cannon stance transforms the mercury cannon into the mercury hammer gaining new abilities and increasing armor and magic resist the first attack in this form deals additional magic damagehow to combo as jaycejayce is unlike any other champion released so far he has his ultimate available at level allowing him to access two different skills at level that gives him a major advantage and the potential to win most trades point is that he doesn exactly have an ultimate skill which can be cast to make miracles happen instead jayce has skills and a switch ultimate which can be cast in smart combos in order to allin an enemy after poking it down or simply standing from afar and acting as a pseudomarksmanmost of jayce skills are situational but here are a couple of simple combos that are key to making his kit workin cannon form skill skill to cast an empowered orb that can deal massive damage with the lethality build swap to cannon use autoattacks and then cast skill for another burst of attack speed use the acceleration gate to speed up your team or yourself depending on the situationin hammer form skill skill skill to jump on an enemy with the lightning field for additional damage and mana sustain and then knock them up with skill this works wonders against enemies that don expect it and squishy targetsother gameplay tips for jaycein what order to level up the skillsfor jayce you want to max your skill first then continue by levelling skill and finally skill just keep one single point in skill best summoner spellsigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by rift jayce the best runeswild rift jayce the best itemsbootsquicksilver is the best choice for jayce since it dispels any kind of crowd controlif you would like to examine if jayce is a meta champion check out ourlier list

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire will be holding a special Moco: Rebirth in-game event for the fan-fave character on September 10th
content: garena has just announced that free fire its insanely popular battle royale title is launching an allnew ingame event for moco titled moco rebirth as one of the most popular characters in the game the fanfave hacker moco will star in her own event beginning september free fires moco rebirth event players will be able to experience a revamped interface as well as a full pack of exclusive collectibles and tons of exciting ingame events the story takes players on a journey through an awakened moco following her attempt to free her friend steffi from incarceration the outlaw then stumbles upon a chance encounter with an old friend while trying to help steffi escape from prison and this leads her to her awakening moco then rediscovers the world around her as well as her own freedom to do as she pleasesplayers will be able to explore the coders crib during the event as its main interface the themed event will also provide players with lots of daily ingame activities plus cool rewards simply by logging into the game every day there will also be moco currencies that players can exchange in the hacked horizon storesurvivors can reinvent their own aesthetics to be in sync with the event using moco rebirththemed costumes and collections there will also be an exclusive pet skin called cyber falco so if you want to stay updated on all the latest developments about the event be sure to check out the games youtubechannel for all the juiciest infofor now you can give the survival shooter a go by downloading free fire on the ios app store and on the google play store for android its a freetoplay game with inapp purchaseson the hunt for more battle royales check out our list of the top best battle royale games for android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire adds Zombie Invasion mode, Beast Run! Gameplay Web Event and more as "How To Start A Fire" film launches
content: free fire first campaign that based on the lore of the game is finally coming and players can get a taste of hayato journey in the film how to start a fire officially launching on april the film will coincide with unlockable ingame rewards a new zombie invasion mode a shootersville web event and morein free fire tales the first battle players can experience the game lore through hayato yagami narrative along with a special interface themed ingame goodies and a new sciturf map for the lone wolf game mode players can also participate in daily missions for extra rewardsmeanwhile the beast run gameplay web event lets players score tokens from missions players will have to clear obstacles to rack up those points on the other hand the zombie invasion mode on april will pit players against a different kind of threat in bermuda with five zombie variations to keep things spicyfinally the monopolyesque web event shootersville on may will reward players with tokens as they complete daily tasks these tokens can be used to build their village for even more ingame goodiesif you eager to take part in the events and learn all about the lore of the game you can download free fire on the google play store or on the ios app store it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases you can also join the community of followers on facebookto stay updated on all the latest developments or head on over to the official website for more info on the upcoming eventsare you on the hunt for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best battle royale games for android

name: pocketgamer
header: Encodya, a bittersweet dystopian adventure of a girl and her protector, has launched on Android and iOS
content: assemble entertainment and chaosmonger studio have just announced the launch of their awardwinning dystopian pointandclick adventure encodya on android and ios it features the visually stunning but grim world of berlin in the year where the city is collapsing thanks to turmoil and greed and the citizens are holding onto whatever little hope that exists however through all this chaos an unlikely saviour who will turn the tide arises check out the trailer belowall of a sudden the weight of the world has suddenly fallen on little tinas shoulders she is the protagonist of this bittersweet tale an orphaned nineyearold who now has to save the planet luckily tina is not alone as she is accompanied by her guardian a powerful robot whose only function is to protect tina the dynamic duo must embark on a journey to finish what her father started by freeing the ailing population from the grasp of greedy and controlling corporationsencodya will force tina and to take on multiple different challenges like fighting scary robots and corrupt human beings the pair must solve puzzles and unearth conspiracies to discover the crux of the entire situation during their adventure they will visit over distinct locations brimming with things to explore and interact with more than unique npcs who will deepen encodyas storythe games dark cyberpunk world is the perfect culmination of studio ghiblis beauty and blade runners atmosphere encodya can be downloaded on the app store and google play while the console and pc editions cost and respectively the mobile versions can be bought for a premium of further details can be found on their officialtwitter and facebookhandles

name: pocketgamer
header: Wild Rift 2.4b patch notes - There will be some major changes
content: riot is all set to introduce the new wild rift patch in the coming days a lot of interesting content is coming in this patch two new champions on their way alongside tons of optimizationsafter receiving feedback from the players the developers have mainly focused on items runes and a few champions skill attributes in this article we will discuss all the changes that were made and the upcoming ones note that patch content will be released periodicallyimage via riot gamesupcoming champions in patch the burning vengeancebrand is an upcoming mage champion who is usually played as a support brand deals an insane amount of burst damage and his ranged skills scale well with adaptive magic attributesnunu and wilump are a tank and fighter duo arriving in wild rift in the upcoming patch the pair deals magic damage is often played in the jungle players can build them as either a tank or a fighterboth brand and nunu and willump will be releasing on september skinspatch will introduce a lot of new skins for existing champions alongside the two new additions to the game rosterrelease date september at utcrelease date september at utcupcoming accessoriesaccessories are an important part of enhancing your gameplay there are a bunch of new accessories which are scheduled to release throughout the patch they arethe frost and flame event will feature brand and nunu willump and is set to go live on september during this event players will have to collect tokens which can be exchanged for various rewardschampion changes in the wild rift patch of you are probably interested in how will your favourite champions do in the upcoming version of the game so we have that covered tooahri adjustedfoxfirepreviously ahri movement speed had longer effects and ended abruptly it was a known bug that has been completely removedakali nerfedassassins markakali won be the same deadly assassin anymore her superior movement speed made her a little overpowered whilst her basic attacks scaled up crazily so her base damage has been reducedakshan buffedavengerangwith the addition of the crit damage in his shots akshan should be a great late game champion along with that his base damage is also getting a buff which can significantly increase when paired with proper itemsgragas nerfedbase statsgragas damage will be reduced when his skills are on cooldown so make sure to position yourself properly and make the best use of those abilitieskatarina nerfedbase statswithout hp increasing items katarina is vulnerable to burst damage enemies equip her with decent damage and sustain itemskennen buffedthundering shurikenslight bonus as and a buffed base damage will surely bring kennen back to the drafts his electrical surge needed attention so riots has buffed it in this patchimage via riot gamesafter getting buffed in the last patch the true damage from wuju style needed a nerf whilst his ults cooldown was also unbalancedrakan adjustedgrand entranceafter rakan getting adjustments on the shield sorakas total heal is also nerfed which might affect her viability in team fightsthresh buffedbase statsthresh is a late game champion who fell out of meta due to slow farming and laning skills the recent buffs focus on his passive and regen abilities which might help make him more viablewukong adjustedgolden staffwhen attacking minions wukong healing is reduced to zhaobase statsxin zhao is currently an overpowered jungler who can easily land kills at the very start of the game riot has nerfed the base armour along with health points which will make him more vulnerable while soloing jungleimage via riot gamesfree to play champion rotationfrom september september september september the wild rift patch goes live feel free to visit our tier list as we will make the adjustments accordingly

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire immerses players into its lore with Free Fire Tales: The First Battle, adding a new film and a bunch of in-game events
content: garena is revealing more details about the lore of free fire with free fire tales the first battle letting players interact with a special campaign beginning april players can expect an ingame reskin a new sciturf map the hayato house exploration web event and so much moreto be released on april the main film how to start a fire will show free fire fans a unique perspective of the narrative through the main character hayato yagami hints of hayatos tale are also scattered throughout the game which includes thematic decorative pieces that eagleeyed players can try to search for for instance a movie trailer can be spotted on training island a broken katana can be seen on spawn island footprints have been left behind in bermuda and so onmeanwhile the hayato house exploration web event beginning april lets players explore a interactive puzzle at the hayato house players can look for clues and try to unravel the mystery via minigames and even comicsif you eager to join in on all the fun free fire is available to download on the google play store for android devices and on the ios app store it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases you can also have a look at the embedded clip above to get a feel of the narrative visit the official website for more info or join the community of followers on facebookto stay updated on all the latest developmentsplayers looking to experience the hit battle royale game with enhanced and highdefinition visuals can also download free fire max on the ios app storeand on the google play storeas wellare you on the hunt for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best battle royale games for android

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire's latest collaboration with BTS is going live featuring new themed skins, items, events, and more
content: bts is a name almost everyone is now familiar with this pop phenomenon has taken the entire world by storm and theyre everywhere now this popular group is ready to hop into the world of free fire for numerous virtual and reallife events titled gen ff this crossover between garenas free fire and bts will begin on march giving players a chance to experience a grand concert a tonne of ingame rewards and morethe rise of bts and free fire follows a similar graph and gen ff wishes to represent players who have grown with the game while also helping shape it becomes one of the most popular battle royales for mobile the collaboration brings with it free fires firstever concert the free fire x bts show which will feature all seven members of the squad the group will participate in activities and discussions and players are definitely going to have a rollicking timebts will be immortalized in free fire with unique ingame skins made for each member coupled with a groovy soundtrack other themedcostumes emotes and so much more the coolest part is that all of these have been designed by the bts members themselves all of the costumes and collectibles are made to match each members personalityon top of all the events and rewards there are some secrets to uncover as well throughout the map players can find hidden special bts during a match there are loads of goodies waiting for finding these hidden spots the map is also dotted with glimpses of the free fire x bts collection that will release in phases beginning march wait to get some kpop action then download free fire for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Garena Free Fire: Three useful weapons for new Clash players
content: garena free fire is a battle royale mobile game that features its own unique style and setup instead of the usual player survival approach it features players fighting to be the sole survivor on the massive island of bermuda which features its share of layersas with most battle royales you drop out of a large aircraft and glide down to the island you then run around and search for supplies as you prepare for the battles ahead the last player or squad standing wins and gets the iconic booyahbut outside of that there another mode called clash squad which is a bit more traditional with four versus four battles the weapons you can use are based on the cash you have during the match if you new to this highly intense and fun mode then here are a few weapons that are worth spending your ingame cash on

name: pocketgamer
header: Top 25 best looking games for Android phones and tablets
content: we don care about graphics it the gameplay that counts hands up if you ever heard some video games bore spouting off with words to this effect thought sowe at pg hold no truck with such a viewpoint sure the gameplay is the core component of any title but to say that visuals don matter is to fundamentally misunderstand the mediumvideo games are an inherently visual medium albeit with due props to those that go above and beyond with their accessibility options not to mention that small subset of games that are audioonlyessentially though this is a medium built of tiny pixel and polygon bricks how we see them is vital to how we interact with themthe real issue is how those graphics serve the gameplay there are plenty of beautiful games that play like a dog and vice versaeach of the following android games is beautiful in its own distinct way some are lavish affairs while others go with a more artistic handdrawn look still others are strikingly abstract and wouldn look out of place in an art bookof course as with all art much of this is subjective let us know about your own personal picks in the comments section below

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire World Series (FFWS) 2021 esports tournament has been cancelled
content: garena has announced that they have decided to cancel the upcoming free fire world series ffws tournament due to covid related concerns the esports event was scheduled to take place later this yearfree fire world series has been cancelledgarena the publisher of free fire announced today that they would not be hosting the next free fire world series ffws that was meant to take place in november the decision to cancel the event has been taken in light of the evolving situation around the pandemicgarena stated that their top priority is the wellbeing of everyone involved in the event they considered all other options but ultimately decided to cancel the event to safeguard the health and safety of the free fire communitythe free fire world series was reportedly going to be held in mexico the south american country is having a hard time amid the third wave of the coronavirus pandemic fueled by the delta variant of the virus we are assuming this is the reason behind cancelling the eventabout free fire world seriesfree fire world series is the flagship mobile esports event hosted by garena the event provides a platform for the best free fire teams worldwide to gather in the same arena and battle it out for a massive prize pool and to engrave their name in the history of mobile esportsthe last edition of the free fire world series was held in singapore in late may where team phoenix force from thailand was crowned the champion taking home the massive prize of usd from a total prize pool of million this tournament also set the record for the highest peak viewership excluding chinese platforms of million concurrent views the highest ever for any esports match in history

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire will launch its second Money Heist crossover on December 3rd, adding new in-game goodies during the event
content: garena has announced an exciting new collab event for free fire back on its second run the money heist crossover event also known as la casa de papel is bringing lots of fun and mayhem to the survival shooter from december to december fire collaboration event with the hit netflix series features final episode raid and run which will take players through a brand new journey with new missions and tons of cool ingame goodies this includes collaborative themed items plus engagement activities all over the game social media channelsthis second edition of the free fire x money heist campaign builds on the positive reception we saw during the first crossover event last year we think about what our players would enjoy and look for ways to assimilate it into the free fire universe content that will bring communities together whether in or outside the game is what we hope to celebrate with this campaign says harold teo producer for free firewith the google play best of users choice awards under its belt garena free fire will welcome some new web events a new interface and an ingame reskin in the final episode raid and run event survivors can also indulge in themed items from the exclusive free fire x money heist collection as wellif you keen on getting your own slice of the pie during this exciting collab event you can download the game on the ios app store or on the google play store for android devices it a freetoplay game with inapp purchasesare you on the hunt for more mobile titles where you can fight to be the last one standing why not take a gander at our list of the top best shooters for iphone and ipad ios

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire launches Assassin's Creed collab event, letting players take a "Leap of Faith" in the battle royale game
content: garena has officially launched an exciting new crossover and has dropped more details about free fires assassins creed collaboration event letting players experience the iconic the leap of faith from the hit title inside the mobile battle royale game there are also plenty of gameplay updates an epic collab theme song a thematic reskin and morethe free fire x assassins creed crossover adds the sanctuary here players can locate the new building in the bermuda map and enter to discover some awesome loot up for grabs at the top of the sanctuary players can also perform the acrobatic freerunning move the leap of faith then take screenshots to boast their awesome manoeuvres on social media with the hashtag the special crossover also adds a collab theme song the creed of fire which players can listen to on spotifyright now and finally players can enjoy ingame reskins to cap off their free fire x assassins creed experienceready to be the last player standing if you keen on joining in on all the festivities during the special collaboration event free fire is available to download on the google play store for android devices and on the ios app store it a freetoplay game with inapp purchasesyou can have a look at the trailer above to get a feel of the exclusive ingame content in store for you or visit theofficial website for more info you can join the community of followers on the official facebookpage to stay updated on all the latest developments as wellare you on the lookout for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best battle royale games for android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: Garena Free Fire: Three ways to practice your skills
content: garena free fire remains one of the hottest video games on the planet not only in mobile but in gaming as a whole a mobileexclusive battle royale free fire is known for its style br which is a lower number than most of its competitionaside from the typical br action there are a couple of other modes as well in particular clash squad mode which plays a bit more traditionally with a fouronfour style this has become a popular mode amongst ff players and it only takes a few seconds to get into a gamealso readbut how does one work on their game when not in the heat of battle there is one particular really good way but there are a couple of others as well if you brand new or if you haven played free fire yet here are a couple of ways to sharpen those shooting skills

name: pocketgamer
header: Milo and the Magpies is an atmospheric point-and-click adventure about a cat finding its way home, out now on mobile
content: indie developer johan scherft has announced the official mobile launch of milo and the magpies on ios and android today players will step into the shoes of a curious cat in this atmospheric pointandclick adventure in order to find their way back home after a notsopleasant encounter with some magpies on a roofin milo and the magpies players will go through different backyards and find their way home via a mix of pointandclick and hidden object elements milo will have to sneak around neighbours yards while solving puzzles and enjoying the scenery along the waydeveloper johan scherft is also a talented dutch painter himself lending his expertise to create the charming visuals of the game the handpainted artwork and the animations are accompanied by a relaxing soundtrack where every backyard has its own theme song as composed by victor butzelaarthere are nine gardens for milo to explore and a cast of colourful characters to meet and while the whole game lasts only about an hour and a half it supposedly made to be a calming visual experience on mobileif you eager to give the game a go you can download milo and the magpies on the ios app store or on the google play store for android devices it a premium game that costs a pop or your local equivalent it also available to play on steam or if you curious about what the game looks like you can have a look at the embedded trailer above to get a feel of the gameplayare you on the hunt for more pointandclick adventures that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best pointandclick adventure games on android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire announces an upcoming crossover event with Ubisoft's Assassin's Creed franchise
content: garena has announced an exciting new collaboration event for free fire its insanely popular battle royale game on mobile as the survival shooter first crossover event of the free fire x assassins creed collab lets players dive into the world of the hit ubisoft franchise in an entirely new wayfree fire will not only welcome assassin creedthemed goodies into the battle royale game this coming march but it will also supposedly add iconic characters from the franchise the awardwinning video game series from ubisoft will bring a dedicated ingame experience to free fire as it comes to life on mobile screensdetails about the exciting new crossover are still a little bit hushhush at the moment save for the hella awesome promotional art on the cover but you can always stay tuned and join the community of followers over on the game official facebookpage to stay updated on all the latest developments more information about the sizzling crossover will be revealed in the next few weeksyou can also head on over to the game official youtubechannel for more sneak peeks at game developments in your areafor now you can download free fire on the ios app store or on the google play store for android devices if your device has the right specs you can also give the battle royale game a go with updated visuals with free fire max on the ios app store and on the google play store in both versions it a freetoplay game with inapp purchasesare you on the hunt for more battle royale games on your mobile device where you can fight to be the last player standing why not take a gander at our list of the top best battle royale games for android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: Top 25 best console and PC conversions for iPhone and iPad (iOS)
content: updated on february new entries and download links addedtoday we are going to talk about the best console games on ios as well as the pc games on ios original games are the lifeblood of any platform you can guarantee that the winner of the console war in any given generation will be the machine with the best unique titles in its rosterbut a good port can be just as persuasive if your console lacks a bone fide third party classic that can be found on another platform you can bet your bottom dollar that questions are going to be askedwe always cautiously happy when a big game comes to ios even if initially came out years earlier or was built with a tv and physical controls in mindthe best ports tend to be those that capture the purity of the original but smartly retune things for a mobile phone or tablet they don have to function well with touchscreen controls bluetooth controller support means that not strictly necessary but it certainly helpsbasically though we just want playable versions of our favourite pc and console games on our iphones and ipads is that too much to ask not judging by these prime examples

name: pocketgamer
header: Free Fire has launched the new Mesmerizing Nights Elite Pass
content: garenas free fire has been coming up with some interesting elite passes for some time now last month we ventured into the quantic unknown a void filled with sinister energy and scorpions the edgy bundle followed a purple and black colour scheme inspired by streetwear it is built upon players aggressiveness and feeling of danger while playing free firetaking a step further the new season elite pass for free fire draws inspiration from the arabian nights it has been titled mesmerizing nights garena described the characters in this elite pass as a man who courts danger and a woman who tames the wild with none of the folk tales of the arabian nights being able to describe the story of these two travellers our heros bundle is called the sultan of lapis bundle which features a magical lamp and our heroine features in the sultanah of cerulea bundle which is decorated with an hourglassarabic culture is heavily inspired by the colour white this elite pass has been designed to be a reflection of that and most of the pass has been modelled with a white colour scheme and a dash of gold to add some royalty to it after all you are playing as a sultan or sultanah alongside the elegant white and gold we have shades of red and blue to create an absolutely magical atmospherewhile you cant rub a magic lamp to make three wishes your wish can be fulfilled by the ingame dome of genie box drop the flying carpets replacement is the magic carpet surfboard alongside another superfast mesmerizing nights motorbike other eventexclusive rewards include the genie summoners sack backpack and the mesmerizing nights and weapons finally show off your arabian vibes with the fancy steps emoteget your hands on the mesmerizing nights elite pass by downloading free fire for free on
