to sign up respawn june respawn has not given any statement regarding the delay they have posted a new announcement on their official twitter handle announcing that the apex legends mobile beta will release in indonesia the philippines and malaysia in the next few days it is rumoured that it could be as early as tomorrowan update on apex legends mobilethe next round of closed beta testing is coming soon to indonesia the philippines and malaysiato players in other countries we working to bring the game to you as quickly as possiblepreregister here respawn july comes as good news for all the malaysian gamers as the country was not included in the previous announcement while at the same time the developers have delayed the beta launch in all the other countries mentioned above in the announcement respawn mentioned that they are working to bring the game to other countries as quickly as possiblean update on apex legends mobilethe next round of closed beta testing is coming soon to indonesia the philippines and malaysiato players in other countries we working to bring the game to you as quickly as possiblepreregister here respawn july played both of the previous apex legends mobile beta versions and we can say that it is a fantastic game the recent leaks from the game private beta test also confirmed significant changes and new features heading to the game in the upcoming beta players can expect to see new legends such as revenant crypto mirage and pathfinder alongside major changes to the graphics sensitivity settings battle pass and much moreif you reside in any of the countries mentioned above you can now preregister for apex legends mobile via google play store ensure to preregister if it available for you as it will get you a chance to get your hands on the upcoming beta if you are from any other country don worry you can choose to wait a little longer or keep your vpns ready and we will tell you how you can download and play apex legends mobile beta when it launched

name: pocketgamer
header: Apex Legends Mobile Gibraltar Guide - Tips and tricks, abilities, and more
content: if you are new to apex legends mobile you won believe what i about to say gibraltar actually has one of the highest win rates in the game if you are one of the few players who want to master this character you have come to the right place here is our apex legends mobile gibraltar guide where we talk about the character and his abilities alongside some tips and tricks that will come in handy during the battleoverview of the charactergibraltar might not look like the best goto choice at first but once you start playing with this champion you will realise that he is a great pick in a team he is the tankiest legend in the entire universe though he lacks movement abilities he has a combo of both defensive and offensive abilities allowing him to save his team from enemies and flank otherswhat is the difference between a good and an average gibraltar player well a good player will use his tactical at the right time creating a dome of protection saving his team from massive damage a good gibraltar will also know how to fight around the bubblealso readapex legends mobile ultimate and tactical ability cooldownsgibraltar strengths and weaknessesgibraltar is big and slow he has a huge hitbox area and can dodge bullets like other legends in the game however he has a great set of abilities which can be used both aggressively and in defense he really shines when it is about saving teammates or taking fights around the bubbleapex legends mobile gibraltar abilitiesgibraltar like other legends has three abilities one passive one tactical and one ultimate his skill set is pretty balanced as it has both defensive as well as aggressive abilities let learn more about his abilitiesalso check out ourapex legends mobile regen guide every healing item explainedhow to play gibraltargibraltar is a team player and should be played that way only his abilities are all meant to be used to help the entire team always be on the lookout for any opportunity to use your tactical dome and help your teammates you can also move ahead of your teammates soaking up the damage and protecting your alliescommunication is very important when you are playing this character make sure to let your teammates know when you are going to use dome or defensive bombardment bad use and you can ruin your team chance of winninglastly in apex legends mobile gibraltar is pretty easy to learn just practice your dome placement a bit and gather experience taking fights around it and you are good to goalso check out bangalore guide wattson guide wraith guide bloodhound guide caustic guide octane guideso that is all for our apex legends mobile gibraltar guide for more similarguides and tips and tricks stay tuned with us

name: pocketgamer
header: Clash Quest tips and tricks
content: clash quest is one ofthree upcoming mobile games from supercell that will expand the clash universe in this article we will share some vital clash quest tips and tricks that will help you get three stars on every single islandgameplay overviewclash quest is a turnbased mobile strategy game its a pve game where players have to understand the strengths and weaknesses of their troops to take down enemies in a limited number of moves to clear the stage its somewhat candy crush but in typical clash stylethe game is pretty easy to understand but tough to master you start each stage with a given set of troops and you have to look for combo attacks to eliminate your enemies in special stages you will also get to face enemy bosses like papa dragon lava golem and goblin king speed up your gamesince clash quest is a pve game the developers have added an option to speed up the game players can choose to increase the speed of the game by or it can be done simply by jumping into the settings menu when a round is in progressif you want to progress in the game quickly you want to play at the maximum speed however playing at high speed wont give you any gameplay advantage beyond the ability to play more levels in the same period of time preview your attacksthe game provides options to preview the outcome of the attack by simply tapping on the troops we cant emphasize enough how important it is to preview every attack similarly you can also tap on the enemy buildings and troops to preview their attacks getting to know how the attacks will work will help you concoct the perfect strategy go for combo attacksas we mentioned earlier clash quest is a lot like candy crush just like in candy crush you try to create a combo so try to do the same here combo attacks give a massive attack boost if you want to threestar any island in the game then you have to look for big combo attacks without combo attacks it is really not possible to score high every troop countsgoing for combo attacks does not mean that you can waste all the other troops just to create a combo move though every troop counts one barbarian or even a single goblin can be the difference between starring or starring an island sometimes you will have to sacrifice troops for a big move but make sure you know what you are doing play previous levelsyou will often become stuck on a particular island which is a clear indication that now you have to upgrade your troops to progress any further but upgrading troops requires gold and this is why its better to play previous levels again whybecause you get more gold by starring an island rather than getting or stars on them also keep an eye on islands with a gold minecart you dont want to miss those as they yield a massive amount of gold its basically free gold which is always nice spells are equally importantdont be a miser with spells most players in the game hold the spells until the last moment which is the wrong way to use them endeavour to use spells at the right time even if that means using them in your very first movethat concludes our clash quest tips and tricks make sure to keep these tips in your mind the next time you are playing the game

name: pocketgamer
header: Apex Legends Mobile to begin closed beta test in more territories next month
content: respawn will be releasing apex legend mobiles closed beta test to more territories sometime in the next few weeksthis was announced in a tweet made on the official respawn twitter account which named indonesia peru colombia egypt and lebanon as the next regions to be able to access the apex legends mobile closed beta test the game has previously been made available in india and the philippinesin a few weeks apex legends mobile closed beta test will roll out to five more countriesif you in indonesia peru colombia egypt or lebanon head to your local google play store page to sign up respawn june hasnt given a solid release date for when to expect these closed beta tests to launch except that it will appear on mobile storefronts in those territories at some point in a few weeksin a few weeks apex legends mobile closed beta test will roll out to five more countriesif you in indonesia peru colombia egypt or lebanon head to your local google play store page to sign up respawn june legends has received a big buzz on pc and console ever since it first released back in when it was first announced for mobile discussions were had that it could be a strong title to add to the mobile battle royale market with ea emphasising its mechanics differed from many of its rivalswith its expansion to these new regions ea and respawn expects more feedback to come from players that will help to shape the game into the type of experience it needs to be since the game was announced a while back we can only assume it wants to be patient with the title to ensure it becomes a hit on mobileother than that we still dont know when apex legends mobile will receive a full launch its possible it may happen before the end of this year but the staggered releases of each beta location means ea may want to stagger it out to ensure its not rushed out

name: pocketgamer
header: Supercell's Clash Quest has now soft-launched in five regions
content: supercells turnbased strategy game clash quest has just softlaunched for mobile in specific regions the games all about exploring an unknown island accompanied by the heroes from supercells clash universe currently the game is only available in finland sweden norway denmark and icelandthe helsinki devs have added the familiar content from their previous games players will recognise weapons items and gameplay mechanics but they will all work differently from what we become accustomed tothroughout your adventure you will tackle enemies and defeat them to grab rare loot collect exclusive items to upgrade your gear to enhance your heros abilities though you be familiar with their names they will be triggered in different ways compared to clash questclash quest the newest game from is now live in finland sweden norway denmark and iceland clash quest april with these familiar faces the game has added legendary bosses which includes papa dragon and goblin king the devs decided to add these characters as the previous titles had no real villains in them the attack mechanics are all similar in each and every game supercell creates but the approach to strategy will always differclash quest the newest game from is now live in finland sweden norway denmark and iceland clash quest april game will hold multiple league matches containing huge loot and points like the rest of the games under this banner you collect heroes and upgrade their levels follow the latest attack strategy to set yourself on a winning streakwith this regional release of clash quest the developers are actively looking for feedback from the players to improve the game before its global release stay tuned to learn more about the global release ahead of the full launchclash quest is now available on google play and app store as a regional release it is a freetoplay game with inapp purchases

name: pocketgamer
header: How to download Clash Quest's beta: Changing regions
content: its always a bit disappointing when you hear a new games out get all excited then rush to the app store or google play only to find that its not yet playable in your region you might be feeling this way as a result of supercell latest title clash quest which softlaunched into five regions yesterday finland sweden norway denmark and iceland that right if you not based in scandinavia then you not invited to the partythere a reason for that though clash quest only softlaunched rather than fully launched a soft launch is when a game releases to select markets where it is then tested and developed as it continues along its path to release it somewhere between the traditional closed and openbeta setup that most pc gamers are used to but means that the developers know that there a maximum threshold of players and that they don have to worry about latency or other server issuesyou might not have been invited to the party but that doesn mean you can sneak in the window and thankfully you wont need to bother faffing about with a vpn in order to play the ios version online once youve got the game downloadedhow to download clash quest on iphone or ipad iosthe easiest way to do this might sound like a hassle but its actually super simple all youre going to have to do is create a new apple id heres a handy link to create the account to play clash quest you want to set your new accounts region to sweden finland denmark norway or iceland your debitcredit card wont work with your new account so its best to answer none when asked for payment infoonce youve finished setting up your account simply log back in on your ios device with your new apple id and search for rush wars on the app store if youve set your region correctly youll find it no bother here a link to the game app store pagehow to download clash quest on android phones and tabletsthis one is a little different firstly you want to set up a google play account for one of the appropriate regions in order to do this you need to set up a vpn that directs your ip address to the appropriate region we can recommend a specific vpn but there are plenty out there to choose from including a decent amount of free onesonce that all set up you want to keep the vpn on and head to the google play store to download it keep the vpn active until the installation is complete however after that you can turn it off until you next need to update the game

name: pocketgamer
header: Apex Legends Mobile Bangalore Guide - Tips and tricks, abilities, and more
content: here is our apex legends mobile bangalore guide where we talk about the character in detail discussing her abilities and some useful tips and tricksbangalore no doubt has always been a very wellrounded character whether you are an aggressive player or someone who likes to take the position and then fight she can do the job pretty well in both scenarios if you are looking to master this legend then you have come to the right placeoverview of the charactershe is a well balanced legend her abilities provide a skill set that is diverse powerful and easily accessible she is a comparatively easy character to use but mastering her abilities will take you quite some timea big difference between an excellent bangalore player and an average player is how they use her abilities especially the tactical smoke launcher don worry if you are just learning to use her we got a beginner guide especially for youbangalore strengths and weaknessesbangalore is a character that fits pretty well in all roles so play as a filler do whatever your team requires just like wraith she is a tough legend to pin down due to her passive ability that gives her increased mobility so your objective with her should be not to get knocked even if that means you are doing less damageapex legends mobile bangalore abilitieslike every other character she comes with three abilities passive tactical and ultimate while her tactical might look like an escape tool and ultimate as an instant enemy kill ability the real scenario is very different so let break down and learn more about her abilitieswhile you here check out our bloodhound guide and wattson guidealso read apex legends mobile every ultimate and tactical ability cooldownshow to play bangalorebangalore can be played both aggressively and passively but this legend truly shines when played aggressively both her tactical and passive allow her to get out of any tough situation quicklywhile playing with her you would want to have at least a shotgun or smg in your loadout as most of the fights you will engage in will be around the smoke in close rangeyou can hold three charges of smoke so use them often don save them the cooldown is also not very long use them when you are looting death boxes reviving your teammate or while pushing an enemy teamsince bangalore tactical can be a huge disadvantage too therefore talk to your team about what you are planning before covering the entire arena in smokealso check out our octane guide and caustic guideso that is all for our apex legends mobile bangalore guidemake sure to check out our other guides and tips and tricks

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go Community Day Meetups return next week and players in the Asia-Pacific region can get postcards
content: the pandemic has changed the way weve lived for nearly two years now that things are returning to normal it time to get some traditions back and niantic is doing that by reintroducing inperson meetups for pokmon go in the next few days pokmon go will celebrate its stufful community day during the event niantic will be giving away special postcards to trainers in select cities in the asiapacific region there are already a bunch of places in the uk where the meetups will happen and you can check them out in our recentarticle as wellpokmon gos april community day will take place on april between pm and pm local time postcards can be obtained from select destinations that will be transformed into eventexclusive pokstops check out this list to find out if theres a meetup planned in your citystufful will make its pokmon go debut in these regions and all over the world players can make most of the event with the plethora of bonuses available all of which you can read about in our recentarticleits a great time to meet and interact with fellow trainers and also fans of the pokmon franchise if youre interested then download pokmon go for free on the app store and google play and go to a community day meetup on april

name: pocketgamer
header: Apex Legends Mobiles Chinese trailer confirms the addition of 4 new legends alongside new details
content: apex legends mobile has recently had a new showcase in china leading to lots of new information coming out about it however in addition to that an official chinese trailer of the game was released by the developers a trailer that showcases four new legends that should be making their way to the game very soonwhile we all are waiting for the next closed beta of apex legends mobile which is expected to release anytime now more details about the game have sprung ign china has posted the trailer of apex legends mobile on youtube which showcases highquality gameplay alongside some new features and legendssubscribe to pocket gamer on highquality gameplaythe earlier apex legends mobile beta was capped at the gameplay in the chinese trailer clearly looks like to be recorded at it could be too as there are no official details yet the gameplay in the new trailer looks very smooth compared to the initial beta that we had our handsonchanges in tpp modethe new video confirms massive changes that are coming to the tpp mode of the game earlier the game used to switch to fpp as soon as the players used to press the ads scopein button but now pressing the ads button switches to a shoulder perspective basically the game is copying the fortnite style and moving away from the pubg mechanicswe dont see how this is a good thing as the majority of the players dont really like the shoulder perspective and you could see the disagreement on any of apex legends mobile community be it on reddit or facebookaddition of four new legendslastly the chinese trailer confirms the addition of new legends in apex legends mobile revenant crypto mirage and pathfinder only legends were playable in the previous beta bloodhound lifeline bangalore gibraltar wraith caustic mirage octane wattson now the number of playable legends will be increased to as four more new legends will be added to the game in the very next betaso that is all for the latest updates on apex legends mobile while we wait for the next beta of the game check out our list of top best battle royale games for android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: Apex Legends Mobile Caustic Guide - Tips and tricks, abilities, and more
content: are you looking to get good at using caustic our apex legends mobile caustic guide discusses the character overviews strengths abilities alongside gameplay tips and tricks continue reading to learn everything from a to z about the characteroverviewcaustic is a defensive legend and is probably the best pick for indoor fights thanks to his tactical nox gas trap ability it really tough to win a battle against a team with caustic inside a building in recent esports tournaments with the apex legends pc version he was highly picked up by the teams as he is an excellent option for lategame fightscaustic strengths and weaknessesthough most of the player base believes that in apex legends mobile caustic is an entirely defensive character an excellent player will know that he can work just as well as offensive characters and even a trackercaustic abilitiescaustic just like any other legend has three abilities passive tactical and ultimate all of his abilities revolve around his nox gas that causes damage to enemies when they are caught inside it let take a look into his abilitieshow to play causticfirstly caustic has no movement abilities therefore always play caustic cautiously don stay out in the open too much try to stick to areas with buildings you won want to take closerange fightssecondly if you pick him you should always look for opportunities to place your nox gas trap don just keep looking for indoor options to set the traps you can go ahead and put it in corners toolastly don think twice before using your ultimate as a defense we know it has a long cooldown time but it better to stay alive than to go back to the lobbyso that is all for our apex legends mobile caustic guide you can take a look at our octane guide and we will soon be publishing guides for other characters too so stay tuned

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go is celebrating Sustainability Week, beginning April 20th
content: every year april is celebrated as earth day the movement that originated in takes place yearly and aims to raise awareness about how important it is to save our planet for a healthy future this years theme is to invest in our planet and to act boldly innovate broadly and implement equitably whats a better platform to raise awareness than an extremely popular game niantic wishes to do exactly that by celebrating sustainability week on pokmon go between april and pokmon go will spread the message of creating a sustainable future with lots of challenges and rewards for playerscelebrations kick off with the debut of two new pokmon oranguru the sage pokmon and cherubi alongside its shiny variant for lucky trainers its going to be green all around as other pokmon like oddish turtwig grotle venasur and others will appear in the wild more frequently a few shiny pokmon can be found hidden in the grass as well so keep an eye out additionally the seven km eggs will hatch into alolan diglett larvitar cherubi and orangurumost of these pokmon and a bunch of others like chikorita and sewaddle will be attracted to mossy lure modules and will be available through field research task encounters the field research tasks include mega energy for abomasow and venasaur the timed research on april will task players with travelling one km to earn an encounter with cherubi and for every five km travelled niantic will plant treesin addition a new collection challenge will add to the elite collector medals and a mossy lure module which will aid in capturing gloom and weepinbell to top it all off everyone will also receive a bonus xp for spinning pokstops for the first timecelebrate sustainability by downloading pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go's Stufful Community Day sweepstakes will send one lucky winner on a trip to Hawaii
content: fancy a trip to hawaii the only requirement is being a pokmon go player niantic is celebrating their upcoming stufful community day by hosting a sweepstakes tournament with a trip to hawaii as the grand prize there are lots of ingame items to be won as wellsigning up for the competition is quite easy all you need is a twitter profile make your way to pokmon gos official twitter handle follow it and retweet their tweet about the stufful community day and trip to hawaii thats it then you just wait and see if lady luck is on your side for those in india they must follow and retweet the post made by pokmon go indias twitter handleinsteadof all the retweets one person will be picked at random and they will win a trip for two to hawaii which must be redeemed within a year in celebration of sustainability week niantic will also provide winners with the opportunity to work with sustainable organisations in hawaii additionally they will win the tropicalthemed avatar outfit setthe outfit set will be given to runnersups as well it consists of a comfy alola shirt round sunglasses flabb hairpin backpacker capris for male avatars white track shorts for female avatars and red sandals which can be obtained via a gift code for everyone who already has these new ones will not be unlocked all winners will be notified by dm and details will only be sent from the official account there is no pay to win and detailed rules and eligibility criteria can be read on this pagethats not all though rewards will also be given out to everyone based on the number of retweets amassed for retweets players will earn one lure module a lucky egg for and one premium battle pass for retweetstry your luck out by downloading pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon GO Promo Codes (May 2022)
content: a game youve probably heard of and played before pokemon go actually has a way to promo codes i am sure that you like free items we all do we have created a list of freebies that you can collect because who doesnt like free stuff this list will always include uptodate pokemon go promo codes and we will keep making sure you have access to them through this postwhere to get the promo codesas there arent many codes out at once though niantic does launch new ones often these can be for cosmetics like outfits and accessories or for items like potions revives raid passes and more if its something you can use ingame there can be promo codes given away for it they only last for a limited amount of time so do use them when you see themare there any promo codes that never expire for pokemon gopokemon go doesn exactly have any promo codes that never expire but there have been plenty of them that could be used for a very long time that might lead people to believe that they never expire however we cannot say for certain one of the codes that was believed to always be valid is belowif you are looking for some free poke coins you can try the following ones however some of them may have expiredpossibly expiredhow to redeem pokemon go codesyou cannot actually redeem these promo codes through the app itself on ios devices instead you will need to go to the niantic offer redemption page on the web from here you can log in using whatever method you log into your trainer account on the app there is then a box to paste your codeonce it was submitted you will get a prompt in the app which tells you that you have received your items they are then shown in bubbles on the screen like most bubbles before returning to their home in your various inventories depending on the respective itemredeeming them on androidthe above way also works for android devices however android players can actually enter the pokemon go promo codes on their phone if theyd like this is also simple to do in map view you need to tap the pokeball buttonfrom there you can tap the shop button and at the bottom of the screen has a text field where you can enter it then tap redeem in case you are looking for a new friend to play with visit our pokemon go friends page and leave your codefeel free to leave a comment if you find any of these pokemon go promo codes are expired and we will get the list updated quickly

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go, Pikmin Bloom and Ingress players can do their part to plant trees with every 5km walked, thanks to Ecosia
content: niantic is celebrating all things earth day with its partnership with ecosia the search engine that lets players do their part by planting trees to combat deforestation in particular players of pokemon go pikmin bloom and ingress can contribute on community day this saturday as ecosia plants a tree for every that a player walksin pokemon go pikmin bloom or ingress players who walk for the environment will be able to take part in niantic initiative to fund up to trees each month until the end of july in case you unfamiliar with ecosia it a green search engine that takes its profits from advertising and invests them in global treeplanting effortsas a part of sustainability week will plant a tree up to trees for every trainer who adventures km during community day time to get out explore and plant some trees pokmon go april delighted to provide a simple way for niantics millions of players to be climate active as they come together for community days over the next few months says ruby au tree planting projects network and impact officer at ecosia partnering with worldleading companies like niantic enables us to continue to fund reforestation and biodiversity projects around the world to support communities and invest in our planet for the futureas a part of sustainability week will plant a tree up to trees for every trainer who adventures km during community day time to get out explore and plant some trees pokmon go april very excited to further our sustainability work by engaging directly with players in the real world thanks to ecosia we unlocking real impact by tying outdoor exploration to planting trees yennie solheim director of social impact at niantic saysif you eager to take part you can download pokmon go on the google play store or on the ios app store it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases you can also visit the official website to learn more about ecosiaare you on the hunt for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the ios and android games like pokemon go

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go's highly anticipated Mega Evolution update has released globally
content: its finally here pokmon gos anticipated mega evolution update is now downloadable worldwide the developers have been teasing huge changes to the special evolution for some time now while these have been part of pokmon go for a while with this new update mega evolution has become much easier and more rewardingto celebrate this update niantic is hosting a special research story ingame for trainers above level five they can choose one of venasaur charizard or blastoise and mega evolve them between today and may a mega moment event will also be held promising lots of rewards for players pokmon with mega evolutions will be found more frequently in the wild and they will also have exclusive field researchadditionally mega kangaskhan will make its debut in mega raids on may between am and pm spinning gym photo discs will also grant up to five free raid passes and players have an increased chance of encountering a shiny kangaskhan finally all megaevolved pokmon over the next few days will receive a cp boostthe difficulty of mega raids has been reduced allowing fewer people to complete them and pokmon can now be mega evolved from the raid battle prep screen itself the biggest feature though is the mega mastery levels every time a pokmon is mega evolved its mega level increases with each level providing greater rewards than the previous there is an increased chance of receiving candy xl and catch cp for pokmon which are the same type as the mega evolved one higher levels also decrease the pokmons rest periodit time to evolve your pokmon into the most powerful form ever download pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go's May Community Day will feature the Rock Pokemon Alolan Geodude
content: pokmon go fans have been treated to more events than one can count and theres still so much more to come last month fans took part in two community days instead of one where they added stufful and mudkip to their squads featuring in pokmon gos may community day is the alolan variant rock pokmon alolan geodude trainers can get their hands on the tough guy on may between am to pm local time if players manage to evolve the pokmon into alolan geodude by pm they will also learn the brand new move fast attack rolloutas always besides the normal version a shiny variant is out there somewhere for lucky trainers as well since the community day duration was rolled back to three hours instead of six once the event bonuses have seen a massive boost during the event players will receive catch stardust catch candy chance of finding geodude xl candy discounted rates on trading and incense and lure modules that will last three hours additional rewards will also be granted if players band together and manage to catch a fixed number of pokmon using a single lure modulemays special community day research story is called a rocky road and will be up for grabs for usd a new feature being introduced next month will allow players to gift a research story ticket to their friends as with every month the shop will feature a special onetime purchasable bundle free ultra balls stickers and a lot moreto top it all off a massive update should be globally available soon which is going to feature huge changes to mega evolutions taking your pokmon to the next level will be much simpler with the update as mega raids will be made easier new mega levels will be added alongside lots of bonusesinterested to get the rock pokmon then download pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go Fest 2022 will take place in June with an abundance of events and rewards for everyone
content: the highly anticipated pokmon go fest is coming back again this year to celebrate the massive community the game has built over the years this years legendary pokmon is the gratitude pokmon shaymin if youre interested be sure to tune in for this celebration on june and and get a chance to win numerous rewards bonuses and lots moreplayers can participate in the event by purchasing a ticket that costs and includes participation for both days each day will have unique events that trainers can take part in and it will all lead to a mega finale that will be held on august some stuff that everyone can participate in while a few exclusive events will be only accessible to ticket holders on day one everyone can enjoy finding different pokmon based on revolving habitat hours as well as in raids these include city plains rainforest and tundra regions a few shiny pokmon will also make their debuts ticket holders can additionally take part in a special research that will lead to an encounter with land forme shaymin gameplay can be personalized based on chosen difficulty other ticketed events include encounters with shiny unown b access to the global challenge arena and morethe global challenge area then becomes available for everyone on day two another special story will also go live on the second day for ticket holders a mystery pokmon will also make its debut in fivestar raids on this day over the event players can also earn up to nine raid passes stickers gifts avatar items and much morethe festival will finally culminate on august with even more stories and encounters to enjoy those who purchase a ticket for the fest will gain access to the finale as well while it is also purchasable separately for can be bought from the ingame item shop download pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Clash Quest: Everything we know so far about Supercell's tactical puzzler
content: update new information addedclash quest is a brand new puzzle battle game from the world of of clans as created by uber finnish developer supercell unveiled as part of a trio of new titles on april the game is already pretty far into development but as yet has no launch date here what we know so farthe game has been developed by the core helsinki team and brings familiar clash characters into a new gridbased battle game that looks reminiscent of the likes of legend of solgard and possibly with nods also to the likes of puzzles dragons empires puzzles but looks to play slightly differentlythe game is spread across levels set on different islands of an archipelago and in each level you will have your own army of clash giants archers princes and more facing off against a preset enemy line up also including some familiar looking faces such as canons and skeletonsplayers drop their clash troops into a grid and then trigger them to perform an attack they can do this onebyone but the real powerful attacks will be achieved by combining units in combinations in a more familiar style formulaplayers will have a finite army to clear each level and it appears can grow the strength of the squad through a mixture of unlockinggrinding and no doubt purchasing both units and special powerup items for them whilst only a handful of characters have been showcased from initial footage there clearly potential to add more from the familiar universethe inspiration for clash quest actually came from the individual characters each character has their unique way of behaving or attacking and we felt like there was an opportunity to create a totally new type of experience around those characters and provide a new challenge for the playersone of the things that were really excited to bring to the players are bosses in clash royale and clash of clans there aren villains or bosses and our game has thatone other thing that new to the universe is items each item triggers a bit differently for some items you need to activate a big combo to get the item power some are more passive for example the prince has an item that does big damage when you have princes so you need to use these in a smart waywe wanted to simplify the characters so you can more easily read themwhen you see the game i think it clearly a clash game there a good mix of familiar as well as new elements characters look totally familiar but slightly compacted cuter versions of the units we know from previous games think popped and you be on the right lines some are more evil versions of familiar favourites that bring to mind mario enemiesobviously the gameplay is new and feels like a fresh take on the battler titles the presence of and especially boss characters are something that brand new to the clash universe expect to see giant variations on familiar tribes and whole new opposition charactersat the time of writing we don currently know the clash quest release date the video shown is described as development footage but the fact that they revealed this game publicly and the diversity of levels suggests it a fair way alongthe game recently softlaunched in finland sweden norway denmark and iceland during this time the developers will look for player feedback and test various aspects of the game and look to improve on them further if all goes well we can expect to hear about a release date for clash quest fairly soon if you live in one of those regions you be able to download the game from the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Top 7 best AR games and apps on iPhone and iPad (iOS)
content: original list by mark brown updated by pocketgamer staff on march the heck is ar augmented reality well it somewhere in the middle between virtual reality and boring old normal reality we devised a list of some of the best ar games for the iphone that help you escape that normal realityyour phone shows you the real world using the camera but lays robots pokemon information dinosaurs dog ears and ghosts on top using ar you can get a feel of being in the game seeing the game itself overlayed on your actual surroundings in real lifewhat you get is a reality that just a bit more interesting than reality

name: pocketgamer
header: Crazy Plants: 9 simple tips and tricks for beginners
content: crazy plant early access has just been released worldwide today we have some crazy plant tips and tricks for you if you are just starting with this new pvp tower defence without any further ado let go right through themtip place all the heroes firstthis is probably the most simple and straightforward tip that can help you win most pvp battles you should always try to place all heroes on the available blocks before merging or upgrading them the idea behind this is quite simple two heroes will deal more damage compared to a single upgraded hero once you have placed heroes in all the blocks it is only then you should focus on upgrading or merging them but even then don forget to keep adding heroes when new slots opentip learn about the heroesit is crucial to learn about the heroes in your decks there are various types of heroes cc attack and support each hero has different abilities so its important to learn about them and use them accordingly during battle for example coconon deals more damage when placed away from the target you can learn about the hero stats and abilities by simply clicking on the details below the hero in the card deck areatip create an allround deckyou should build a deck that has a mix of all types of heroes that complement each other so make sure to pick all the three types of heroes one support attack and cc i like to go with the attack in the other two slots but you can customize it as per your playstyletip play all coop matchesyou can play up to three coop matches in a day make sure to utilize all of your chances playing coop matches allow you to get a seed which you can redeem for a seed chest you can easily get at least one seed chest from playing coop matches dailytip collect freebies from the daily task tabyou can collect freebies by visiting the daily task tab you have to simply open the tab and collect these rewards it mostly free cards gems and coinstip complete daily tasks to get rewardsthough you get free rewards for just visiting the daily task tab you can also get a lot more by completing daily tasks these are simple tasks such as upgrading a hero so make sure to do them to claim additional rewardstip collect freebies from daily shopthe daily shop refreshes every hours every time it does so you can get some free rewards you can claim your free reward from the daily shop by visiting the shop section and clicking the free reward icontip use redeem codes to get free rewardsyou can also claim a lot of free gems cards and coins by using crazy plants redeem codes the developers release these codes on social media handles such as the facebook fan page you can redeem these codes by clicking on the menu icon and then going to the redeem sectiontip spend gems on chestsgems are the premium currency while you can spend gems on many things we suggest you only spend them on the chest simply put purchasing a boss chest is the best use of gems you can get a lot of cards from these chests which will help you unlock new heroes and upgrade your current onesthat concludes our crazy plants tips and tricks for more tips and guides stay tuned with us

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go is celebrating the Festival of Colours next week with the debut of Oricorio
content: pokmon gos season of alola has been out for a little bit with the welcome to alola event just ending it introduced trainers to the numerous pokmon from pokmon sun and moon now it time to prepare for the second event in pokmon gos actionpacked calendar for this monthniantics upcoming event is holi the festival of colours between march and players throughout the world can enjoy this celebration of colours which originally finds its roots in india it celebrates the triumph of good over evil and is also regarded as the festival of love the world of pokmon go will also imbibe this festival with a diverse group of colourful pokmonpokmon gos festival of colours will mark the debut of oricorio the dancing pokmon it has a different version and based on the location numerous kinds of oricorio will be foundbesides the usual encounters raids and field research tasks there is a colourful collection challenge for players which will award an elite collector medal xp stardust and an encounter with oricorio certain field researches will also offer mega energy furthermore all lure modules activated during the event will last four hoursniantic is also hosting a special celebration for trainers in india this will be held between march and allowing players to participate in a regional challenge to catch pokmon if the target is reached everyone will receive a bonus reward of catch candy additionally players in india can purchase a special celebratory box containing a lucky egg a lure module a rainy lure module and a mossy lure module for pokcoinsfinally everyone can also purchase new themedavatar items that feature tshirts with beautiful splashes of colour and morecelebrate holi with your friends by downloading pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go Tour: Johto is coming to select cities in Europe for real-world celebrations
content: the pokmon go tour johto is close to kicking off and niantic is constantly trickling down information for fans who are waiting for it while players can enjoy the entire tour from wherever they are niantic is also hosting inperson events in select cities across europe for trainers to enjoy those staying in these european cities can make their way and interact with other trainers play with them trade enjoy photo ops and have an absolutely rollicking time the realworld celebrations will be held between am and pm local time on february check out this list of destinations and find the one closest to youwhile there is no registration fee to participate in the live celebrations there is however an entrance fee at britzer garten berlin and westfalenpark dortmund you can find more details about that on their respective websites also if you live in another country as i do fear not as everyone can enjoy the same johto tour from anywhere with the ticketed and nonticketed experiences being the same barring the kind of pokmon encounters and some special gueststhe johto tour celebrates pokmon gold and silver and will feature all the pokmon from this generation players can catch new pokmon earn stardust complete quests and earn loads of rewards ticket holders also get a premium experience with the new masterwork research quest that involves trainers helping apex shadow versions of hooh and lugia additionally the go tour pok ball prep rally event kicks off tomorrow and will help players stash on numerous pok balls to prepare for the eventplan your trip to a realworld pokmon go tour johto with your friends now download pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon GO Shadow Pokemon and how to catch them
content: shadow pokemon have made their way into the pokemon go world with team rocket taking over the world through sky travel pokestops and being a part of your field training shadow pokemon are a real problem as they look even and are much more challenging to catch coupled with the fact that you need to fight off team rocket first there is a lot going on around this type of pokemonwhether you are trying to get through the troubling situation field task in pokemon go or like me are currently trying to get through a limitedtime event using these powerful creatures this guide should help you learn everything you need to know to bring these pokemon back to safetyin this article we are going to cover what shadow pokemon are how to capture them the best tips on gaining more pokeballs to capture them with what purifying is and more hopefully this is helpful in fulfilling your quests and helping you continue to save pokemon in this world

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go's Season of Alola goes live with new Pokemon and events
content: its time for a vacation pokmon gos season of heritage has just ended and it has been quite a stressful one trainers were working constantly to unlock the mysterious door finding new pokmon dealing with team rocket saving two legendary pokmon from the dark side and so much more everyone deserves a little break to rest and rejuvenate and pokmon gos new season of alola will do exactly thatsubscribe to pocket gamer onpokemon gos new season of alola begins today and will run until june it features pokmon that debuted in pokmon sun and moon to kick things off niantic is also hosting a welcome to alola event until march which will feature a few of the new pokmon that are found in the alola region players can expect to find rowlet litten popplio and pikipek and yungoos more frequently in the wild the same pokmon will also be part of the tropical collection challenge catching all of them will reward players with an elite collector medal xp and ultra ballsalolan pokmon will also make their way to raids onestar raids will feature rockruff bellsprout electrike and more alolan raichu nidoqueen wigglytuff and alolan graveler will be found in threestar raids mega venasaur in mega raids and alolas guardian tapu koko in fivestar raids players can also expect to find pikipek and yungoos in field research task encounters marchs community day will also feature alolan sandshrewadditionally the entire season contains multiple special research that can be completed over three months they are based on the different islands of the alola region check them out belowthis times seasonal bonuses include increased incense effectiveness more damage for remote raids guaranteed gifts two free raid passes per day and incense lasting for minutes there is a tonne of events also coming over the next three months which niantic will reveal as time passes currently we know everything happening in march be sure to check it outdownload pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go offers look at the content roadmap for early 2022
content: niantic has revealed its content roadmap for the early portion of this year and they shared a look at its current focuses within the game alongside some upcoming big updates on events and community daysfirst on the roadmap fresh off the spectacular response to the pokemon go tour kanto last year niantics first order of business is hosting the pokemon go johto tour beginning on february and during this event trainers around the world can participate wherever they are but trainers specifically within monterrey mexico or kaohsiung taiwan will actually be able to participate in live events some highlights of this particular tour include new go gym trainers inspired by top members of the community and new masterwork research featuring apex shadow pokemonthe next focus of the roadmap is go battle league improvements niantic has assured us that it is constantly updating and trying to refine the experience of these battles but are currently prioritizing a large number of updates and bug fixes for this portion of the game these updates will be featured soon in an upcoming dev diarybeyond that niantic is looking at upgrading the already existent postcard book feature by adding in additional functions like notifications sticker saving expanded gift maximums new sorting methods and new postcard notes along with all of that they are planning on sharing several season special research stories oriented towards smallerscale adventuresand lastly niantic wants to explore the sense of community theyd like trainers to feel around the world with the firstever community day classic being one such experiment theyd like to dive deeper into those experiments and explore the concept of community day to keep events fresh and exciting for all of their playerswith all of these updates and more coming this year alone it is looking like a wonderful year to get into the super popular pokemon go if you havent already you can do so by downloading it for free on either the app store orgoogle play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go's next community day will be titled Memories of Mudkip
content: with another community day on the horizon developer niantic has announced the pokemonfor one of the two april community days hosted within its everpopular alternate reality title pokemon go this one will be based around one of the most recognizable and most adorable pokemon of them all mudkippokemon go fans have been treated to an absurd amount of events during the game lifespan and it is showing absolutely no signs of stopping anytime soon in the next few weeks alone players can expect new legendary pokemon raids the aforementioned april community day and some other smaller events as well with all of this content its easy to see how pokemon go has retained its spot near the top of the charts for so longbut about the mudkip day specifically its no different than the other community days for those unfamiliar these events are hosted usually twice per month and up the spawn rate of a certain pokemon alongside adding in a new attack for their evolved form a recent addition to these days was the adding in of special research stories related to the chosen pokemon these are basically small story events with some cutscenes that add a bit of flavour to the event along with all of those additions there will also be a catch xp multiplier the upping of timers for lures and incense from one to three hours and a surprise for anyone who takes a few snapshots during the events runtime as wellas is usual for community days the exact runtime for the mudkip day will be from pm to pm local time on sunday april if youve been looking to get your hands on a mudkip or just want some big xp gains this is the perfect time for it alternatively if seeing mudkips adorable face has finally convinced you to join in the pokemon go festivities you can download it for free on the app store or google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go's Season of Heritage continues as Apex Shadow versions of Ho-Oh and Lugia are introduced
content: pokmon gos season of heritage began in december and introduced us to a mysterious door in a mountain which had some ties to the past with three mechanisms to unlock it was going to take some time for trainers to reveal what is hidden but they kept making stridesthe first mechanism saw dragontype pokmon from the unova region showing up while the second used rock and steeltype pokmon to activate and revealed mountains similar to the johto and sinnoh regions now the final mechanism was activated with the help of spark and electrictype pokmon unfortunately team rockets nefarious plans foiled everyones efforts and stole whatever was behind that doortrainers later found out that there was a mysterious power behind the door and arlo had used it to fulfil his evil intentions rumours were floating around that arlo used the stolen power to create extremely powerful shadow pokmon and it looks like they were rightarlo was somehow able to harness whatever was behind the door to create pokmon that were more powerful than even the shadow pokmon that team rocket uses he utilized the power to create apex shadow lugia and apex shadow hooh things are going to get very heated as these two legendary pokmon are now under a malicious influence and trainers must try their best to save themto participate in this challenging event players must own a ticket to the pokmon go tour johto this will unlock a special research called masterwork research a progressive questline that will keep expanding it is during this event that trainers will come across the apex shadow legendaries theres something really fearful about them but can be changed once they are purified a form that will heighten their preexisting abilitiesapex shadow hooh uses sacred fire that deals and damage in trainer battles and gymsraids respectively after purifying sacred fire it deals an extra damage in gyms and raids apex shadow lugias aero blast deals and damage in trainer battles and gymsraids respectively and aeroblast deals damage in gyms and raidscheck out everything you need to know about the johto tour in this article and prepare to save these pokmon by downloading pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon GO Smeargle and how to catch it
content: smeargle isn regular in pokemon go meaning you wont find them wandering around the world waiting to be captured since this pokemon is nonconventional we figured wed put together a little guide to aid you in catching smeargle in pokemon go to help complete your collection recently i have caught one just in time for the johto collection challengebut first lets talk about smearglein pokemon go smeargle is a generation pokemon from the johto regen it is a normaltype painter who looks a lot like a little artist which is why smeargle is known as the painter pokemon in the core games smeargle has a unique move called sketch that allows them to copy an attack used by its opponent permanently similarly in pokemon go smeargle will have the same moves as the pokemon you are taking photos of when it appearshow to catch a smeargle in pokemon gowhen it comes to catching a smeargle in pokemon go you need to start taking pictures of your pokemon clicking on any pokemon in your bag will bring up its page on this page there is a small camera image on the upper righthand side you can click this to bring it out in the world you will need arenabled and have to move your camera around the area waiting for shining spots to appearonce you see these spots you can tap to place your pokemon from there you can start taking pictures youll need to wait until you are done then tap the arrow in the top lefthand corner of the screen to exit the next screen will show all of your photos youll want to scroll through these looking for a smeargle which wont be hidden in the picture instead this pokemon will appear over quite a large part of the screen photobombing youyou can tap on the smeargle photo and then exit the screen smeargle should then appear in the world like a normal pokemon waiting for you to tap and capture itmaybe you are looking for more friends to play with make sure you visit our pokemon go friend codes page to meet more players

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokmon Go's March Community Day will feature Sandshrew and Alolan Sandshrew
content: with the summers kicking in and a brand new season beginning on pokmon go its time to reveal marchs community day pokmon as well last month we saw the cottonweed pokmon hoppip and its evolutions make their way to pokmon go this month will feature the mouse pokmon sandshrew alongside its relative the alolan sandsrew since the season of alola has just kicked off today theres no way alolan sandshrew would miss the opportunity of being featured as the community day pokmonpokmon gos march community day kicks off on march between am and pm local time while the two sandshrew variants will appear more frequently in the wild a few lucky trainers might also encounter their shiny versions so keep an eye out there are lots of bonuses to look out for as well placing an egg in an incubator during event hours will reduce its hatch distance to incense and lure modules will last three hours and there are special rewards for taking snapshots during the eventin case you already have a sandshrew theres still reason to hunt for the community day special pokmon because its evolution sandslash will learn the exclusive charged attack night slash if sandshrew is evolved during or up to two hours after the event it deals damage in trainer battles gyms and raids on the other hand alolan sandslash will know the fast attack shadow claw which deals six damage in trainer battles and nine in gyms and raidsadditionally players can also gain access to the community day special research story gritty and glacial for usd or equivalent the item shop will feature two event bundles as well a onetime purchasable bundle including ultra balls three super incubators five lucky eggs elite charged tm for pokcoins and a free bundle containing ultra balls there are stickers that can be found everywhere as wellmarch is an absolutely actionpacked month for fans download pokmon go now for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go's March calendar: New Alola Season, raids, spotlight hours, and events
content: march marks the beginning of a new season on pokmon go the season of heritage has officially ended and the season of alola now takes over featuring pokmon sun and moons alola region between march and june players can will encounter numerous pokmon from this region take part in a series of events and have an absolutely rollicking timemarchs research breakthrough encounter will feature alolan vulpix every monday players can also purchase a bundle containing a remote raid pass and other items for pokcoin at the shop lucky trainers might come across a shiny vulpix as wellmarch raidsthe first half of march will feature the guardian pokmon of alola tapu koko in fivestar raids the second half of the month will see therian forme tornadus and a mystery pokmon meanwhile mega raids will feature mega venasaur until march mega lopunny march and mega charizard y march hoursspotlight hours are held every tuesday from pm to pm local time this months spotlight pokmon and bonuses aremarch community daythis months community day pokmon are sandshrew and alolan sandshrew check out more about the event in our dedicated articlequite an actionpacked month for pokmon go fans download the game now for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: The Revolt: Massing will launch on February 24th, with pre-registration still ongoing
content: yogame has just dropped the official release date for the revolt massing letting players dive into a breathtaking fantasy world beginning february eager fans are invited to preregister for the fantasy anime rpg to score cool ingame goodies and special perks upon the game official launchin the revolt massing players can experience a thrilling new oriental fantasy narrative that takes inspiration from westward one of the most popular comics in hong kong the rpg also features deep strategic elements along with gorgeouslooking visuals and themed aestheticspreregistration signups on both ios and android have already hit more than players when the milestone is reached players will be rewarded with the ssr hero tianyu zhi and her tale is as follows tianyu zhi and tianyu dragon lord are like daughter and father her real identity is the scripture eternal flame which has cultivated into a humanoid what is the story between her and the white wolfupon the game release players can also expect a series of exciting launch events with cool rewards such as special props and rare heroesthere are over a hundred heroes for players to collect across different factions and if you eager to get a headstart you can preregister on the official website for summon charm and spirit stone you can find out more about the revolt massing on the google play storefor android devices and on the ios app store it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases you can join the community of followers over on the official twitterpage to stay updated on all the latest developments as wellare you on the lookout for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of top best rpgs for android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go's Poke Ball Prep Rally event will let players stock up on Poke Balls in preparation for the upcoming Johto Tour
content: with the pokmon go tour johto just around the corner excitement is certainly building up all pokmon that originally featured in the johto region will begin showing up with their shiny version as well niantic has an actionpacked event that is ready to go live in the next ten days and you can read all about it in this articlebased on the chosen ticket different pokmon will be found in the wild coupled with a tonne of bonuses for all players both versions will also get eventexclusive special research that gives everyone a chance at obtaining a shiny gyarados and celebi now you cant catch pokmon without pok balls right niantic has that covered too with its newly launched go tour pok ball prep rally eventwhile the primary goal of the rally is to ensure trainers have a sufficient number of pok balls to catch pokmon numerous balllike pokmon will frequent the wild too the event is set to run between february and and will have players complete quests to earn pok balls and catch other pokmon including a debutant finishing tasks will also award great balls and ultra ballsin the wild players can expect to find voltorb koffing marill wailmer solosis foongus and more frequently but the one everyone will want to look out for is the debuting hisuian electrode a couple of weeks ago trainers began encountering hisuian voltorb a pokmon from the hisui region of pokmon legends arceus now players can also encounter it in its evolved form hisuian electrode additionally trainers can evolve their voltorb into electrode after the event for voltorb candyit would be criminal for a pok ball celebration to not feature ball guy and so players can pick up the galar pokmon leagues mysterious mascot from the item shop finally buddy pokmon will also bring pok balls as giftsget ready to horde pok balls by downloading pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go Groudon - How to catch it, its weaknesses and where to find it
content: if you looking to catch groudon in pokemon go then we have the best way for you to fight and capture the legendary pokemongroudon is best known because it was part of the weather trio from generation ruby and sapphire pokemon games this pokemon is quite powerful in pokemon go and a challenge to catch so you might be looking for some tips and tricks on both completing the quest and your collectionhow to catch a groudon in pokemon goin pokemon go groudon appears in level raids like all legendary pokemon this means that catching it will be a challenge its best to team up with friends either with remote raid passes or in person if you can battle together pokemon go has given out a remote raid pass box alongside this event to help you outyou can claim yours in the shop if you are looking to use a remote raid pass you can invite friends to your raid and if they are online with a pass themselves they might join youbefore you go on your epic adventure to battle this pokemon you should learn more about your enemy in the hopes of defeating it efficiently and successfullywhat kind of pokemon is groudongroudon is a groundtype pokemon which is weak against grass ice and water types as it is a groundtype pokemon it cannot damage flyingtype pokemon but flyingtype pokemon are not able to deal any additional damage to groudonmost effective pokemons against groudon in pokemon gothe pokemon that are most effective to groudon are gyarados swampert kyogre mamoswine weavile glaceon roserade tangrowth and alolan exeggutor if you have any of these in your pokemon collection with high cps it is worth putting them into your partygroudons possible fast moves are dragon tail a dragontype move and mud shot a groundtype move their possible charged moves are earthquake a groundtype move fire blast a firetype move and solar beam a grasstype movewhat cp should you expectspeaking of cp you might want to know what the cp range will be for your legendary groudon encounter as a raid boss you will find a cp of which is a mammoth to defeat once captured their cp will be reduced to but when it is sunny the weather boost for it will bring their cp up to luck in your research mission and collecting legendary pokemon

name: pocketgamer
header: Pokemon Go is celebrating Valentine's Day with the debut of new Fairy-type Pokemon
content: the season of love is coming to pokmon go as niantic is celebrating valentines day over this week and the next love is in the air as players can participate in new events and challenges catch pokmon participate in raids and also finally see the debut of an evolutionary line of fairytype pokmonkicking things off with the hallmark event between february and players can catch the three fairytype pokmon flabb floette and florges who are making their debuts they will be available in red yellow orange blue and white colours and the evolutions will require flabb candy and flabb candy and hearts respectively the colours will vary with the region with red flower flabb appearing in europe the middle east and africa blue flower flabb appearing in the asiapacific region and yellow flower flabb inthe americastrainers can also make use of lure module duration catch candy and more gifts from buddy pokmon during this eventalso readstarting tomorrow february and until february players can participate in the global valentines day challenge niantic aims to spread some love by having trainers from all over the world send gifts to their friends one breaching a global limit of sending over gifts everyone will be able to enjoy transfer candy for the remaining event timeadditionally furfrou can also change its form from the natural form furfrou to heart trim furfrou this can be done from the change form button in the menu it will cost furfrou candy and stardust after completing the collection challenges players will earn encounters with a female and male frillish gallade and gardevoir will also be able to learn special attacks during this eventthere are also numerous pokmon who will appear more frequently in the wild like luvdisc woobat volbeat chansey and more registeel and mega houndoom can be encountered in fivestar and mega raids respectively field research tasks will feature pikachu eevee luvdisc and ralts or one of frillish alomomola and spinda if youre lucky lastly the item shop will also have new valentines daythemed items to buyget ready to celebrate the season of love by downloading pokmon go for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Tower of Hell codes - free items and XP (May 2022)
content: most games on roblox have codes and tower of hell is no exception so today we are going to be going through all of the codes currently active for tower of hell tower of hell hasnt been known to give very many codes and actually doesnt have any ingame code areas like other games on this platformvault codesin the game there are two vaults that you can make it too each of these vaults can be open with a different code and give you an ingame itempreviously codes in this game have been made available to enter ingame chat which is something that isnt often used in games this included a code for free membership for hours through freemember however this code expired in your eye out for more codes in tower of hell and hopefully the developers will start to release them more often so that we can get xp and other items in game if you do see any codes for tower of hell do use them as soon as you see them as they often will not last for very long at all if you looking for more roblox codes that you can use try all star tower defense codes blox fruits redeem codes grand piece online codes and many others that we are featuringabout the gameroblox is full of fun games for you and your friends to enjoy one of the more popular obby style games is titled tower of hell this is a randomly generated obstacle course where you will try to climb the tower by jumping around climbing ladders avoiding lasers and otherwise getting to the top there are no checkpoints and a course is generated until a massive timer ticks down this timer once it reaches zero will also bring everyone to the base of the game players can purchase more time but this is risky

name: pocketgamer
header: Niantic hosting community days once a month throughout the next year, one planned for this month
content: niantic developers of pokemon go fame has announced the first niantic community day taking place on march this year niantic has also announced that they are planning on having one of these community days once a month from now until june niantic community days are not specifically centred around pokemon go and are absolutely about all three of their games pokemon go is very typically the main focus given the massive fame it has reached ingress and pikmin bloom will likely see a fair few players show up as well but overall pokemon is their largest game so if youre planning on showing up plan on most others being there to play that oneif you arent familiar with the concept of niantics community days these are planned social events by the company to gather their players into specific areas so that they can all meet each other and bond over one of the three games that niantic supports given all of these games are alternate reality titles they all involve going places and leaving the house and typically also lead to being a bit more social in general since you end up frequenting some busy hotspots for ingame eventsnaturally niantic takes advantage of this aspect of ar games to get their community even more engaged with one another and offers a lot of opportunities to meet likeminded people in your community the next upcoming community day on march will be held across a large assortment of locations and countries heres the full announced list so farat these locations youll find niantic booths and likely a large swath of fellow gamers around to make friends with if all this communitydriven gameplay sounds up your alley you can check out any of niantics games all for free on bothgoogle playand the app store

name: pocketgamer
header: Bloodshore is Wales Interactive's upcoming FMV that will bring battle royales to life
content: the wales interactive think tank seems to be on fire because we have another fullmotion video game that has washed on our shores literally the producers of acclaimed games like five dates and the complex now bring us bloodshore a fine new addition to their portfolio of narrativedriven stories and interactive movies in the form of fmv gamesbloodshore is like fortnite or pubg suddenly brought to life yes it exactly what you think it is bloodshore follows the story of a real battle royale featuring highprofile streamers entertainers and death row inmates all fighting to be the last one standing and it all televised for viewers to enjoy in the form of a show called killstreamyou play as nick a washedup actor who wants that big big cheque so that he can turn his life around hes competing alongside others on killstream because the final prize is lifechanging but there must be something bigger at play here right why else would you want to pit high profile people against one another and kill them off until only one surviveswell it seems that nick begins to discover the sinister plot behind this battle royale and the island they find themselves on things come to light as there is a reason for all this madnessbloodshore is packed with over hours of fmv footage a record by wales interactive themselves there is so much to do and so many choices to make every playthrough you will discover new things that will cause extreme consequences for nick and the rest of the people on the island the game has been codeveloped by wayout pictures good gate media posterity entertainment and wales interactive and it promises to be an fmv experience like no otherbloodshore arrives in november for ios devices alongside pc and consoles
