name: pocketgamer
header: Brake Away: A few tips to help keep you from crashing
content: brake away is a bitesized car game where the goal is to not crash any cars the game gives a similar vibe to a game likeburnout crash except in that game your goal was to make as many cars crash as possible in classic burnout fashionhere are a few brake away tips that can help kick you offdealing with a variety of tracks you start off with one car and as you continue more cars will start to form this obviously will make things more challenging the longer you avoid crashes the higher your score will be there are no lives here so one crash and that game overthe controls in the game are super simple as it really only one control you can perform that said it can be a very tricky game to master too it can be easy to get confused by the cars and their directions as well as the layout of the roads

name: pocketgamer
header: Anime Storm Simulator codes (May 2022)
content: we have collected a bunch of working anime storm simulator codes that will boost your champion by providing ingame items powerups and skill points all of the redeem codes are tested and regularly updated as soon as the developers release a new oneas we all know animethemed roblox titles are increasingly popular among anime otaku these titles let you experience the story in a roblox environment adding to that list we have anime storm simulator the latest arrival on robloxin this game you can invite or create a powerful squad to tackle foes you get to choose from skilled champions and lay out a strategy to defeat the enemies and conquer their citieslooking for more codes do take a look at our collection for some other trending roblox titleshow to get more anime storm simulator codesthe description box of the roblox page is frequently updated with new codes so nab them before they expire you can also bookmark us as we regularly keep this page up to date with new and working codes remember that the anime storm simulator codes tend to expire after a few usages

name: pocketgamer
header: Here is how to download and play Everdale on Android
content: everdale is supercells latest mobile game it has no elements of fights or battles making it a one of a kind game for the developer the finnish studio refers to everdale as a collaborative mobile building simulation game the game was announced a month back and is now available to download and play in a few selected countriesif you are looking to get your hands on the game you have come to the right place today we will share a stepbystep guide on downloading and playing everdale on android it does not matter whether the game is available in your region or not by the end of this guide you will have everdale running on your devicedownload everdale via google playeverdale is now officially available in many countries if you reside in any of the countries where the game is available you can simply head to google play and download the gamethe game is officially available in the following countries on google play at the time of writing this article australia canada denmark finland hong kong iceland malaysia new zealand norway the philippines singapore sweden switzerland and united kingdomdownloading everdale by switching regions on google playyou will need a google play account from any of the countries mentioned above for this process here is how you can do itdownload everdale via apkif everdale is not available in your country yet but you cant wait to try the game then you can download an everdale apk and use a vpn to play the game right now from any country just follow the steps belowso that is how you can download and play everdale on your android device right now from anywhere around the world we dont recommend downloading apk files its always better to wait for the official release of the game in your regions for moreeverdale guides stay tuned with us

name: pocketgamer
header: Claw Stars hosting new Spring-themed event with two new cosmetic unlockables
content: the adorable claw machine game claw stars has announced its latest event the eidalfitr this event brings some new collectables to gather as well as some brand new spaceships for your tiny little hamsters to pilot and brand new suits for them to wearfirst off if youre not familiar claw stars is a casual multiplayer game developed by icandy that mixes the classic clawmachine arcade experience with collectathon gameplay and some light customization elements while this is not the deepest title out there it is quite a fun romp if youre looking for a simple and lighthearted time wasteras for the event the jumbo balls that you can collect as you traverse the various planets will now feature festive stamps within them these stamps will allow you to complete the eid collection in the festive album both eventspecific collectable trackers if you manage to progress this album youll be getting a brand new topoftheline spaceship to pilot the shawwal the space vessel isnt the only thing up for grabs another unlockable cosmetic that will be yours if you manage to fill out the album is a space suit for your hamsters to wear as they collect their items the blessed crescent suit is a green plantthemed outfit that all of your little critters can sport and will offer up a change of pace to your groupand finally for international audiences claw stars is officially available in two more languages bahasa malaysia and bahasa indonesia so if youre looking to get your claws on the event and unlock some fun new cosmetic items you can download claw stars for free on the app store andgoogle playnow

name: pocketgamer
header: Terraria collaborates with Don't Starve Together and adds QOL updates in latest patch
content: in case you missed it games has announced a new crossover event for its actionadventure sandbox game terraria the update lets players on consoles and on mobile devices enjoy a new experience with dont starve together from klei entertainmentin terraria latest update players can expect to venture into the constant which is a world seed that takes inspiration from the dangerous environments of dont starve togetherterraria users can encounter new bosses enjoy fresh mechanics meet new pets and collect various equipment during the collab event players can also use the tentacle spike and do their best to live through starvation as well as take down the deerclopsalong with the crossover comes plenty of qualityoflife improvements as well as bug fixes welcome additions from the and updates can also be expected which include the community contest vanity armours as well as the tenth anniversary world seedplayers can unlock new dont starve themed emotes and three new achievements just desserts boots of the hero hey listen the mobile version of the game also now supports keyboard and mouse controlsif you eager to give the updates a go terraria is available to download on the ios app store and on the google play store for android devices it a premium game that costs a pop or your local equivalent you can also join the community of followers over on the official twitterpage to stay updated on all the latest developments or have a look at the embedded trailer above to get a feel of the game you can visit the official patch notesas well for more infoare you on the hunt for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best paid games for iphone and ipad ios

name: pocketgamer
header: Rec Room is hosting a virtual prom with Columbia Records' Ethan Bortnick
content: rec room has announced that it will be hosting a virtual prom for players tomorrow saturday april at am pdt the event is being hosted in collaboration with colombian records pianist and singer ethan bortnick to celebrate the release of his new song promdescribed as a promthemed after party players will be able to join ethan as his ingame avatar performs the track before watching the prom music video as a group you can check that out below if you interested in hearing the song or watching the videobeyond that ethan will also greet his fans during the virtual gettogether players will also receive a special tshirt for their avatars to wear the venue itself was designed by the rec room team it is an underwater dancehall that has areas designed for socialising and dancing there will even be a photo booth to pose in for photoloving playersthere is also a bonus available for us players who attend the prom on mobile they will find a special booth at the event that will gift them up to two months free of apple musicthe song itself is a retelling of ethan bortnick experience of senior year which took place during the pandemic discussing the track he said no prom no graduation no license missing out on dates feeling like everything is moving too fast it a gradual build to that emotional explosion and that what this song is prom is the culmination of all my frustration for missing out on so many crucial milestones in quarantine and the culmination of my influences as an artistrec room is available now on the app store and google play it is free to download with inapp purchases

name: pocketgamer
header: This is the President, the story-driven management sim, is heading for iOS and Android in May
content: prolific publisher handygames has announced that the storydriven management sim this is the president will release for ios and android on may it was previously released for pc in december and currently holds a metacritic score of which isn overly impressive but perhaps the switch to mobile can help the game find a new audienceas the title suggests this is the president sees you becoming the president of the united states of america in the problem is throughout life you participated in a lot of shady business practices to make your millions so now you aim to ratify amendment to grant immunity to any presidentthat means changing the constitution of the united states by any means possible whether that persuading blackmailing bribing or bullying you will need to be ruthless in pursuit of your goal likewise you can also hire a group of assassins hackers lobbyists and other specialists to carry out your dirty work legally or illegally it up to youof course you still have to be the president which means holding speeches and press conferences drafting executive orders and dealing with crises as they arise and then you can also dabble in less important things such as incessantly tweeting whenever you get a spare momentthroughout the game you will make several choices that influence the story there are multiple branching storylines to uncover which could add some replay value to this is the presidentthis is the president will release on the app store and google play on may there is currently no word on pricing but given handygames previous mobile ports we can assume it will be premium

name: pocketgamer
header: Horizon Chase's latest DLC Golden Japan is now available, offering nine new tracks
content: today the everpopular racer horizon chase has received a new dlc called golden japan as you probably guessed from the title it introduces new tracks set in numerous cities across japan it available via the ingame store for or your local equivalent though during launch week you can snag it for offas mentioned the golden japan dlc brings nine new tracks to the world of horizon chase three of those will see players speeding around the streets of tokyo and another three are based in iya valley then players can enjoy two tracks in kyoto and the final course in sapporo the tracks appear to offer plenty of variety judging by the launch trailer which you can check out below there is everything from quirky cities to picturesque routesaside from the new tracks you will also find four new exclusive skins to unlock them you will need to beat your rivals on each new course on top of that there a brand new car up for grabs called the dj vu car it promises to be both quick around the track and easy to handle which sounds a tad overpowered on paper at leastif you unfamiliar with horizon chase it is a racer that draws inspiration from arcade games from the and it sports retrostyled graphics but looks to blend them with some modern sensibilities giving it a distinctive look compared to other offerings in the genre since launch the developers have released a few dlcs to bolster horizon chase roster of cars and trackshorizon chase is available now on the app store and google play it is a freetoplay game with inapp purchases

name: pocketgamer
header: Dadish 3, a sequel to the quirky pun-filled platformer, is heading for iOS and Android this June
content: today indie developer thomas k young has announced the third instalment in the dadish series it appropriately titled dadish and will be heading for ios and android on june alongside console and pc the series has proven popular enjoying over three million downloads across all platformsin dadish our radish father needs to save his children yet again they boarded a bus for a suspicious field trip and the titular dadish needs to rescue them before the worst happens his journey will see the lows of trawling through a stinking sewer to the potential highs of riding on a dolphin back he will also reunite with his exwife a tomato named momato because of course she is i feel like we should have known that all alongaside from confronting his past relationships and riding sea creatures dadish will also need to face various sentient food that wants to kill him they include ice creams cupcake snakes and grumpy bread among others there are also five bosses to defeat including a giant hot dog and floating candy floss you can check them out in the trailer aboveit boasts the same colourful aesthetic found in previous games alongside its main charm its irreverent humour in the previous instalments dadish offspring often spouted silly lines after being rescued which always provides a real treat after dodging enemies and sporadically placed floating sawsdadish will release on the app store and google play on june it also set to release for nintendo switch xbox playstation and pc while you wait you can always check out the original and dadish both are freetoplay with a single inapp purchase that removes adverts

name: pocketgamer
header: ZOZ: Final Hour opens pre-registration on Android in certain regions
content: the much anticipated thirdperson zombiethemed shooter zoz final hour is finally opening up preregistration in specific regions courtesy of netease zoz is a muchanticipated title that is going to launch in brazil and indonesia first before making its way to other areasafter a closed beta test launch in brazil last year many players in the region fell in love with the high octane intense and adrenalinefueled rush thats seen in the zombie shootemup gameplay it will see players take on the role of a nameless mercenary that makes their way to san yager a zombieinfested metropolis in search of a useful substance called blood crystalthis simple concept is turned on its head by the unique mechanic of the player character turning into the enemy on death and still being able to play that same character regardless this means that if you fail your mission objective of gathering information regarding blood crystal and get torn apart by a zombie youll turn into a zed yourself but youll have a new objective instead murder as many other mercs as you canof course this means youll need other mercenaries to murder but zoz has you covered here too after dropping into the multizone map alongside other players youll all share the same objective until one of you gets murdered and have to start hunting the others down this makes it quite a different mix compared to most of the genre contemporaries so this is a surefire hit with any zombie lovers out thereif youre looking to get involved you can preregister for zoz final hour ongoogle playwithin brazil and indonesia currently though both an apple port and more region localizations are on the way

name: pocketgamer
header: Watcher Chronicles is out now on mobile, letting players attempt to survive a souls-like interconnected purgatory
content: third sphere game studios has officially launched watcher chronicles its soulslike rpg for both ios and android devices the game features an interconnected purgatory players will have to power through to survive skeletal nightmares lurking in every cornerin watcher chronicles players can expect to take down relentless bosses with a local coop multiplayer mode that lets them play with a buddy to survive the merciless depths you have to upgrade your weapons or boost your magic and see if you got what it takes to defeat more than unique bosses there are over a hundred armour and rings to upgrade as well as a new game plus that will put hardcore players skills to the testaccording to the game official description purgatory has been invaded by an unholy threat a group of fallen ones called watchers now seek to transform it into a new hell lost souls must unite or face utter annihilation your penance has begunif you eager to give the game a go watcher chronicles is available to download on the ios app store and on the google play store for android devices the first area is free with a onetime purchase to access the full game it features full controller support as wellyou can also join the community of followers over on the official twitterpage to stay updated on all the latest developments or have a look at the embedded trailer above to get a feel of the game you can visit the official website for more info as wellare you on the hunt for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best free games to play on your iphone ipad or android phone in

name: pocketgamer
header: Top 25 best strategy games for iPhone and iPad (iOS)
content: we here to discuss the best strategy games for your iphone and ipad today and it was a surprisingly easy list to writemobile gaming is typically associated with quick light bitesized genres that you can consume between bus stops your matchthree puzzlers or your idle clickers but we all know that doing our beloved iphones a gross disservice don we there are loads of deep thoughtful games on the app storejust look at all the brilliant ios strategy games that are available on the platform some of these are direct ports of pc and console games with all the attendant depth and nuance that bringsbut even the many mobilespecific strategy games out there boast plenty of meat to get your teeth into or at least the best examples do and that where we come inso what are the best iphone and ipad strategy gameswhether you into turnbased tactics realtime strategy or some weird genre hybrid in between there something for you below so click below to find out what in our opinion are the best strategy games for your iphone or ipad

name: pocketgamer
header: How to get free gems in Clash of Clans
content: well as it turns out there are a lot of ways you can earn free gems in clash of clans if you are eager to learn more keep readinggems are the premium currency in clash of clans the currency you are expected to dish out hardearned cash in order to get more of them you can use gems to speed up anything thats timed really as well as purchase a bunch of different items from the shop recruit more builders and much more its a good currency to have but what if you dont want to spend actual money on gemsclear the landwhen you have trees rocks etc on your land you can pay coins to remove them you are then rewarded with free gems in clash of clans you can get up to gems for clearing a bit of land however the number you get is predetermined it follows a repeating pattern of you leave spaces on your land plants will regrow rocks will not allowing you to continue clearing them and gaining even more free gemscomplete achievements to get free gems in clash of clansas you play the game you will be working towards a bunch of achievements you can achieve these by basically just playing the game however it is worth taking a look at your achievements and working towards them if you find yourself in need of some quick gemscompleting missions unlocking troops upgrading your village can earn you free gems in clash of clans as long as you remember to go into your achievements and claim them achievements have three tiers to each one meaning you have lots of chances to get gemsunlock gem minesif you are looking for a passive way to gain clash of clan gems a gem mine is what you after you can unlock this extra camp by using the boat at the bottom of your initial village this boat will bring you to pvpfirst builder camp where you can play matches against others in combat as well as upgrade units and buildyou can remove the items here for free gems but there is also a building that has been destroyed called the gem mine you can rebuild and upgrade this mine to then get gems over time increasing the speed it takes to mine gems as wellsell your magic itemschances are if you are playing clash of clans you are in an active clan and often take part in the clan war leagues if your team is any good and able to win you will be getting a higher league medals tally which you can use to get more potions and boons for your villagethough these may be useful for your village you can also sell them especially if you have too many this is a choice you need to balance up based on your needs but if you do sell them you will get small amounts of gemsingame events often reward you with some free gemsmany of the events held in clash of clans give away rewards for doing challenges sometimes they might offer straight gems as a reward other times magic items that can be sold if you keep an eye on the events that are currently active you might just find yourself new ways to unlock gems or to help you get that gem boost that you been waiting for

name: pocketgamer
header: THE KING OF FIGHTERS ALLSTAR welcomes two new SS fighters and other events in latest update
content: netmarble has announced an exciting update for the king of fighters allstar welcoming two ss fighters new seasonal content and more into the mobile action title in particular the popular rpg adds ss terry bogard and ss blue mary along with their special battle cards which players can collect from now until february the king of fighters allstar players can expect to experience red elementattack type fighter ss terry bogard and his attackboosting abilities along with blue elementdefense type fighter ss blue mary in the latest update eager players who want to put their skills to the test can also challenge themselves in the wild furious rush dungeon and fatal fighter challenge dungeon or test their battle prowess in the time attack challenge and event codex mission until february addition the new update also adds a fighter buff celebration package sale that will run until february plus a guild boss challenge that will give away participation rewards clear rewards and ranking rewards a new battle pass is also available until february of course simply logging into the game until february will reward players with tons of ingame items as wellif you eager to join in on all the festivities you can download the king of fighters allstar on the ios app store or on the google play store for android devices it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases if you curious about what the update looks like you can have a look at the embedded clip above to get a feel of the new arrivals you can also visit the official facebookpage to stay updated on all the latest developmentsare you on the hunt for more adrenalinepumping games that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best action games for android phones and tablets

header: Top 10 best Android aRPGs
content: do you love slashing through actionpacked brawls dodging bullets or hunting for treasures while dungeon crawling sounds like the very best android arpgsin will be your bread and butterand as luck would have it if you looking for some of the best hack and slash or arpgs for android you in the right place we compiled a list of some of the most breathtaking actionpacked games to keep you company for hours to comeno matter if you prefer premium or freetoplay mobile games we got a selection of both to give you plenty of titles to scroll throughhack and slash more like bash everything and everyonehack slash games fall under the action roleplaying game arpg category but unlike your typical arpg experience in a hack slash you shift your attention mainly towards the fighting aspect of the gamesimply put arpgs are slightly more strategyheavy than hack and slash games but overall they both cut from the same rpg subgenre cloth so if you want to find android arpgs that perfectly fit all your needs let take a look at our list by clicking the big blue button below

name: pocketgamer
header: Final Fantasy VII: The First Soldier's latest event challenges players to defeat the fearsome boss monster, The Bahamut Sin
content: since its launch final fantasy vii the first soldier has seen a lot of events and collaborations players have been treated to numerous ingame events and been granted heaps of rewards in the form of skins items exclusive shinra pack tickets and much more the second season that launched at the end of february brought about many new features including a new beast called the bahamut this dragonlike beast was seen flying above the training field and with his descent a great battle would commence the latest addition to the battle royale is a stronger version of this monsteruntil may players will be able to encounter the bahamut sin the boss monster from final fantasy vii advent children the beast can be seen hovering over the training field in standard matches and when it has spotted a prey it will come down forming a force field covering a group of players damage between soldiers will be nullified and everyone will have to band together to defeat the bahamut sin rewards for defeating it include gil rare weapons and lots morebased on the number of times the bahamut sin is slain everyone will receive free shinra pack tickets after defeating it times everyone gets one ticket two tickets for defeats three for and four tickets for killing the bahamut times special shinra packs that contain a skin inspired by the bahamut sin will also be available until may it is available for shinra credits or five special shinra pack ticketsthats not all the rewards up for grabs though login rewards will also be given out allowing players to earn up to special shinra pack tickets the hologram bahamut sin emote moogle medals and more finally everyone looking for more rewards can take up the extradifficult bahamut sin challenges to earn more tickets and exclusive titlesready to defeat the beast then download final fantasy vii the first soldier for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: The King of Fighters ALLSTAR x Street Fighter collab reveals special moves for Ryu, Chun-Li and more
content: netmarble has launched a new update on the king of fighters allstar x street fighter collab event giving players more reasons to get into the action beat up game on mobile the special crossover with capcoms street fighter v franchise lets players experience iconic characters from the popular ip along with special events that give away cool ingame goodies to playersin the king of fighters allstar players can expect to join in on the dream match rush dungeon and guild raid events as well as access ryu chunli chunli nostalgia and luke in battlein particular these characters possess special skills such as atk boosts damage immnunity and more for ryu yellow elementattack type fighter his leader skill effect can enhance atk for all street fighter v characters by a maximum of while his special skill can boost atk by as well as add points to penetration when attacking foes for five seconds his street fighter v skill lets him boost atk by when the hp of the player is above the other hand chunli blue elementbalance type fighter possesses a leader skill effect that can boost atk by for balance type fighter her special skill renders the player immune to dmg when attacked which will last for four seconds with a cooldown of ten secondsyou can find out more about the other skills as well as the dream match pvp event street fighter battle card rush dungeon and more on the official website for now you can download the king of fighters allstar on the ios app store and on the google play store for android devices it a freetoplay game with inapp purchasesare you on the lookout for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best action games for iphone and ipad ios

name: pocketgamer
header: Catan: World Explorers is the latest AR game from Pokemon GO developer Niantic
content: catan world explorers is niantic fourth and likely far from final ar title it based on the hugely popular catan board game which tasks you with collecting resources to build towns cities and roads in an effort to accumulate the greatest number of victory pointsniantic is of course the creator of ingress pokemon go and harry potter wizards unite world explorers appears to rely on the same locationbased template as its predecessors though its focus is placed on harvesting trading and building as opposed to battleswhile you exploring the virtual recreation of your reallife surroundings you stumble upon resources such as brick lumber grain ore and wool some resources will be abundant in your area while others will be far rarerthis means that you often have to trade with npcs to get what you want as in the board game you also have a selection of development cards at your disposal with which to boost your progress and turn your basic towns into fullon citiesevery road and expansion will cost you precious resources so it perhaps wise to team up with other players to get the job done and compete as a sort of guild at both local and global levels if you rather just play with friends the option is there to create custom personal matches some of the rewards earned during a given season will carry over to future eventscatan world explorers is now open for preregistration over on its official site pocketgamerbiz points out that this is just one of games niantic has in development which include prototypes for ar wearables all of these upcoming releases are said to focus on social interaction being outdoors and movement

name: pocketgamer
header: The King of Fighters ALLSTAR teases Street Fighter collaboration event with a special website
content: netmarble has just dropped some exciting news for fighting game fans the king of fighters allstar will be joining forces with street fighter creating an epic mash of rowdy brawling on mobile preregistration will begin on march and eager fans can check out the roster of characters that will be revealed in the next few days on the teaser sitein the king of fighters allstar two legendary franchises in the genre collide as ryu chunli and more join the fray the mobile action roleplaying game is teaming up with capcom with a special street fighter collab eve coupon which you can check out over on the game official teaser sitemeanwhile players can also expect lots of new content in the next few weeks in particular the dispatch content rewards players with prizes as time elapses while the dream match pvp event pits fighters against each other regardless of the rank or specification players will also be able to grow their fave heroes with the new change up growth system plus the allstar archive lets you archive fighters to score an emblem with special abilitiesthere aren too many details about the collab event just yet but if you eager to give the game a go yourself you can download the king of fighters allstar on the google play store for android devices and on the ios app store it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases you can join the community of followers over on the official twitterpage to stay updated on all the latest developments as wellare you on the lookout for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of top best action games for iphone and ipad ios

name: pocketgamer
header: Final Fantasy VII: The First Soldier's collaboration with Crisis Core brings Zack and Tifa to the battle royale
content: last week final fantasy fans enjoyed a crossover between the popular battle royale final fantasy vii the fist soldier and final fantasy vii remake intergrade which featured popular characters from the latter like yuffie and sonon now the crossovers continue as ateam entertainment and square enix have brought in two more beloved characters from the franchisethis time around were dealing with a game that takes place before the events of final fantasy vii fans mustve guessed that im talking about crisis core a prequel set seven years prior to that pretty much gives away one of the characters that will be featured too and yes it is zack fair the protagonist of the game who now finds himself in the battle royale accompanying him is one of the most loved characters from the series tifa lockhartfinal fantasy vii the first soldier will feature class zack and guide tifa skins for a limited time players will find them in premium shinra packs that cost either shinra credits or premium shinra pack tickets the packs will also feature a banner for zack and the behemoth king gun skin these can be obtained until march crisis core crossover event will also reward everyone with login bonuses that include up to premium shinra pack tickets the head accessory guide tifa hat the banner bahamut fury a chocobo egg and more additionally crisis core challenges will allow players to earn more of the same rewards and the dragon decimator title available until march make things more challenging a stronger variant of the bahamut the bahamut fury will now frequent normal matches a red field of energy means a battle has begun and players must team up and defeat the beast instead of fighting one another as damage between players is negated the increased risk will provide even greater rewards including a tonne of gil and rare weaponsget your favourite skins by downloading final fantasy vii the first soldier for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: The King of Fighters ALLSTAR launches pre-registration for its Street Fighter V collaboration event
content: netmarble has finally opened preregistration signups for the king of fighters allstar special crossover event with capcoms street fighter v franchise the highly anticipated collab heats up the competition in the action beat up game as m bison akuma and luke join the frayin the king of fighters allstar muchawaited crossover event players can beef up their roster of fighters with iconic street fighter v characters apart from fanfave heroes ryu and chunli m bison akuma and luke will also join in on the madcap mayhem in addition to that eager fans who sign up for the preregistration event will score a ruby coupon plus the collab fighters summon ticketin case you need to hype yourself up some more the collab trailer embedded below showcases chunli fighting style and special moves in the game from the clip alone it does seem like the crossover is staying true to all of chunli iconic skillsare you ready to witness these two franchises collide in an epic clash of fists if you keen on joining in on all the festivities during the collab the king of fighters allstar is available to download on the google play store for android devices and the ios app store it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases with multilanguage support for english taiwanese indonesian thai spanish italian french portuguese russian and german you can join the community of followers on twitterto stay updated on all the latest developments or check out the official website for more info on the collab updates in store for youare you on the lookout for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best action games for android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: The King of Fighters ALLSTAR x Street Fighter V event is now live
content: netmarble and capcom have teamed up to launch a massive crossover between the popular mobile action rpg king of fighters allstar and street fighter v the latest update will allow players to choose characters from the beloved franchise and then participate in limitedtime events like dream match rush dungeon guild raid and moreplayers can expect to come across iconic characters like ryu chunli and luke chunli is available in the event summons in terms of abilities ryu massively boosts atk which also scales along with his hp he is a yellow element and attack type fighter chunli a blue element and balance type fighter increases atk and dmg up to a whopping with her special skill making players immune to damage for four seconds when attackedfinally luke another balance type yellow element fighter can increase his active skill cooldown while disabling the opponents for three seconds additionally he can boost critical dmg and atk these three icons are not the only street fighter v characters that will be added to king of fighters the coming days will further the nostalgia as beloved heroes like akuma and m bison will also make their way to the gamethere are also several crossover events including the dream match event which is a free for all match and anyone can join regardless of their rank core or buff the rush dungeon will reward players with special items like an enhancement hammer rubies and an eventexclusive sfv soul random box which can also be won by completing guild raids further players can expect minor events like login bonuses lucky chances minidungeon activities and more finally a new street fighter battle card has been added which boosts atk by active skill damage by and critical hit by your favourite street fighter v characters by downloading king of fighters allstar for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: Final Fantasy VII: The First Soldier is adding items from FF7R: Intergrade for a limited-time event
content: final fantasy vii remake intergrade received an overwhelming response and was widely successful on consoles and pc while mobile users cant enjoy the game itself theres now a chance to don skins of characters from the game as ateam entertainment and square enix have just announced the launch of new ffvii intergrade based items in their battle royale final fantasy vii the first soldier the festivities begin today and players can expect new skins rewards bonuses and lots more from this eventthe showstoppers of this event are skins of intergrades two popular heroes yuffie and sonon they can be obtained from premium shinra packs that cost shinra credits or ig premium shinra pack tickets there is a total of four character skins to collect two each for yuffie and sonon other items include the shuriken skin banners for the two heroes the materia arm roll emote and the funeral flowers helicopter skin all these items are available for a limited time until march at utcgetting handson the currency for purchasing the premium packs can be a task and to help players out square enix is also giving exclusive login bonuses to players that will include premium shinra pack tickets the yuffie headband accessory materia hunter yuffie banner a chocobo egg and much more everyone has until march to grab theseadditionally some challenges revolving around intergrade will also go live this week completing them will provide soldiers with bonus rewards such as premium shinra pack tickets the materia hunter title and multiple other goodies with all the challenges and free rewards players can earn a maximum of premium shinra pack tickets letting them purchase a minimum of premium shinra packs that will massively boost the opportunity of getting all the limitedtime items so make sure not to miss this chanceget your intergrade skins now by downloading final fantasy vii the first soldier for free on the app store and google play

name: pocketgamer
header: GameSir G4 Pro Controller review - "Jack of All Trades, Master of None"
content: we don see mobile controllers that work for a variety of devices often enough if you like me you already have dozens of controllers for console and pc in addition to a fair few mobile controllers and accessories and i have so many because there aren many controllers which do everything i need i need fight sticks for fighting games and i need gamecube controllers for super smash bros ultimate i need xbox controllers for my pc and xbox and of course i need playstation controllers for my pc and possibly too one day soon and that list ignores the pad i used on mobile over the yearsso when a controller comes along and promises to replace several of the gadgets i have to juggle i celebrate i love the idea of condensing everything i need from all of these controllers into a single device it almost as good as when respectable cameras started getting included in phones by default and the gamesir pro has waded into my life and has promised to replace my nintendo switch pro android pc and ios controllers but can it do everything it wants tothe gamesir pro is a very traditional controller upon first glance it would be easy to misidentify it as a thirdparty controller for nintendo switch or xbox but that also the point you would identify it as a console controller first the layout and the way the controller is shaped is built to be comfortable no matter what the purpose and it feels goodthe two ergonomic handles sit in your hands comfortably and are coated with a soft textured rubber if you ever held a controller with offset analogue sticks think xbox and switch then your thumbs will immediately fall into place and it feels good the controller has a nice premiumfeeling weight to it and is genuinely more comfortable than most thirdparty controllers you use for any console having said that the plastics do feel a bit cheap and the rubber coating for your hands mask that until you pay attentionfinally there a phone bracket mount that flips up from the centre of the controller which extends to the width of your phone ready to play xbox game pass apple arcade or perhaps even emulator titles the hole in the bracket acts as a convenient place to pry it open with your finger while it also neatly encloses the led home button when closedi get this one minor weird thing out of the way the home button on my controller is upside down inside the clear plastic button you can see the gamesir logo and in my controller it is upside down only frustrating once you actually put the gamesir logo to memory of course so maybe just don look if your controller has this defect with that out of the way it is very nice how the logo lights up between four different colours depending on whether you attempting to connect the controller to pc switch android or iosthe four face buttons are very cool they have a satisfying semisoft press and the coolest feature by far is the fact that they are magnetic you can use your fingernail to pry the buttons up from the left side and swap them around this doesn change the button placement in software very important to note though it does mean you can easily swap their positions depending on whether you playing on xbox game pass or nintendo switchthe analogue sticks are also great and while i not a massive fan of the shoulder and trigger buttons they do mimic what you would expect from a modern xbox controller two big issues do arise though first the dpad is mushy and bad i do not like this dpad i do not recommend using it in games second the share button is located underneath the flipup phone bracket meaning you can easily access it while playing nintendo switch unless you leave the bracket propped open while playing a bit sillythe controller has printed on the back the instructions for pairing the controller with each of the compatible devices you simply hold the home button in addition to one of the face buttons for two seconds and the home button will illuminate with the correct light on android pc and ios you connect through bluetooth and it really is that simplenintendo switch is a slightly different experience though and i encountered two significant problems that gave me cause for concern first is that i had issues pairing the controller once i had finally had the controller paired leaving the pairing screen on nintendo switch would cause the controller to turn off instantly i found a fix for this by simply navigating to a different menu after pairing instead of immediately closing the pairing screen odda second issue is regarding amiibo functionality this controller has none that not a problem at all but when playing splatoon suddenly the system flashed an error message about not being able to read amiibo something i had never seen before from that message onwards my controller was exhibiting a ridiculous amount of input delay literally unplayable as the twitter gamers would saythis happened while playing splatoon a game which does occasionally use amiibo features in this game i was also able to test the gyro controls and sensitivity which work fine but feel a bit loose and less responsive than an official nintendo switch pro controller while playing on a game with no amiibo function i did not see this message and the controller worked perfectly as intended this was all on the latest firmware for the device and we can hope the controller has additional firmware updates in the future to iron this out but as of right now i could recommend this as a secondary nintendo switch controller but not your primary way to playthis is broadly a good controller both for mobile gaming and sitting down at your pc or nintendo switch there are a few hiccups along the way such as nintendo switch errors and the mushy dpad but if you going to be playing xbox game pass on android the occasional apple arcade game the odd multiplayer title on pc and nintendo switch then this is going to be an excellent supplement to your setupif you want to play a few xbox game pass games on your mobile in addition to your console or enjoy multiplayer on nintendo switch or play whatever on any of these devices then this controller is compelling it not perfect but down to the sheer amount of compatibility you should consider it for your next controller

name: pocketgamer
header: Alchemist Code hosts collaboration event with popular anime series Danmachi
content: the massively popular mmorpg alchemist code developed by gumi inc announced a brand new ingame collaboration today tying in with the equally popular anime series danmachi is it wrong to try to pick up girls in a dungeon this event will allow players to summon various characters from the animation along with a login bonus as wellfirst up are the available heroes from the gacha pool weve got the main character bell cranel bell is of course the protagonist of danmachi and his abilities feature notable moves that he uses in the anime wielding his blade proudly next hestia the love interest of the series hestia wields magical abilities bestowed upon her by the goddess making her a mage should you add her into your party and last ais wallenstein think of ais as the secondary protagonist a blondehaired female knight that gracefully uses her rapier to combat her opponentsbeyond the gacha summons weve also got a login bonus event during the duration of this event if you log in daily you can get the following rewardsthere are also a few collaborationthemed quests for you to take on that will hand out various rewards ranging from upgrade materials to new titles to display on your profile most of these quests can be completed using the multiplayer function as well so hit up your guild and get ready to celebrate one of the most popular anime franchises out therewhether a fan of the anime or a newcomer whos interested in alchemist codes mmo gameplay if youre interested you can find the game for free on bothgoogle playand the app store as well

name: pocketgamer
header: BraZen Emperor XXX Elite Esports PC Gaming Chair review - "Great chair, bizarre name"
content: increasingly more people have begun working from home over the past two years whether that partially or fulltime we spending more time in our home office chairs than ever before and in a lot of cases they not up to scratcha sub seat might seem grand when it only used on the weekend or for a brief gaming session in the evening but for an extended period it becomes uncomfortable and is undoubtedly doing more than harm than goodbrazen emperor xxx elite esports is a luxurious choice for your back and behindso it might be time to invest in something a smidgen more premium your back will thank you on paper the brazen emperor xxx elite esports pc gaming chair sounds like a contender for your cash promising a luxurious and ergonomic sitting experience and it is don be fooled by its somewhat juvenile and needlessly verbose name it a grownup approach to a gaming chairthe world video game enthusiast population is getting older and so gaming chairs have grown with them no longer does every company offer a chair that looks like someone ripped a bucket seat straight out of a car and coated it in whatever shades of neon paint they can findbrazen emperor xxx elite esports design and comfortmy brazen emperor sports an understated design with a light blue trim that not hideously over the top yet it maintains a sense of fun that prevents it from resembling a stuffy office chair however an allblack variant is available if you believe chairs shouldn dare to have any personality whatsoeverit also incredibly comfortable once i got used to how it forces you to sit historically i have a habit of sitting in a host of weird ways that are likely illadvised but the brazen emperor made me sit correctly and my posture is better for itit comes with two mould pillows that are wellplaced to ensure good back support allowing me to work or game at my desk for multiple hours without discomfort or feeling the need to shuffle into a better position the padding in the seat base is also excellent preventing the dreaded numb bum that lesser chairs often provideit easy to assembleit relatively straightforward to assemble as well even for one person with another helping hand it would take no time at all but if you tackling it solo you can expect it to take anywhere from half an hour to an hour regardless it simple to put together and you won find that you need to rely on the instructions all that much since it a logical buildthe only real downside to the brazen emperor xxx elite esports pc gaming chair apart from its name taking an eternity to say is the armrests compared to the rest of the chair they are seriously lacking the material feels a little cheap and isn comfortable either even for a few minutes let alone hoursthey also supposed to be adjustable but changing the position becomes more of a battle than it should be for a relatively simple task in truth i would probably recommend just taking them off entirely or looking for some attachable arm pads to improve the comfort they provide

content: crash bandicoot on the run releases its jampacked fourth season with survival of the fastest today season sees the return of nitros oxide as crash and coco fight to save their lands in the latest update to kings popular endless runnernitros oxide crashes into season survival of the fastest with all the nitros oxides from the multiverse making crash bandicoot on the run a truly wild and wacky experience nitros oxide first appeared in crash team racing only this time hes transformed three worlds into his home planet gasmoxia players will need to best him and his henchmen as well as complete new missions every week to score precious trophies in the gamespin swipe and run through the new season as it features updated lands new minions plus exclusive rewards as well as themed sports day skins to make sure your cosmetics are on point you can also compete on the updated seasonal leaderboard plus earn valuable skins and goodies from completing the bandicoot passcrash bandicoot on the run is now available to download on the app store and on google play as a freetoplay game with inapp purchases in case youre not familiar with the game the endless runner lets you smash through the nefarious dr neo cortexs schemes as crash and coco to keep the peace between different dimensions you can compete in time trials do collection runs or build bases throughout the wumpa archipelagoto know more about the game and to stay updated on the latest developments you can check out the official websitelooking for endless runners you can take on forever have a look at our list of the top best autorunner games for android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: GameSir X2 Lightning Gaming Controller review - "A glimpse at the future of mobile controllers"
content: more and more controllercompatible games are launching on mobile every week what was once a minority of games is becoming a larger and larger segment of new releases due in no small part to xbox game pass and apple arcade gamesir lightning mobile gaming controller is perfectly positioned as a portable controller with passthrough power through its lightning connectorgamesir is stepping up their gamebefore we get into it too much over the past year we covered two other similar devices from gamesir their bluetooth and their typec controllers fundamentally the only differences are on how the phone connects up to the device lightning bluetooth or typec connection in the case of the gamesir lightning controller it a passthrough power lightning connection so that you can still charge your phone by plugging a cable into the underside of the unitthe passthrough power can be a lifesaver especially if you are running bluetooth earbuds for audio a lot of the games in xbox game pass as well as titles like genshin impact and select apple arcade games can be quite powerintensive and so being able to boost up your battery on the commute or when kicking back on the sofa does really prolong playtimegamesir lightning gaming designif you familiar with the series then you already understand the core of the design it a familiar interface layout with dual offset analogue sticks as well as a dpad and four face buttons you also got two bumpers and two shoulder triggers it be a very familiar layout if you played on a nintendo switch before but then it also a design we seen in other mobile controllers like the backbone kishi and mgx it the current standard for a reasoni have an issue with one of my thumbs and so did find the analogue sticks a little on the small side as their surface area is actually a little smaller more discrete than on the switch and its competitor but it makes up for that size in responsiveness after a very short period of adjustment it easy enough to get along withthe gamesir lightning is incredibly lightweight coming in much lighter than most phones and also lighter than standard console controllers this is incredibly important to the function of the device as it fits around your phone for play converting the way you play into something similar to a psp switch or game gear that said the combined weight of for example an iphone pro max and the is just over that of a nintendo switchthe backplate extends doubling its widthone area where the stands out from its competitors is how the backplate extends in this case the controller will double in width when you pull on it a springloaded central section will extend and then clamp down onto your phone that said unlike the bluetooth iteration there now the lightning connector to contend withi broken more of these over the years than any other type of connector mainly due to the thin exposed design of the head fitting gamesir solution for mishaps is to make the connector be able to pivot degrees outward of its resting place this is a great solution and means you can align the phone before you extend the base and drop it inin fact the only thing that could be a real issue here is that the connector is a fixed distance from the backplate if your phone is over a certain depth then you might not be able to connect it up it around away from the plate which works fine on most uncased phones however might not work on all of them out there that the main thing to check here before you pick one upgamesir lightning gaming controller review summaryaside from the connector height potentially being a concern it a really sturdy reliable and costeffective controller for playing mobile games hopefully future iterations will feature more traditional triggertype shoulder buttons as currently all four shoulder buttons have a simple bumper click but pressuresensitive shoulder buttons are not standard in mobile design game design and so it would almost be a vanity move to position it alongside console controllerscheaper than its nearest competitors and incredibly sturdy the gamesir lightning controller is almost an essential purchase for those who are putting lots of hours into mfi apple arcade or xbox game pass games it feels like they are on the threshold of cracking the mobile controller conundrum

name: pocketgamer
header: Final Fantasy VII: The First Soldier lets players go on an egg hunt and other Chocobo-themed events in latest update
content: fans of final fantasy vii the first soldier can now take part in an exciting egg hunt across the battle royale game this season with chocobo eggs exclusive items limitedtime event shop specials and more from now until april final fantasy vii the first soldier egg hunter event players can join in on the festivities as the caretakers at shinra chocobo farm give soldier candidates a treat this month there will be plenty of decorated eggs scattered throughout the field and whoever finds them will reap righteous rewardsmeanwhile players can execute special actions in specific areas while riding on a chocobo while you on your fluffy mount special monsters may also appear and reward you with items when defeated the grangalan summon materia and cactuar mimic materia can be up for grabs for exampleadditionally players can earn skins and emotes in the egg hunter challenges as well as an egg hunter cactuar skin in special shinra packs egg hunter which can be purchased with shinra credits and finally egg hunter login bonuses include egg hunter special shinra pack tickets gil shinra pack tickets and moreif you keen on joining in on the fun as well as experiencing other updates such as the increased chocobo stalls allowed for each player you can download final fantasy vii the first soldier on the ios app store or on the google play store for android devices it a freetoplay game with inapp purchases you can also visit the official website for more info or join the community of followers on twitterto stay updated on all the latest developmentsare you on the hunt for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of thebest battle royale games for android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: GameSir X2 Type-C Controller review - "Perfect for Xbox Game Pass"
content: microsoft xcloud and xbox game pass initiatives can only mean good things for the mobile gaming space mobile is finally being seen as a proper platform which you can use to play traditional aaa console titles and game streaming is a huge part of that sure if you don want game streaming then services like apple arcade are there to provide you a highquality and affordable subscription with access to hundreds of games built for mobile play and touch screens but only on android can you seamlessly enjoy the likes of destiny halo guardians yakuza kiwami and much morewe already seen the razer kishi an ideal mobile controller to slot your phone into that delivers a nintendo switchlike experience but at razer usual premium price if you don like the idea of paying nearly double the cost of a new console controller for a mobile pad you might not use as often then you in the market for something just as capable and a bit more affordable if that what you want then the gamesir typec mobile gaming controller is exactly what you looking forthe gamesir takes after the razer kishi in several ways both of the devices go for nintendo switchlike design where the controller slides open and you slot your android device inside giving you a traditional controller layout on the left and right sides of the device when i first slid it open i was afraid i was going to break it but after opening it up to insert a variety of fairly large devices it it has held together perfectly and most of my fears have gone awayi like the controller placement after playing with the nintendo switch and particularly the hori split pad pro this feels entirely natural despite how unusually long the device looks the offset sticks are objectively the correct choice and the red and blue highlights to the analogue sticks seem almost like a homage to the nintendo switch design choice that and of course the split dpad buttons which are exactly like those found on the joyconthe back of the device has a convex bump covered in rubber for your fingers to claw around while playing and it certainly a good choice the whole device manages to be compact enough to easily slide into a bag while also being robust enough to feel comfortable even while gaming for long periods of time not bad at alland a final note on the design the typec connector on the controller does move back and forth slightly so you won worry about snapping it while fitting your phone into the devicethis device is positioned at a fairly budget price and therefore it makes sense that not every aspect of the controller would necessarily feel premium in this case it is the incredibly clicky selection of buttons the shoulder and trigger buttons made a fairly loud audible click while the dozen face buttons make a softer more muffled click if i had to guess i say there a rubber membrane underneath the face buttons in addition to the face buttons and split dpad there are s g home and share buttons s and g are just start and select or whatever names modern systems are using for them now while the home and share buttons again take after the nintendo switch with the home button working as you expect and share taking a screenshot of your mobile devicethe buttons are acceptable if this were a controller that i intended to use for long periods of time regularly i wouldn be happy but i use xbox game pass on mobile the way it is often intended to be used as a nice alternative to playing games at home i will always be playing games at home more and while portable these buttons are all perfectly serviceable though if you using game streaming regularly you might want better than thisas a plus point though the sticks are pretty much faultless there are luckily not like the analogue sticks you find on the joycon but instead are much closer to a proper traditional controller they spring back perfectly feel perfectly smooth to move and i just can really find a complaint the surface area of the thumb grip is a bit small perhaps but i feel like i being pedantic by just saying thatbut possibly the strangest decision gamesir made here is copying the face button position of the nintendo switch with the button on the right side when this controller is so perfectly positioned for xbox game pass otherwise this feels like a very weird oversight while jumping from games on console to mobile i almost always became slightly disorientatedthe gamesir typec controller is one of the more affordable mobile controllers of its kind and still does everything just as well as the bigbudget competitors like the razer kishi it almost as compact looks stylish feels comfortable and plays games greatbut the buttons aren fantastic and the general build quality while comfortable does make me think that the device won last through multiple years of heavy playthe gamesir typec controller is perfect for what it is a budget mobile controller perfectly designed to enjoy streaming games on services like xbox game pass google stadia or the upcoming amazon luna it obviously not the premium choice but it doesn have to be this makes for an excellent option to play xbox game pass games in addition to any other controllersupported android title if you want a singlepurpose controller for your android phone this is it just don try to fit a tablet in it

name: pocketgamer
header: AndaSeat Mask 2 Gaming Desk review
content: when people think of andaseat they think of gaming chairs maybe they think of the partnerships they sprung up in esports or maybe even the history of the company which cut its teeth making race car chairs few would think of their range of desks which includes the andaseat mask gaming desk we reviewing todayit a sturdy thing and it clear that the designers have tried to follow the same design pillars that they did when designing chairs like their tpro series or dark demon the andaseat mask gaming desk feels sturdy features the almostobligatorygamer lights and also comes complete with a lot of extra features and finesse that you won find on other desks carbon steel tube structure for instance or a headphone hook a cable management tray and a cup holder toobut wait let take this back a step you might have a couple of questions i know that i certainly have and i writing the article firstly how do you review a desk and secondly whatis this doing on pocket gamer a site about mobile gaming well the answers are quite simple you can review anything it a reflection or viewing if you like of something in this review we discuss the durability and actual assembly of the andaseat mask maybe after that i review my review i hoping that it get top marksfor the second question oops maybe you caught us out however we previously reviewed board games computer chairs and more dipping into a desk one of which i certainly do most of my mobile gaming at due to covid isn too unworldly and i assure you that we won be starting to review bus journeys cars or bespoke yachts off the back of thisanyway back to the deskwith a feature list that includes a tray for cables a hook for hanging a set of headphones on and a cupholder the mask sounds like somebody kept ducttaping diy projects onto any old desk that not the case here though the integrated headphone hook is rigid and built to the legs the cup holder and wire management cage have dedicated screw holes carefully positioned so that they don cause issues in the leg spacethat said the latter two parts are unfortunately plastic rather than anything hardy and i actually ended up loosening the cup holder so that i could pivot it under the desk when it not in useassembly was easy with the main issue coming from wiring up the lights you need to feed a wire down the length of the desk without any guide elements i found this quite tricky because of how the wire had been stored in the box where it was folded back on itself many times it kept trying to double back while being fed through the desk other than this there were no issues with assembly although as with their chairs it a hefty thing so some people might require help for the lifting partsthe desk itself is a decent width a proper office desktop dimensionally it in size with the surface more than big enough to fit two screens and normal other desk toppers that said you want to consider where it goes in a room based on the lights and the light button you need space free for the righthand side so that you can access the buttonthe andaseat mask gaming desk can also hold which is the weight of a small tiger a panda or chicken eggs now i don have any of those laying around the house so i couldn confirm but i did jump on top of it at one point and it was totally fine the pocket gamer technology workshop at its bestat just under it much more expensive than the route of an ikeaargoswayfair desk however it stable and stylish of course there a line between style and garish and so the lights on the side might not be for everybody ignore that though and the sleek carbon fibre surface is quite appealing and it wearresistant to boot sometimes you pay for quality and sometimes you pay for a name the andaseat mask gaming desk is worth the price if it within your budget

name: pocketgamer
header: Oppo Find X3 Pro review - "Premium in more ways than one"
content: late last year i reviewed the oppo reno pro an elegant midrange android phone that didn quite come up with the gaming goodsthe oppo find pro sees the brand really cutting loose with a hefty price tag and a distinct lack of compromise on components can this stylish flagship stand up to our current favourite android phone theoneplus prodesign and specsin terms of design the oppo find pro is every inch the smartphone it one of the sleekest most attractive phones around with a distinctive tapering swoop to its shiny glass rear panel it fingerprinty but it sure is prettythe display matches the design with barely any bezels and dualcurved edges this is a amoled of the utmost quality capable of outputting at a qhd resolution and a refresh rate simultaneously it also gets really bright right up to nits when things get sunnyif all those stats sound familiar it because this is pretty much the same component as you find in the oneplus pro oppo and oneplus are owned by the same parent company bbk electronics and they often share componentsthe big focus of the oppo find pro is its camera unlike most of its rivals oppo has gone for a balanced setup with exactly same highend imx sensor for the ultrawide as there is behind the main wide lens this means that whether you shooting normal closeish snaps or sweeping vistas the shots will look similarly sharp and vibrant oppo is keen to point out that this is the first phone to both shoot and display up to billion coloursa mah battery is another spec shared with the oneplus as is the provision of wired charging wireless charging isn quite as rapid but is still more than enough all in all i could get through a long day with a third left in the tank but extended gaming will obviously eat into that some morecolor os isn the best android skin on the market though it very tweakable but a little cheaplooking and rather too busy for its own good oneplus oxygen os is generally faster slicker and easier on the eyegaming experience and performancethe oppo find pro packs the obligatory snapdragon cpu the goto chip for any android flagship with of ram as standard you have to pay extra for that in the oneplus pro it a truly excellent performer genshin impact pubg mobile and league of legends wild rift all look and move great on high settingsrather bafflingly the oppo find pro benches a little slower than the oneplus pro and other snapdragon phones in geekbench we talking a shortfall is the oneplus pro better optimised is the oppo being throttled slightly or is it just a software quirk whatever it runs current games brilliantlyi mentioned that the oppo find pro shares a display with the oneplus pro but there is one difference that will be pertinent for gamers the oneplus pro display has a touch sampling rate to the oppo this means that the oneplus screen is more responsive which could prove decisive in fastpaced competitive of storage as standard is nothing to be sniffed at though you be able to pile on the games without making a dent on the phone capacity even multigigabyte monstrosities like grid and the aforementioned genshin impactyou also get a decent set of stereo speakers which make games sound great even without hooking up a set of headphoneswrapping upthe oppo find pro is a brilliant flagship phone with top tier performance a gorgeous design and a brilliantly balanced camera systemgames look and move beautifully on its sharp rapid display and they ably driven by a fast processor and stacks of memoryhowever the simple fact is you can get an equally accomplished experience from the significantly cheaper oneplus pro which shares a number of key components in fact the oneplus pro arguably has the slight edge in gaming termsif you can get a good deal on the oppo or you like your phones to make a particular visual statement it won let you down but as things stand it feels like a somewhat overpriced choice for mobile gamers

name: pocketgamer
header: GameSir X2 Bluetooth Mobile Controller review - "Smart design and built for access"
content: as more and more time passes the differences between various gaming platforms decreases one major thing that does still separate them though is the input the way we control the devices the gamesir bluetooth mobile controller is the latest attempt at giving mobile phones the same responsiveness and interactivity as consoles and it a strong entry into the farfromfledgling categorydefinitely the right time forgamesir bluetoothit couldn really have happened at a better time either with services like xbox game pass via xcloud google stadia and apple arcade bringing more and more controllercompatible games to mobile devices we finally reaching a point where mobile controllers might well become widely accepted rather than remaining an outlier this move to accessible controllers has also been expedited by nintendo persistence in the handheld realm as well as the rise of crossplatform gamingin fact the nintendo switch influence can be seen in a lot of the recent mobile controller innovations the razor kishi seen by most as the premier mobile controller backbone one flydigi wee and the gamesir all closely resemble nintendo current sweetheart and why not it familiar the stick layout is ergonomic and everybody is used to the four shoulder button layoutso with that said the gamersir bluetooth mobile controller is almost certainly one of the most accessible controllers out there for mobile it got a familiar design it fits most phones up to in length it runs on bluetooth rather than a fixed connector and it doesn require a companion app to run that also means that it works on both iphones and android phoneseasy to set up and playthat a major strength its biggest rival the kishi requires a separate app and has a connector on the inside of the peripheral that plugs into the phone meaning that you need a phonecompatible device there none of that here if your phone has bluetooth then this links upthat means that it playing alongside the dualshock and xbox wireless controllers when it comes to accessibility however the gamesir has something over both of those thanks to how it holds onto the device you pull on it to extend it open and release for it to pinch onto the phonethat might not sound like much but consider that half of the mobile controller industry thinks that the mobile phone screen should simply become a screen rigidly held above the controller in a plastic maw and that the dualshock and xbox wireless controllers don mount onto the phone in any way you might be starting to see the advantage herethe pivot to bluetooth for this iteration of the gamesir does come at some cost the other versions of it which do plug into the phone do passthrough power and that fitting does give an extra surplus frankly layer of security to how the phone is held but the flexibility of the bluetooth design definitely outweighs the lost featuresthe gamesir bluetooth minor flawsthere are some negatives however the shoulder buttons are simple shallow click buttons they responsive which is great but there are no sensitivity options on them which means they don replace the from most modern controllers in that regardthe layout of the right side of the peripheral is also trickier than alternatives because the analogue stick default fitting is raised rather than dimpled thankfully there are extra stick caps included which alleviate thisthat said the smaller stick makes it feel much more responsive as though it has a wider movement arc which feels fantastic that one of a few clever design choices which also include the design leaving space to air cool the phone that makes it stand out the keymapping is also pretty easy to use perfect if you decide to remap for running an emulator

name: pocketgamer
header: Pebble Gear 7" Kids Tablet review - "A tablet built with child safety in mind from the ground up"
content: whether we parents like it or not the internet is everywhere and the technology that gives us and our children access to it is becoming more and more affordable and more and more accessible long gone are the years where people could easily decide to keep their kids away from electronics not least because the technology is starting to play a key part in education too all three of my children whether i wanted them to or not i do would have been introduced to computers and the internet as a research and entertainment tool by their teachers before they reached five years of ageso the question then comes is there a safe way that children can be given this technology in a safe monitored manner there definitely been a lot of attempts hatch kids is a subscription service of children games there are plenty of mode apps for phones and there are numerous versions of parental guidance systems out there one solution is pebble gear range of kids tabletsthe tablets are available in a variety of designs each one a twist on the same os preloaded with a few characterthemed apps and ui elements each tablet is which includes a year subscription to its controlled app ecosystem and they come in a variety of types a recent wave included toy story and frozen while the new wave of tablets includes mickey and friends or disney cars brandinga controlled app ecosystem for kidspebble gear solution to the app store is to cultivate its own the game store junior it an app store with over apps on it that includes games books videos and a lot of education apps is a lot and it definitely shows when you navigate the store although there are some decent category separations and i do like that the american reading age categorisations are included when it comes to the books it can be a little overwhelming as with any app storethe educational games include the entire pango catalogue as well as quite a few other titles however as we been downloading education games for a while the selection definitely felt somewhat limited and geared toward younger users apps built toward learning abcs or drawing the dot stand out among the learning selection which is fantastic for younger kids perhaps younger than my own and the reading options are great but something does feel lacking when compared to a regular app storebut this isn about that the pebble gear is clearly designed to allow kids to have a little bit of autonomy and a safe area to exist if you keep the parental options loosekids will naturally gravitate to the games play section and that where the pebble gear included subscription for their app store comes into its own from pacman kart rally through evoland to cut the rope and stopping off with the asterix garfield and doodle jump ips there is a surprising amount of premium and adfree versions of popular games here i mean syberia burly men at sea and tengami are here too smaller sweethearts that they are also there are games from my youth or even from before my time like little big adventure and the gobliiins games they there too it a phenomenal selection of games and if they are indeed adding new games every month then that amazingthere
