name: pocketgamer
header: Isle of Arrows combines tower defence, tile placement and roguelike gameplay, coming to mobile and Steam this summer
content: daniel lutz aka gridpop has announced the upcoming game isle of arrows his tower defenceslashboard game with roguelike elements on mobile coming to ios android and steam this summer the unique title tasks players with placing random tiles as their defences on a piece of land that keeps growingsolo indie dev daniel luts previously worked as a creative director with square enix montreal with hitman go and lara croft go under his belt isle of arrows features randomly generated tiles foes events and rewards with different game modifiers and modes to keep things interesting each playthrough is unique with tons of replayability as wellplayers will have to unleash their inner tactician as they construct their impenetrable fortress one tile at a time they can construct buildings and build roads to protect themselves against waves of enemies with different challenges that spice up each new runin particular building towers can attack enemies while flags can help extend your isle for extra space you can reap coins as rewards when you build gardens while building taverns can enhance your adjacent archery towers there are over tiles more than bonus cards and four different guilds for players to tinker around with as wellif you curious to know more about this oneofakind title you can check out the game on steamto add it to your wishlist for now more information on isle of arrows is also available on the official website you can have a look at the embedded clip above to get a feel of the game visuals concept and gameplay as wellare you on the hunt for more similar titles that will put your skills to the test on your mobile device why not take a gander at our list of the top best tower defence games for android phones and tablets

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Akali Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift akali guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the akali guide belowakali one of the proplayer favorite champions if you watched league of legends championships you have seen her more than a few times if she not banned and for good reason she is strong has a lot of potential and is able to snowball games like nobody else cantoday we are going to cover the complete wild rift akali guide for beginners so you know exactly what to expect from this champion and how to better understand and use her kitdealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them exiting that ring empowers akali next auto attack with bonus range and damageakali throws out five kunai dealing damage based on her bonus attack damage and ability power and slowing at maximum rangeakali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains movement speed and restores energy while inside the shroud akali becomes invisible though attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal herakali flips backwards and fires a shuriken forward dealing magic damage the first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked recasting dashes to the marked target dealing additional damageakali leaps in a direction damaging enemies she strikes recasting dashes in a direction executing all enemies she strikesthere are quite a few things to cover so brace yourselfthe beauty of playing akali is that her kit offers a lot of skill expression with that being said there no standard skill rotation per se but many little combos that you should know about every matchup is different and every team fight puts you in a different situation the more you know about her mechanics the easier it will be for you to decide which of her combos should be used in any scenarioshe a very versatile champion and can be played either on baron or mid lane furthermore there are more than a few ways to itemize her here we will be focusing on the standard ability power ap assasin build regardless of the way you chose to itemize her though her mechanics remain the same so let have a look at some very basic akali combos that will help you start playing this championit very important to learn her skill maximum range hitting an enemy with an ability will proc her passive assasin mark a ring will spawn around the marked target and every time akali steps out of it she will gain extra damage on her next auto attack aa and will double her range so a very basic concept is to hit a max range skill which will put akali right on the edge of the ring making it very easy to walk out of it and then go in for an aaanother way to do this fast is by using skill in succession right after you cast skill if you start the combo close to skill maximum range then skill mechanics will put her outside of the ring and empower her next aa recast skill to proc electrocute and deal more damage with an aaif the terrain won allow skill to form its regular circle then it will spread in different shapes filling the space depending on the terrainafter you recast skill you can cast skill ultimate in midair that will allow you to travel further and faster reaching the enemy backline with ease for a few quick easy kills on their squishy membersyou can use skill on a minion as you move in a different direction if your enemy chooses to follow after you recast skill to get away safely this combo is so simple yet leaves no good choices to be made by your opponentif you have trouble hitting skill use the invisibility provided by skill it very hard for your opponent to dodge if they don know where your attack is coming fromand now that we got the bigger stuff out of the way it time for some very basic combos that you can put together depending on the situationtypical akali oneshot comboin what order to level up the skillson akali you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally your skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsignite ignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by it comes to boots on akali you have one of two great choices gluttonous greaves or ionian boots of lucidity the gluttonous pick is great if you want more spell vamp lifesteal because one good combo could fill your entire hp bar as for ionian boots they good if you need more cooldown reductionis akali currently in meta our tier list might help you check

name: pocketgamer
header: Bloons TD 6 tier list - The best heroes ranked
content: in this article we will give you a bloons td tier list of all the heroes currently available in the game based on their overall performance in different situationsthe bloons are back the latest game of the popular bloons tower defense series bloons td is available for android and ios devices you will need to come up with a flawless defense combining monkey towers upgrades heroes and abilities before blasting every bloon that comes your waygameplaythe goal in bloons td is to prevent the bloons from getting away by reaching the exits how do you do that well you need to build your defenses with a series of monkey towers as you earn money by popping bloons you can then use that money to upgrade your towers or build new onesif you are familiar with bloons td series the first thing youll notice is that the game uses graphics unlike the older iterations plus there are new game mechanics such as new bloons heroes and upgradesheroesheroes are essentially towers with unique attacks and abilities that players can activate compared to normal towers players can only pick one hero out of the twelve currently available per game there are two ways to level them up either by earning exp or using ingame currency the maximum level they can reach is and depending on that level heroes unlock new abilitiesif you are interested in similar content take a look at thewar of the visions tier listlast cloudia tier list mobile legends tier list of best heroesand many others on our websitewithout any further ado lets get right into the bloons td tier list

header: LoL: Wild Rift Fiora Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift fiora guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the fiora guide belowthat might not sound like a big deal at first but once you get into the actual game it all make sense she is that difficult for a reason and that reason is that in wild rift fiora is a beast she is outmatched in duels after all she is a duelist and a pretty good engage champion during team fights of course that is if she can land her combo and ultimate on a key targetfiora challenges nearby enemy champions to dodge her she calls out a direction from which she will try to strike if she can complete her own challenge she receives a small bonus and calls out a new directionfiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy dealing physical damage and applying onhit effectsfiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time then stabs in a direction this stab slows the first enemy champion hit or stuns them if fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this abilityfiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks the first attack slows the target and the second attack will critically strikefiora reveals all four vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them if fiora hits all vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few secondshow to combo as fiorasince most of her skills rely on her hitting the enemy vitals that how the passive stacks are called you need to use skill accordingly in every situation you can almost never just aimlessly start hitting an opponent and wish for the best result that most likely not going to happenas for the actual combos they are all situational we list a few below but you mostly discover them all as you play fiora yourselfthis combo is your main ultimate combo when you need to hit all vitals of your opponent you most likely end up using flash to reposition yourself that perfectly fine since every kill will only make fiora strongerthis will be your main trading combo it proc all of your skills and you can use it as soon as level in the laning phase it simple it effective and it hits the mark literallythis combo will reset your autoattack if used in quick succession it also work great at trading with your enemiesthis combo is quite difficult but it works great against pretty immobile targets to proc the vitals and activate your ultimate effect all you need to do is cast the ultimate then cast skill in between vitals you then autoattack the second vital and walk to the opposite side to autoattack the third one finally you use skill to hit the fourth vitalin what order to level up the skillsfor fiora you want to max your skill first then continue by levelling skill and finally skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by rift fiora the best itemsbootsgluttonous greavesis going to be your main choice of boots because it help with sustain in case the opponent has too much crowd control go for mercury treadsthe best choice of enchant is quicksilver enchant to remove all crowd controls otherwise stasis or even teleportif you would like to examine if fiora is currently in meta take a look at ourwild rift tier list and if you are interested in other champion builds and not only wild rift fiora check our guides for ashe akali ahriand every other character from the game

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Pantheon Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift pantheon guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the pantheon guide belowpantheon the aspect of war is the next champion on our list he is a truly strong laner or support who can be played in pretty much any lane as long as you know what you doing he can be a baron laner a mid laner or a support and that just goes to show his versatility if you want a champion with the ability to travel across the map inflict crowd control and mitigate a lot of damage then he is definitely the one for youif you plan on giving pantheon a try i highly suggest you play him in practice mode several times because he is not an easy champion to master you need to learn exactly how his damage works with his empowered abilities and what type of damage you can mitigate with his skill as well as how to position well when casting it however if you put the time into learning pantheon he is going to be an extremely rewarding championevery spells or attacks pantheon next basic spell is empoweredpantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen directionpantheon dashes to a target damaging and stunning thempantheon sets his shield becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spearpantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air landing at a chosen location as a comethow to combo as pantheonbecause of the type of champion he is pantheon has a lot of comboshe can empower his basic abilities every charges by using another ability or autoattackbased on this alone you can probably imagine that there going to be a plethora of combos you can pull off depending on the situation you want to empower either your skill for poking or more damage or skill for the invincibility and damage but let take a more indepth look at all of his abilities belowwith this ability empowered he will deal more physical damage and also slow enemies movement speed it a great skill to max out if you want to use a lethality build to poke enemiesthis is the pointandclick ability that stuns enemies for a second when you empower it you will also follow up with an attack that strikes times for some more physical damagethis skill will make pantheon pretty much invincible for a short duration allowing him to dive turrets and mitigate some of the incoming damage when you empower this ability he will be able to block for a longer period and also deal a lot more aoe damagethis sums up his abilities so now let take a look at how you can combo them keep in mind that it all depends on the situation and there is no better choice for an empowered ability although one of the best would be the empowered skill especially during team fightsthis is a combo that works well when diving the enemy team your ultimate also resets your stacks so it good to start off with an empowered skill and finish off with another empowered skill combo is ideal for locking down an opponent and unleashing all of pantheon damage upon them it works great when you want to gank a single lane or take isolated enemies by surprisethis is the fastest combo for charging up your empowered skill which you will use when poking enemiesthis is one of the easy combos you can pull off to deal a lot of damage upon a stunned enemythis is another combo you can use to trade with your laning opponent it is easy to pull off and takes advantage of the ability to block some of the damage you otherwise take by using skill this will win you a lot of trades in lanein what order to level up the skillsfor pantheon you want to max your skill first then continue by levelling skill and finally skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by are a lot of viable builds for pantheon depending on the role where you play him generally these would be the ideal pantheon itemsbootsglory is a great choice if you want to chase down opponents because it gives you a boost of movement speedif you would like to examine if pantheon is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Seraphine Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift seraphine guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the seraphine guide belowseraphine the starryeyed songstress is the next wild rift champion we will cover seraphine kit makes it so that she can be played both as a mid laner mage or aggressive support because she simply that awesomeif you would you could even consider her a sona basically her skills are extremely similar to sona except she has a lot more crowd control and a lot less healing as for damage depending on the build she can be a beast quite literallyalthough seraphine is quite squishy has a very low def and not a lot of hp when she surrounded by teammates she can provide a lot in terms of damage support and sustain i would recommend her for a complete beginner as long as you play a couple of games beforehand to get used to her rangeevery third ability cast will echo casting it again casting seraphine abilities grant a note to nearby allies for each note seraphine next basic attack gains attack range and bonus damageseraphine deals damage in an area increased by enemies missing healthseraphine shields all nearly ally champions and grants them movement speed if seraphine is already shielded nearby allies are healed increasing for each allyseraphine deals damage and slows enemies if the enemy is already slowed they are rooted instead if they are already rooted they are stunned insteadseraphine deals damage in a line charming and slowing enemies encore extends if it touches an ally or enemy championhow to combo as seraphine in wild riftyou could say that seraphine has quite a few combos having played her for quite a bit i gotten familiar with most of them but i really suggest that you practice her beforehand the reasoning behind that is that it not always easy to land her full combo since the area can be quite difficult to pinpoint all the timealso since she has good synergy with other allies that slow or immobilize enemy champions you need to know when to actually cast her skill and whether or not you need it empoweredthis combo is the best for supports or in team fights but it also the longest one the shield cooldown is the longest out of all three skills so you should always use it only when necessary and not to proc the passive also never use the shield as a random skill for charging the doublecast it almost never worth itthe cooldown of skill is fairly low so you can use it twice in fairly quick succession for the doublecastthis is one of the very few times when you can start your combo with skill because if you aiming for doublecast skill you aim to root or stun the enemies therefore chances are you won need a shield right away to mitigate damage and you have it right back in about secondsthis is not a superdupercombo per se but rather a skill cast that will be useful in most situations the first skill cast will slow the enemies down while the second one will root them for a second while they rooted you can then quickly use skill to poke them in the lanethis combo if you start it at stacks will doublecast skill and root them in place you can then use your ultimate skill to charm the enemies this combo is extremely useful in team fightsif you looking for a flashy skill combo that features the element of surprise you can maximize it by using flash in front of the enemies then quickly stun them by using skill and lastly use skill for additional damage if you want to you can even autoattack an enemy to proc the passive notes for extra damagein what order to level up the skillsfor seraphine depending on how you plan on playing her you want to level up her skills as follows for support seraphinelevel skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possible for mage seraphinelevel skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblewild rift seraphine the best summoner spellsexhaustexhausts the target enemy champion reducing their movement speed by and their damage dealt by for secondsorionian stasis is the boot you want in case the enemy has a lot of allins or assassins that can oneshot seraphineionian redemptionis the usual choice since it provides area aoe heal for all allies and a little damage to the enemies caught insideionian shadows is a great choice that can work well in most situations since it slows down enemies which seraphine can then root with her skill how high seraphine ranks on our tier list

header: LoL: Wild Rift Irelia Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift irelia guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the irelia guide belowas for the actual playstyle irelia is an allin fighter champion pretty similar to riven in a lot of ways but with a lot more burst damage when fully stacked of course she not as bursty as an assassin but she still up there in terms of damage only a lot tankierwhen irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus attack speed at maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hitirelia dashes forward to strike her target healing herself if the target is marked or dies to bladesurge its cooldown refreshesirelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges she takes reduced physical damage during the chargeirelia sends out two blades that converge on each other enemies caught in between are damaged stunned and markedirelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion enemies hit by the blades are damaged and marked afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through ithow to combo as ireliawhile all of irelia combos are situational one of them is a staple in her kit and that her skill reset use that in combination with her other skills in order to land a powerful combo and your opponents even in situationson irelia if you manage to kill an opponent using your skill its cooldown will reset use that to your advantage and when farming minions to get every single one of them the irelia allin combowith this skill iteration you can easily go in and lock an enemy into your ultimate then stun them it quite an extended combo as well and it will take a little while to master however it will almost guarantee you win in most situationsthis combo takes advantage of the time it takes between your first cast of skill and the second cast and by using skill and clever movements you can reposition yourself in such a way that it stun your opponent when they least expect itin what order to level up the skillsfor irelia you want to max your skill first then continue by levelling skill and finally skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by rift irelia the best itemsbootsgluttonous greavesis going to be your main choice of boots since irelia can use all the physical vamp she can get on some rare occasions where the opponent has a lot of crowd control in that case you can also go for mercury treadsas for the enchant your best bet is quicksilver enchant to remove all crowd controls otherwise stasis or even teleportif you would like to examine if irelia is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Darius Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift darius guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the darius guide beloweven if you are a new player to wild rift there a good chance that you seen highlights of a champion running around the rift and dunking on everyone well that darius the hand of noxus a baron laner fighter with the potential to solo carry a gamea king of the top lane darius is a powerful and extremely versatile fighter who in the hands of a knowledgeable player has the ability to get pentakills galore no i am not kidding i am just stating facts with his kit massively boosted he basically gets an ultimate reset every kill more or lessattacking causes enemies to bleed and can stack up to times upon reaching stacks darius attacks apply the full stacksdarius swings his axe dealing damage to enemies around him healing himself and applying hemorrhagedarius empowers his next basic attack and slows the enemypassively gains armor penetration and if used as an active skill pulls the enemies in front of him and slows themdarius leaps to execute a champion dealing true damage and additional damage based on the stacks of hemorrhage an enemy has killing an opponent with noxian guillotine resets its cooldown completelyhow to combo as dariusthe ideal way to start your combo is as followsthat way you will be able to apply stacks of hemorrhage if your opponent tries to dash away use your skill pull them close then follow with another autoattackbut because not all of your opponents will be in your auto attack range sometimes you will have to start your skill rotation like this what you want to do basically is put stacks of hemorrhage to your opponent and gain noxian might in the most efficient wayif you want to take the enemy by surprise you will use the previous combo but preceded by flashjust make sure you remember the following once you kill someone with hemorrhage you will apply full stacks on the targets if and only if you kill someone with the ultimate its cooldown will be resetin what order to level up the skillsfor darius you want to add points in skill first because it will reduce its cooldown and give you penetration but afterward you want to move on to max out skill then continue leveling skill then skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsghost gain a large boost of movement speed that decays to bonus movement speed for secondsif you are very confident in your darius skills you could skip black cleaver altogether and go for trinity force also if you ahead you could try going forguardian angel instead of spirit visagewhen it comes to boots it really important that you pay attention to the matchup if the enemy has a lot of physical damage then you want ninja tabis if the opponent has a lot of crowd control you want mercury threads otherwise boots of swiftness can be a good choice since they make darius more mobileif you would like to examine if darius is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Garen Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: garen will be the star of today wild rift guide so if you were looking for a champion that will let you stomp your enemies in style and spin over their dead bodies chances are you found it the might of demacia is one of the easiest most fun champions out there who can reallythis champion is ideal in most situations because he fairly strong in scenarios has a lot of sustain thanks to his passive and skill and can deal quite a lot of damage if you build him like a fighter instead of a tank i really believe that garen can carry a team by being useful in team fights being able to split push to an extent and having the ability to deal plenty of damage to objectivesin this league of legends wild rift garen guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the garen guide belowyou are probably wondering if garen is a meta champion this is your lucky day we made a wild rift tier list to assist youif garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities he regenerates a percentage of his total health each secondgaren gains a burst of movement speed breaking free of all slows affecting him his next attack strikes a vital area of his foe dealing bonus damage and silencing themgaren reduces damage taken for a short time and gains bonus resistance to crowd controlgaren rapidly spins his sword around his body dealing physical damage to nearby enemies enemies hit by the bladestorm edge are critically struckgaren calls upon the might of demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion dealing damage in an area around his targethow to combo as garengaren has no particular combos but his skill can reset his autoattack cooldown so you can try to use that to your advantage his kit is pretty easy to understand and execute because garen has no skillshots that require aimingsome powerful combos that are not exactly combos per se would bethat combo will allow you to chase opponents with skill and because of the silence effect from skill chances are they won be able to get away and they die you could also use flash to catch unexpecting opponents then hit them with skill and quickly shift into skill for more damagein what order to level up the skillsin wild rift garen typical skill maxing order is skill then skill and finally skill however if the situation requires and you too far behind you could max skill for additional defense as your second skill after skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill then on skill or if you are behind and need a little bit more sustain during the laning phase or fights even you could max out skill after skill add a point to skill ultimate whenever it availablewild rift garen the best summoner spellsignite ignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by garen you could pretty much build anything ad fighter items crit maybe even ap i honestly don know because i haven tried that however this would be somewhat of an allrounded build which gives both decent damage and sustainability in fightsif you want you could try to swap out some of the items for more damageheavy ones but i really believe garen is at his best when he got a rather tanky build onthe gloryenchantmentis the best choice because it allows garen to chase and lockdown enemies much easieradditionally you could switch between boots of swiftnessmercury threads or ninja tabisas the base depending on what your opponents are playing and what you need the most magic resistance or armorif you are interested in other champion builds and not only wild rift garen check our guides for miss fortune master yi malphiteand every other character from the game

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Malphite Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: wild rift malphite also known as the rock no not dwayne rock johnson just a rock is a champion that super fun to play and can go either in the top lane baron lane or as a support malphite is quite tanky at his core but some people could also play him as a mage and build apon a good day malphite is very easy to play and not too difficult to get ahead with however if there are many champions that counter him on the opposing team he could prove to be quite difficult to come back nonetheless he can provide much utility to any team and act as an engage tank in most situations he can also combo very well with yasuo who greatly benefits from malphite ultimatein this league of legends wild rift malphite guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the malphite guide belowmalphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to of his maximum health if malphite has not been hit for seconds this effect rechargesusing his primal elemental magic malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe dealing damage upon impact and stealing movement speed for secondsmalphite passively gains armor when malphite activates thunderclap he attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom for the next few seconds his attacks create aftershocks in front of himmalphite slams the ground sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his armor as damage and reduces the attack speed of enemies for a short durationmalphite ferociously charges to a location damaging enemies and knocking them into the airhow to combo as malphitethe combos you could pull off as malphite are not that many but they are highly impactful if you build full ap you could probably oneshot some marksmen or squishy targets but if you won manage to do so he will be dead fairly fastif you build malphite as a tank then your combos will do less damage but you be able to survive and have a much greater impact in team fightsthat combo works great with ap since with skill you can pretty much finish off enemies that could try to flash out after your combowhen you cast flash and then quickly use skill you can travel a greater distance and pop up unexpectedly also keep in mind that you can use your ultimate to jump over a wallthis combo will probably do the most damage since it built around malphite slow and crowd control effects and an additional tip with skill you can reset your autoattackin what order to level up the skillsfor a tank malphite you want to max out his skill first then skill and lastly skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill ap malphite you want to focus on skill then on skill and finally on skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill rift malphite the best summoner spellsignite ignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by tank malphite should get items depending on what the enemies on the opposite side are if the opponent team is heavy adfocused you might want to build thornmail and other armor items if they have ap even spirit visage could work along with warmogthe best items for ap malphitefor a tank malphite your best choice is either mercury threads if the enemy has a lot of magic damage or ninja tabis with the teleport enchantmentfor ap malphite you could get swift stasis or ionian stasis because it will help keep you alive the moment you dive into the enemy teamis malphite currently a meta champion you can always consult our wild rift tier list and check

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Teemo Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift teemo guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the teemo guide belowteemo is the next wild rift hero we going to tackle and he is by far one of the most beloved and hated at the same time champions in runeterrathis little yordle has a fairly simple kit but the devil hides in plain sight right and that exactly the case for this guy and he even has a skin based on that little devil teemohe can inflict powerful damage over time dot slow and blind the opponents and to top it all off he also very swift although he not a tanky champion he is played in the top lane as a counter to typical fighters like garen and dariusif teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration he becomes invisible indefinitely if he in brush teemo can enter and maintain his invisibility while moving after leaving invisibility teemo gains the element of surprise increasing his attack speed for secondsobscures an enemy vision with a powerful venom dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the durationteemo scampers around passively increasing his movement speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret teemo can sprint to gain bonus movement speed that isn stopped by being struck for a short timeeach of teemo attacks will poison the target dealing damage on impact and each second after for secondsteemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack if an enemy steps on the trap it will release a poisonous cloud slowing enemies and damaging them over time if teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce gaining additional rangehow to combo as teemo in wild riftteemo is a fairly easy to play champion and he has no specific combos that you will have to pull off the one thing that comes anywhere close to a combo is the fact that his skill resets his autoattacks which also apply poison which is proc by his skill nothing too crazy to pull off i sayhowever you want to make the most out of his other two major elements in his kit invisibility and mushroomsteemo passive allows him to go invisible after standing still for a few seconds however if he is in a brush he will be able to move freely in that brush while being invisible that allows for powerful surprise attacks on otherwise unexpecting enemies as omega squad teemo would say become one with the jungleteemo can bounce his mushrooms skill if he casts it against another mushroom sending it further away he can basically place them everywhere around the map granting him vision every time an opponent steps on it his mushrooms can act as wards but they will also do plenty of damagein what order to level up the skillsfor teemo it pretty much depends on the matchup but generally you want to level up the skills in the following orderlevel skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spells for teemoigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by forget to check on our wild rift tier list in case you want to check what champions are currently in meta

name: pocketgamer
header: Top 25 best iOS RPGs for iPhone and iPad
content: updated on february entries added updated with download linksas far as mobile gaming has come over the past decade we still don naturally associate the roleplaying genre with portable play however this list of best ios rpgs for iphones and ipad is so vast now that we could probably make it double and some of the impressive games would still be left outroleplaying games as they more commonly known are typically seen as the preserve of console and pc gamers with run times and labyrinthine combat systems it not hard to see whybut there are a couple of factors in the mobile rpg boom one thing is simply the capabilities of modern smartphones with laptoplevel processing power and larger sharper displays your modern flagship phone can accommodate these complex worlds with easefor another thing roleplaying games have become way more diverse than before yes there are plenty of straight ports on ios but roleplaying mechanics now find their way into all sorts of unexpected placesthe list of best ios rpgswe sought to reflect this diversity in the following list you see that plenty of classic games jrpgs and tactical rpgs have made the cut but there are plenty of original mobilefocused experiences toowe all role players these days whether we realise it or notwhat that you don see your favourite mobile rpg on the list sorry about that but while sounds like a pretty long list we know for a fact we left a whole bunch of stonecold greats off let us know about your own mobile rpg favourites for iphones in the comments below in case you like any of the mentioned titles head out to app store and find it in the correct section

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Lee Sin Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift lee sin guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the lee sin guide belowyou can quickly dash over walls shield allies and kick opponents left and right and if that sounds fun wait until you play this champion he not easy to learn but practice will more than pay off once you manage to get to grips with his kit so while it not easy becoming the next insec the player that created the famous lee sin combo you can learn in time to do some pretty neat plays with this championafter lee sin uses an ability his next basic attacks gain attack speed and return energysonic wave lee sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters if sonic wave hits lee sin can cast resonating strike for the next seconds resonating strike lee sin dashes to the enemy hit by sonic wave dealing physical damage based on the target missing healthlee sin rushes to the target position shielding himself from damage if an enemy champion or monster is near the landing point after using safeguard lee sin can cast iron will for the next few seconds iron will lee sin next attack deals bonus magic damage and has omnivamptempest lee sin smashes the ground sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit if tempest hits an enemy lee sin can cast cripple for the next seconds cripple lee sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by tempest reducing their movement speed for seconds movement speed recovers gradually over the durationlee sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short durationhow to combo as lee sinwhen it comes to combos lee sin has a plethora of them we probably won be able to cover every single one of them since most lee sin players will at one point or another develop their own play style and combo execution since he such a mobile and versatile champion you quickly discover what the best ones are for your own playstyle from just learning the basics how to do the insec combo with lee sinthe famous insec combo is basically lee sin going in and kicking an enemy from behind towards your allies however there are a lot of variations to this combo let check them outit would be easier if you could check that out in a video so check outassassin dave lee sin combos showcasein what order to level up the skillsfor lee sin you want to max your skill first then continue by levelling skill and finally skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellssmite deal true damage to a large or epic monster or minion smiting monsters restores hp slaying large monsters upgrades smite to chilling smite or challenging smite which can target enemy champions the bonuses from hunting license and tooth and nail from smite that charge once every rift lee sin the best itemsbootsgluttonous greavesis going to be your main choice of boots but you can also go for mercury treads in order to shorten the duration of crowd controls orninja tabis if the enemy has a lot of ad damageif you are interested in other champion builds and not only wild rift lee sin check our guides for fizz graves garenand every other character from the game

header: LoL: Wild Rift Wukong Guide: Best build, items, runes

opponents into not recognizing which one is the real wu this will be the best decoy everactivating skill after an autoattack will automatically reset the autoattack cooldown furthermore it will also name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Kha'Zix Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift kha guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the kha guide belowkha the voidreaver is our next wild rift champion on the list kha is a champion that is most often played in the jungle and quite successfully too he can be extremely powerful in scenarios because his kit is specifically designed to assassinate unexpecting enemies and ambush them in scenarios where he will come out victorious of the timethis champion is not too difficult to learn but not extremely easy to play either he will win most isolated trades because of his passive skill which increases the damage he does to isolated targets and that alone makes him a great champion to carry in solo queuewhen the enemy team loses sight of kha its next attack against enemy champions deals bonus magic damage and slows them brieflykha causes physical damage by slashes with its claws dealing additional damage if the target is isolated evolved reaper claws basic attacks and taste their fear have increased range and if a target is isolated meaning that they have no teammates or turrets nearby then a significant portion of taste their fear cooldown is refundedkha fires spikes to deal physical damage while also partially healing itself if it is within the explosion evolved spike racks fires additional spikes revealing and slowing enemies for a short durationkha leaps to a targeted area and deals physical damage evolved wings leap gains significant range and the cooldown is refunded on champion takedownspassive each upgrade to void assault allows for kha to evolve one of his abilities active kha becomes invisible and gains movement speed briefly evolved adaptive cloaking invisibility duration lasts longer and can be cast multiple timeshow to combo as kha you want to pull off some sleek kha combos you might have to practice quite a bit beforehand of course it quite easy to kill enemies that are slow or immobile marksmen but when you faced with opponents that are very mobile you need to time your skills perfectly in order to shut them downthis is one of the simplest combos to pull off on the champion you basically jump forward with your skill then take advantage of the passive proc with skill then with skill you can quickly follow up for some more added damage if the target is very low you might want to consider chasing after themthe following combo works best if you are hidden and quickly ambush your enemy jump from a brush it ideal if you know that you have the damage to kill an enemy to before they can even flash awaykeep in mind what kha ultimate does and use it wiselyremember that the ultimate kha has lets him evolve an ability granting him invisibility when activating it he is also able to recast it becoming invisible again once you have evolved it it can be cast additional times pretty much increasing the invisibility duration by a lot he will be a deadly voidpredatorinsect that can crush squishiessome of the best uses of his ultimate are when there is a major fight baron or elder for example and you want to take out someone in a matter of seconds or try to secure the objective before the enemy then skill over the wall you can also use it to escape from difficult situations but the point is that you want to be the one chasing enemies when playing kha not the other way aroundin what order to level up the skillsfor kha you want to max out your skill first then follow up with skill and lastly with skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellssmitedeal true damage to a large or epic monster or minion smiting monsters restores hp slaying large monsters upgrades smite to chilling smite or challenging smite which can target enemy champions the bonuses from hunting license and tooth and nail from smite that charge once every boots situation depends highly on the champions you will have to fight on the enemy team in most cases you can go for ionian boots but sometimes you might have to go for plated steelcaps or mercury treadsif you would like to examine if the kha is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Rengar Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift rengar guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the rengar guide belowin the lore rengar and kha are constantly hunting each other which we saw in the minievent that coincided with their release in actual gameplay rengar is somewhat more of a fighter and a lot less squishy than kha you can build rengar similarly though but you can also slap a couple of tankier items on him and call it a day he still going to do his jobwhen it comes to damage however once a good rengar gets ahead there is no turning back this champion will obliterate enemies one after another even in scenarios sometimes and use thrill of the hunt to its utmost extent i have to admit rengar feels a lot more fun to play than kha at least to me because of his passiverengar leaps to his target with his next attack if he is in the brush or camouflaged also casting a basic ability allows rengar to gain ferocity which at a certain point can be used to enhance his next basic ability castrengar next couple of attacks gain attack speed the first attack deals additional physical damage ferocity rengar gains even more attack speed and the first attack deals additional physical damagerengar roars deals magic damage and heals himself for some of the damage taken ferocity rengar deals magic damage and instead of partially healing himself gains movement speed and removes all crowd control effects from himselfrengar throws a bola causing physical damage and slows his enemy for a couple of seconds ferocity rengar gains even more movement speed and roots his enemy instead of slowing themrengar gains movement speed and reveals the nearest enemy champion for a period of time shortly after casting rengar becomes camouflaged with his next attack shredding the target armour for a period of timehow to combo as rengarrengar kit is pretty straightforward you don have a whole lot of crazy combos which makes him a tad bit easier to plan than kharengar skill works as an autoattack reset but it also empowers his next basic attack and grants additional attack speed remember to use this every chance you get when trading and even when farming it help a lot with your clearno tactic is too much when you playing the pridestalker you can use the brushes in key areas the tribush the pixel brush and the entire enemy jungle to stalk your enemies and catch them at their weakest point that pretty much how you will get aheadrengar excels at battles in the jungle so if you can carry them there make sure to focus on the squishiest members first the passive will help a lot at gap closing and if you want to extend this you can also use your flash it take a bit of practice to get it right on the first try but keep at it it will be extremely rewarding in the endthis would be your most deadly combo you cast your ultimate to reveal the enemy then it all about the hunt you will basically get propelled forward once you lock onto your target and then cast flash while in range for a surprise attack follow up with the autoattack and skills combo and out of enemies will be dead on the spot before they can reactyou can use a similar combo while in the brush but without having to activate your ultimate or flash thanks to the passivein what order to level up the skillsfor rengar you want to max out your skill first then follow up with skill and lastly with skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellssmitedeal true damage to a large or epic monster or minion smiting monsters restores hp slaying large monsters upgrades smite to chilling smite or challenging smite which can target enemy champions the bonuses from hunting license and tooth and nail from smite that charge once every are a few other additional items you could make great use of on rengar such as black cleaver maw of malmortius and even trinity force in some weird situationsthe boots situation depends highly on the champions you will have to fight on the enemy team there are main types of boots you can go for on rengar ionian boots of lucidity plated steelcaps or mercury treadsif you would like to examine if rengar is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

header: LoL: Wild Rift Dr. Mundo Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift dr mundo guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the dr mundo guide belowdr mundo the madman of zaun is our next wild rift champion to take the stand he is what you could call a true tank in the most accuratesense of the word he is one of those champions that with just a couple of items can truly become unkillable his selfhealing is off the charts and once he gets in your face the chances of you escaping without burning your flash at least are very slimin the early game mundo is not that big a threat but once you get in mid to late game he can tank tower shots nexus shots skills combos more combos and more skills all without breaking a sweat oh and did i mention he doesn have to worry about manathat right dr mundo is one of the easiest tanks you could play that can deal plenty of damage survive even more and be an overall annoying champion to play against to top it all off he also extremely easy to play if that sounds good to you then let check out his kitdr mundo regenerates of his maximum health each seconddr mundo hurls his cleaver dealing damage equal to a portion of his target current health and slowing them for a short time dr mundo delights in the suffering of others so he is returned a portion of the health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver doubled on killing blowsdr mundo drains his health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemiesdr mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage passively increases magic resist whenever dr mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health costdr mundo sacrifices a portion of his health for increased movement speed and drastically increased health regenerationhow to combo as dr mundo in wild riftto be completely honest with you dr mundo doesn have a single combo other than the fact that his skill resets his autoattacks he is one of those champions that can probably be played with one hand while with the other you sipping cocktails on a beach in the bahamasyep he that easy to play if you have his skill activated and run into your opponents face you will do plenty of damage and if you activate your ultimate too in the meantime you will regen a lot of hp making you a walking tank literallyif you want to restore some health during the laning phase you can just throw your skill at the opponent and you get some hp back it will also slow enemies down so if you want to chase them down this is a great way to crowd control cc themmundo skills use his own hp but don worry they won actually kill you however they will get your hp very low if you keep on using the skills such as skill nonstop for no reason so before you get spirit visagewarmog armor don keep them activated all the timein what order to level up the skillson dr mundo you always want to max out your skill first then skill and finally skill although skill is your main damage dealing skill with skill you will be tankier and deal more damage when casting your skills alternatively you could go for a mix between skill and skill and level them up both equally i personally prefer this way thoughlevel skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by you need to keep in mind the following his build depends heavily on the champions the enemy team has the core items on mundo are spirit visage warmog armor and sunfire cape and the rest can be adapted to the types of champions apad the enemies haveif there are a lot of ad champions on name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Nasus Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift nasus guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the nasus guide belownext up we going to take a look at nasus the curator of the sands in wild rift nasus is a champion that is extremely weak in the early stages of the game but the more he manages to stack up his damage the deadlier he becomes if left unattended nasus will become a nightmare in the end game as long as he plays safe and successfully stacks up with skill a bitif you want to play a champion that can stomp the late game and oneshot a squishy team of enemies then nasus is a good choice he will be tanky have sustain and most importantly will always scale although he is easy to play as long as you farm he not always a goto choice for players because he easily punishable always think we before you pick nasus and when you do pick him keep in mind that he not an early game championgains bonus physical vampnasus strikes his foe dealing damage and increasing the power of his future siphoning strikes if he slays his targetnasus ages an enemy champion decelerating their movement and attack speeds over timenasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location dealing damage and reducing the armor of enemies who stand on itnasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies while the storm rages he gains increased health attack range damages nearby enemies has a reduced cooldown on siphoning strike and gains bonus armor and magic resistance for the durationhow to combo as nasusnasus doesn exactly have any combos since his entire kit is created to help him farm and survive since he doesn have combos apart from the autoattack reset with skill you don have to worry too much about that aspect however his skills can be used situationally as followslast hitting minions with skill will give you some stacks and that will increase your skill damage the best option would be to last hit cannon minions jungle minions and the scuttle crab because those will give you more stacks make sure that you reset your autoattacks with skill if necessarywhen you ready to start trading with your lane opponent you can use skill to slow them down and make them unable to escape your range once you stacked up enough damage on your skill you could consider going allin with skill on the enemiesanother great use of the skill is to slow down an enemy when they are trying to engage you this could give you a small advantage when you getting ganked so in such situations try to apply the slow to the opponent with the most damage or the one that more immobilewhen you have slowed down your opponents you can quickly place down your skill spirit fire to deal additional damage you can also use this skill to farm the minion waves quicker but that not always ideal since you want to last hit them with your skill team fights this skill is great for dealing damage to opponents who are not checking the groundwhen you ready to engage in a fight you should time your ultimate make sure that it always up for the active battles because nasus using fury of the sands is akin to going super saiyan he will gain increased range a lower cooldown on skill increased magic resist and armor and also aoe damage around himself in other words you never want to be caught next to a nasus using their ultimateyou should combo your ultimate with skill so enemies will stand no chance of escaping youin what order to level up the skillsfor nasus you want to max out your skill first then follow up with skill and lastly with skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimateadditionally if you want to have the ability to farm more you could add a second point in skill once you hit level but it not always a great choice instead you will be better off maxing skill asapthe best summoner spellsghost gain a large boost of movement speed that decays to bonus movement speed for secondswhen it comes to boots it really important that you pay attention to the matchup if the enemy has a lot of physical damage then you want ninja tabis if the opponent has a lot of crowd control you want mercury treads otherwise ionian boots of lucidity are a good choice since they give nasus more ability hasteif you would like to examine if the nasus is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Evelynn Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift evelynn guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the evelynn guide belowthe agony embrace evelynn is the next champion in wild rift that we take a look at she is a jungler with a rather unique kit which makes it both fun and entertaining to play at the same timeevelynn is different from the other junglers in the sense that she able to go invisible thanks to her passive without having to rely on bushes and other skills she is only spotted by control wards and oracle lenses and only while being in close proximity to other enemy champions apart from that she pretty much impossible to trackwhen playing evelynn your main goal is always to act fast and swift and plan every move ahead of time you can build a huge advantage by positioning correctly clearing your jungle in a specific order as well as by ganking the squishy lanes the execution she has on her ultimate allows her to be extremely deadly both against squishy enemies and more tanky ones but what she really excels at is taking isolated enemies by surprise similar to kha rengar and other assassin championswhen out of combat evelynn enters demon shade demon shade heals evelynn when she is low on health and grants camouflage after level strikes out with her lasher twice dealing damage to the first unit hit then evelynn can recast to shoot another line of spikes at nearby foesevelynn curses her target causing her next attack or spell to slow or charm her target after a delay based on time cursed and reduce their magic resistevelynn whips her target with her lasher dealing damage she then gains movement speed for a short duration when exiting demon shade whiplash pulls evelynn to her targetevelynn briefly becomes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distancehow to combo as evelynnthere are a lot of combos you could pull off as evelynn but since most of them are situational you want to make sure that you consider all the options before diving into the enemy team since evelynn is super squishy as an assassin you never want to commit unless you sure you can get a killthis is one of the simplest combos you will have on evelynn since it her basic prelevel combo you can gank as soon as level by using this but it not always super effective unless the opponents have no flash since this is a prelevel combo you won be able to finish off opponents if they are highly mobile but it still an easy way to deal a lot of damage and try to put your lane in an advantageous positionthis would be her allin level combo you will use your skill and skill to charm the enemy and dash towards them and then you can follow up with some autoattacks and skill spikes if the opponent is a squishy target you will probably be able to cast your ultimate soon after executing themthis combo works wonders for stealing objectives and getting away with it when you flash over the wall behind the baron pit or behind the drake you will end up possibly in a tough spot smite trying to secure the objective then quickly ultimate out while facing away from the wall to be taken straight back over the wall with the repositioning from ultimatein what order to level up the skillsfor evelynn you want to max your skill first then continue by levelling skill and then skill however you won max them in the same order take a look at how you going to allocate your skill points belowkeep levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellssmitedeal true damage to a large or epic monster or minion smiting monsters restores hp slaying large monsters upgrades smite to chilling smite or challenging smite which can target enemy championsif you would like to examine if evelynn is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

header: LoL: Wild Rift Graves Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift graves guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the graves guide belowgraves the outlaw is the next wild rift champion we are going to tackle he a powerful and fearless pirate who is not afraid of getting his hands dirty after all he from bilgewater where plunder kills and outlaws are every man breakfastgraves is usually played in the jungle where he doesn have any difficulty clearing the camps and getting ahead in farm although he a marksman he won do that great in the lane because his kit is quite similar to jhin in the sense that he has to reload his gun however unlike jhin he doesn have any other waveclear abilities apart from skill which is not that great for laning phasehe extremely fun to play and although he not that beginnerfriendly you can definitely try to learn his kit if you want to shift into a jungle position he is and has been for the longest time a very good jungler both in casual and competitive play so give him a go you won regret itgraves shotgun has some unique properties he must reload when he runs out of ammo attacks fire bullets which cannot pass through units nonchampions struck by multiple bullets are knocked backgraves fires an explosive shell that detonates after seconds or seconds if it strikes terraingraves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their movement speed reduced brieflygraves dashes forward gaining an armor boost for several seconds if graves dashes towards an enemy champion he gains two stacks of true grit instead hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boostgraves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits and pushes graves back with recoil after hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range the shell explodes dealing damage in a conehow to combo as gravesgraves doesn have that many combos since hit kit is fairly straightforward you want to use his abilities depending on the situation for example you can drop the smoke screen to try and leave a fight by blinding the opponent however there are a couple of useful combos to pull off just keep in mind that you might need to head on to the practice tool to train using them a little bitthis is a pretty simple combo to pull off since graves has two bullets in his shotgun he has to reload every two autoattacks so you will use your skill to dash towards the opponent and shorten the distance between youalthough his ultimate has a set range you can use certain walls like the walls between midlane and river to send it off from one side to the other this will work only for specific terrains for example it doesn work on the big round wall next to the bluered buff but this is a nice way to snipe unexpecting enemiesthis is a very easy combo to pull off you can use it to escape when you being chased by enemies by dropping your smoke screen and then quickly using your ultimate which will push you back along with flashthis is a combo you can do before you get your ultimate and it usually ideal for when you ganking a laneusing your skill will quickly reset the autoattacks making it easier to stick to enemies and burst them downthis unique combo is quite difficult to pull off it takes advantage of graves high burst damage sequence and uses skill to catch up with the opponent and reset the autoattacks and deal tons of damage endgame this is one of the strongest combos on graves that can pretty much oneshot any squishy enemiesthis is yet another difficult combo but it slightly easier than the previous one however you need to make sure that the opponent is in plain sight and not anywhere close to their towers because the shots from skill will not go through turrets or any terrain for that matterwhat the best order to level up the skillswhen you level up his skills you want to prioritize skill then skill and finally skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellssmitedeal true damage to a large or epic monster or minion smiting monsters restores hp slaying large monsters upgrades smite to chilling smite or challenging smite which can target enemy champions the bonuses from hunting license and tooth and nail from smite that charge once every you could also go for a more assassinlike approach to the game lethality graves is more than viable as long as your team already has a tank that can soak up some damage in that case you can replace death dance with youmu ghostblade and guardian angel with duskblade of draktharryour ideal boots are either ninja tabis mercury threadsor gluttonous greaves it all depends on the situation choose them based on what your team needs and what your opponents characters areas for the enchantment you can go for either stasis orquicksilverif you would like to examine if graves is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

header: LoL: Wild Rift Annie Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift annie guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the annie guide belownext up on our wild rift champions we are going to cover annie the dark child she is a powerful mage who can be played both as a support and a mid laner annie kit is quite a unique one in the sense that she can deal a lot of damage and survive quite well in most situationsher most signature feature would probably be her teddy bear tibbers annie is fairly easy to play but unlike in league of legends in wild rift her skill is a targeted ability also she doesn need a target to cast it and she can use it to charge up her passive anytimeafter casting spells annie next offensive spell will stun the targetannie hurls a mana infused fireball dealing damage in a small area and refunding the mana cost and half its cooldown if it destroys the targetannie casts a blazing cone of fire dealing damage to all enemies in the areaannie shields tibbers or an allied champion absorbing damage enemies who attack the shield take damageannie wills her bear tibbers to life dealing damage to units in the area tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near himhow to combo as anniedepending on the situation annie can have quite a few combos most of them have a high burst of damage which makes her a great engage support as a mid laner she can also engage but will have slightly less survivability however she will more than make up for it with the increased amounts of damage she will dothis is one of the most powerful engages she has with a fully stacked passive and by casting her ultimate she will have aoe stun basically if she is full ap build she will most likely be able to oneshot any squishy champion with this combothis combo is great for stunning and damaging one enemy since her skill is a single target abilitybefore obtaining the ultimate annie can also pull off an engage with her kit but she will have to follow it up by ignite and probably another teammate for additional damage use your skill on yourself to cast it on tibbers as well once he summoned use your skill on allies to boost their movement speed or mitigate some damagein what order to level up the skillson annie depending on where you play her support or mid you will level up differentlythis is how you will level up annie midkeep leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill and whenever you have the chance add a point into your ultimatethis is how you will level up annie supportkeep leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to add a point into your ultimate whenever you canthe best summoner spellsignite ignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by you would like to examine if annie is currently meta check out our wild rift tier list

header: LoL: Wild Rift Varus Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift varus guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the varus guide belowthe next wild rift champion on the list is a very interesting and a rather unique one varus also known as the arrow of retribution he deals mixed damage scaling off both ad and ap so you can choose his build based on your playstyle or your team needsif you want a champion that can be played in every way you can imagine except tank but i haven tried that one yet who knows it might be possible poking the enemy from a distance and being a lane bully then you definitely want to check this one outon kill or assist varus temporarily gains attack speed this bonus is larger if the enemy is a championvarus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to firepassive varus basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and applies blight varus other abilities detonate blight dealing magic damage based on the target maximum healthactive varus empowers his next piercing arrowvarus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground desecrated ground slows enemies movement speed and reduces their selfhealing and regenerationvarus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions immobilizing them too on contacthow to combo as varusunlike many other champions that we covered and that we will cover varus can be built in a variety of ways and still provide the same utility to the teammagic damage buildin the case you decide to play varus as an ability power ap carry then varus damage comes from his passive on skill every autoattack will apply a stack of blight on the target while his other abilities skill and will detonate those stacks dealing magic damage per stack the more stacks you apply the more damage you do max stacks you can visibly see the number of stacks a target has they appear as purple diamonds around the targethis skill ultimate does ap damage on hit will root and apply max number of blight stacks on the targetsuntil you learn the ultimate your only way of applying blight stacks on your enemy comes from his autoattacks whenever varus kills an enemy champion or a minion he granted a good amount of attack speed so make sure to last hit the minions properly to proc his passive it will definitely help you apply those stacks fastera very easy way to apply max blight stacks and get some good damage off is the followingphysical damage buildif you decide to build varus as a physical damage carry then most of his damage will come by charging his arrow in this case you will start by maxing skill followed by skill then max skill last you can still use skill for the extra damage that comes from detonating blight stacks but since you are building ad that damage is very low compared to the ap buildtraditional adc buildif you find the adc playstyle more enjoyable then there another way to itemize varus you focus more on your critical strike rate and onhit damage of course all the combos that we talked about before still apply to this build but most of varus damage will come from his autoattacksone of the best combos you can pull off as a traditional adc is the followingin what order to level up the skillson addamage varus you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally your skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimateon apdamage varus you want to go for skill first then skill and lastly skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill any chance you get add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsheal restores health and grants bonus movement speed for second to you and the most wounded nearby ally champion healing is halved for champions recently affected by healthe runes for varus are typically the same no matter what item build you go for at the moment there are no other runes that work well with him apart from fleet footwork maybe kleptomancy so just go for that onehow good is varus well you can always look at our wild rift tier list to find out
