header: LoL: Wild Rift Galio Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift galio guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the galio guide belowsurprisingly galio falls somewhere on that thin line between an engage tank and a mage because his skills deal quite a bit of damage but he way tankier than your typical ranged mage he got melee range so that would be part of the explanation i guessnow when it comes to his kit it pretty simple and easy to grasp once you play a couple of games with him the skills are all targeted but the hitbox is pretty big making him a beginnerfriendly champion as for the role he can be played either as a support or in the mid laneevery few seconds galio next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an areagalio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over timegalio charges a defensive stance moving slowly upon releasing the charge galio will taunt and damage nearby enemiesgalio will briefly step back and charge knocking up the first enemy champion he encountersgalio designates an ally position as his landing spot combos all of them are situational though so you have quite a lot of freedom when using them for the most part you do amazing in team fights thanks to his aoe taunt that can turn the tide of any battle in his favourthis is going to be your main engage combo you want to get close to as many enemies as possible before casting your skill so you can taunt as many people as you can then you just follow up with your basic attacks and skill to deal some damageyou want to start activating skill right before you flash so you can catch the opponents by surprise the use of flash at the beginning of this combo is key because that is what going to start the entire teamfightmake the most out of your skill when stepping backwards before launching forth to dodge various attacks and spellsin what order to level up the skillsfor galio you want to max your skill first then continue by levelling skill and finally skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill of course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them bandage at a target stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to themovercome by anguish nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum health each second and have their curses are going to take a look at although she is not your typical mage she definitely as powerful as one diana has a lot of burst damage but plenty of sustain as well since her shield allows her to play aggressively even outside of tradeswhen playing diana your main goal is to go in and assassinate the enemies in order to be viable you need to land your skill because that when the magic happens landing your skill will allow you to dash to the target because they marked and trade with them let take a look at her entire kit so you will understand exactly what i talking aboutbefore we get started i mention one thing diana is not easy to master she might be quite easy to get a grasp of but really understanding how she works and how you can oneshot your opponents will take time there are a million ways you can combo her skill with the rest of her kit to outplay your opponents but it will take a lot of time to learn them all therefore we going to give you some basic tips on how to understand herevery third strike cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage after casting a spell diana gains attack speed for her next attacksunleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing magic damage afflicts enemies struck with moonlight revealing them if they are not stealthed for secondsdiana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area she also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage if her third sphere detonates the shield gains additional strengthbecomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon dashing to an enemy and dealing magic damage lunar rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with moonlight all other enemies will have the moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of lunar rushdiana reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them if diana pulls in one or more enemy champions the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay dealing magic damage in an area around her increased for each target beyond the first pulledhow to combo as dianadiana has a couple of combos but most importantly it landing your skill everything else can kit firstthis is a combo you can pull off as soon as you hit level she can pretty much allin as soon as she has her first basic abilities which is difficult for an opponent to match if you are fighting against a fairly squishy opponent then you can top this off with ignite to quickly finish off anybodysince diana is quite complicated i going to leave you in the hands of someone who has a the skillsfor diana you want to max your skill first then continue by levelling skill and finally skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by can also go for conqueror if the enemy team is tankier for each matchup you can go for electrocute but otherwise when you need to fight extended battles conqueror is the way to go try both and decide which one you like the mostwild rift diana the best itemsbootsstasisis a great choice because you ideally want to go in as much as possible with diana and that a way to survive for longer if you dive too deepif you would like to examine if diana is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Akshan Guide: Best build, items, runes - patch 2.4
content: in this league of legends wild rift akshan guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to the best build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the akshan guide belowthis champion can really make some interestinglooking plays by using his skill but that can also work against him therefore positioning is key make sure of that and play around the team in order to surprise squishy opponents and finish them off with a flurry of attacks powered by his ultimate and passiveanother great use of this champion is provided by his passive bonus on skill akshan can greatly reduce the cooldown of fallen allies helping them recover a lot quicker that can turn the tide of many battles in his team favour even more so in wild rift than the pc version of leagueevery third attack or ability hit deals bonus physical damage against champions it also gains damage shield for a brief momentlike a typical boomerang spell it can hit each enemy twice once on the way out and back in the boomerang will reach some units beyond the last target hit if it hits a different target during this its range will extend so theoretically the range is infinitepassive enemies that kill akshans allies become scoundrels for few brief seconds killing a scoundrel grants akshan bonus gold and reduces the fallen allys death timer active gain camouflage for a few seconds duration is refreshed when akshan is near a wall or in brush gains movement speed when moving toward scoundrelsakshan fires a rope that attaches to a wall for a few seconds to allow him to swing in a circle while swinging akshan shoots an enemy he has recently damagedlocks onto an enemy champion and begins overcharging mist shots over a few secondshow to combo as akshan in wild riftakshan focuses mainly on his passive and skill to trade in lane but there are a lot of other combos and tips you can make great use ofpay close attention to the passive skill and what it grants after each autoattackuse this situationally to trade in lane or to escape right before getting ganked by an opponent since his passive changes depending on how many attacks akshan casts players are encouraged to trade a lotuse skill for the vision it grantswhen akshan skill hits an enemy champion it will show you their location in other words it grants you vision of the enemies it hits make sure to use it in brushes if you don have any wards it also increases in range the more champions it travels through so it exceptionally great for checking whether or not the enemies are doing barondragon or if they hiding in a bushuse skill to hunt down scoundrelsenemies that kill akshan teammates become scoundrels if akshan uses skill to track them down he gains additional movement speed towards them bonus tip you can use this in the fog of war stay close to walls or bushes to extend the duration of this skill as long as you next to a wall or a bush you will be invisible indefinitelyuse skill to snipe unexpecting enemies from across the wall or to escapeskill is a great ability that works somewhat similar to the one camille uses it lets akshan use the terrain to his advantage and swing around either to escape or to engage an opponent if you autoattack a target and mark it before casting skill then once you are midair casting and swinging in skill that target will be akshan priorityposition yourself accordingly when using the ultimatethe ultimate skill can only be cast on champions so keep that in mind it cannot be used to snipe out objectives from your enemies always take into consideration the time you need to charge it seconds because you don want to be interrupted when doing soprioritize lower hp targets because they will take additional damage from this skill look for enemies with less than hp this ability can target any enemy but it will not go through objects it will instead deal damage to the objects it encounters that a neat little trick if you want to surprise an enemy that hiding behind a low hp turret the turret will go down and your path towards the enemy will be freein what order to level up the skillsfor akshan you want to max out skill first then continue levelling skill then skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsignite ignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by you would like to examine if akshan is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list we also have nami guide nasus guide olaf guide orianna and many other wild rift champions that you should read about

header: LoL: Wild Rift Twisted Fate Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift twisted fate guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the twisted fate guide belowthe card master also known as twisted fate is by far one of the most fun and unique champions you could play in wild rift this card trickster can inflict different effects on the opponent depending on which card he pulls but that not all there is he can teleport all across the map within a limited radius with his ultimate and reveal all opponents possibly leading to massive advantages for his teamoverall twisted fate is not extremely difficult to play once you get used to his kit in fact it rather fun and exciting because you can choose exactly what you want depending on the situation for example if you need mana during the lane phase you go for the blue card and if you want to stun the enemy you go for the gold card either way he will need a little bit of practice because you must always be patient and play your cards right quite literallytwisted fate can be a great pick in most situations since his kit works well with an ad build and an ap build alike no matter which builds you choose however his playstyle will not change much it all relies on landing key cards with skill hitting skill for some additional poke and activating skill for a burst of damage with autoattacksoh and did i mention he can generate more gold with his passive a true gamblerupon killing a unit twisted fate rolls his dice receiving bonus goldtwisted fate throws three cards dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass throughtwisted fate chooses a magic card from his deck and uses that for his next attack causing bonus effects red cards deal damage in an area and slow blue cards deal damage and restore mana and gold cards deal damage and stunevery attacks twisted fate deals bonus damage activating this skill increases his attack speed and attacking enemy champions rolls his loaded dicetwisted fate predicts the fortunes of his foes revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of gate which teleports twisted fate to any target location in secondshow to combo as twisted fatethe one main combo i would say is his stun skill combo which allows for a guaranteed burst of damage on the opponent however there can be a million more combos depending on which card you pick and the situationtherefore i will not be able to list them all but here are a few which are definitely going to make you look like a pro when playing tfthis combo is a little bit more on the advanced side since it something you can use on enemies that aren expecting you to go in or are trying to run away most of the time your card will automatically cast once you in range but it might take a little bit of getting used to also you might want to activate the champion target lockoverall pulling off all of twisted fate combos will take a bit of getting used to because there are always many small things to consider that will lead to bigger advantages the more the game goes onin what order to level up the skillson twisted fate it all depends on which build you will choose i explain both ad and ap builds belowif you go ap then you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally your skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimateif you go ad then you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally your skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill of course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsexhaust exhausts the target enemy champion reducing their movement speed by and their damage dealt by for secondsorwild rift twisted fate the best runes for api start by mentioning that twisted fate kit can be played in a lot of ways there can be a poke ap build or an onhit ap build one of the most effective options for the late game is the onhit build since you will be able to use the ultimate and surprise enemies that are trying to escape or are alone in a side lanepit all depends on the item build you want to go some of the best enchantments are stasis and shadows because they will help you survive more and slow enemies down respectivelyif you would like to examine if twisted fate is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

content: in this league of legends wild rift jarvan iv guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is disappearsin other words his kit is powerful if you learn when to use his skills and how to best take advantage of his mobility and crowd control otherwise it could put you in some rather dire situationsjarvan first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage based on their current health this effect cannot occur again on the same enemy for a few secondsjarvan iv extends his lance dealing physical damage and lowering the armor of enemies in its path additionally this will pull jarvan to his demacian standard knocking up enemies in his pathjarvan iv calls upon the ancient kings of demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemiesjarvan iv carries the pride of demacia passively granting him bonus attack speed activating demacian standard allows jarvan iv to place a demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants attack speed to nearby allied champions cast again to automatically cast dragon strike to the flagjarvan iv heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impacthow to combo as jarvan ivthere are a few combos that you can master for jarvan but most of them are situational and they not too difficult to get right either you can follow the guideline below to get a better idea of how they work and then master them yourselfthis is going to be your main allin combo with this skill you can travel in any direction you want and knock up the enemies you pass through on the wayyou can also try casting this combo and flash in quick succession to get to the backline or surprise enemiesthe ultimate cataclysm can work wonders at isolating enemies or zoning them off or even closing an area off use this during team name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Aurelion Sol Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift aurelion sol guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the aurelion sol guide belowaurelion sol or the star forger is a mighty champion with a playstyle that doesn resemble any other champion we covered he is a powerful mage with the ability to bend stars fly through the terrain and snipe enemies with comets and other celestial objects pretty muchalthough he not easy to play he is extremely rewarding once you master him not only in terms of carrypotential but also because it super funin wild rift aurelion sol is not a champion for complete beginners so i strongly advise you to learn the basic game mechanics and how to farm properly before you take him into your ranked games unlike the other champions currently available in wild rift aurelion sol doesn even have to autoattack a minion to kill it his passive skill will do that for you the only thing you must mind at all times is his positioningstars orbit aurelion sol dealing magic damage when they hit an enemyaurelion sol creates an expanding disk which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from himaurelion sol pushes his stars farther out increasing their damage and speedaurelion sol takes off flying for a long distanceaurelion sol projects a blast of pure starfire damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distancehow to combo as aurelion solalthough aurelion sol has some quite basic mechanics they are the bread and butter to his kit they are simple yet extremely effective which bodes well given the fairly complicated mechanics he features by defaultthis combo relies on you landing a stun on your opponent with your skill once they stunned you can cast skill for some damagethis depends entirely on the situation but it fairly easy to pull off once you get a stun it a pretty bursty combo so it especially good during team fights you could show from behind a wall and take enemies by surprise skill skill skill is a pretty tricky one because it relies on you pulling off a lot of damage with your orbs and engaging on your opponent once one of the orbs hit to quickly proc the second and probably third one you can also follow with autoattacksthis is a typical combo that will help you pass through walls make getting to lane a lot easier and will work wonders when you ganking other lanes especially if you start casting it from the place they least expect you to pop out ofthis combo will knock the opponent back towards your team but it is quite difficult to pull off also you should be prepared to use your stasis because chances are you be diving into the enemy teamin what order to level up the skillson aurelion sol you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally your skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsignite ignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by aurelion sol you can go one of two ways either magic damage tanky or full damage he scales very well into the endgame so rod of ages is an ideal item for him however if you want a more bursty build you can go for awakened soulstealer and infinity orb instead of liandry torment and rylai crystal sceptertake a moment to check our tier list and where does aurelion belong on the list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Ahri Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: today we are going to check the skills of the mysterious vastaya called ahri and give you a complete guide on how to play her what items to build on her and more she the second champion in wild rift that i will cover thus continuing on our journey to learn more about every single character in league of legends wild riftahri is a mage with immense powers and not only in the stories on the rift she an extremely high burst high damage champion who has the ability to inflict crowd control and even sustain to a certain extent her kit is not particularly easy to use but not crazy hard eithershe relies mostly on her mobility in the form of her ultimate which allows her to make some amazing plays and utilize her kit to the fullest of the time on her auto attacks manawise she is exactly what you expect from a mage a little bit manahungry and quite reliant on items and teammates to peel for herif i were to think about ahri kit overall i would say that it was designed to make her some sort of assassin mage but with the ability to get herself back to safety also she could play from a safe distance since her skill allows her to kill minionspoke players from a relatively ok distancein this league of legends wild rift ahri guide i walk you through everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes in this ahri guide you will find the followingwhenever ahri hits a target with a spell she gains a stack of essence theft when she has enough stacks her next spell that hits an enemy also heals herahri sends out and pulls back her orb dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way backahri gains a brief burst of movement speed and releases three foxfires that lock onto and attack nearby enemiesahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her the target temporarily takes increased damage from ahriahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts damaging nearby enemies spirit rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldownhow to combo as ahriahri has quite a number of ways that you can execute her combos since ger kit allows for a multitude of plays i will name just a few down below but i am sure there are like a million more ways to go in and out with ahri and obliterate your lane skill activate it before going in skill skill skill once or twicethis combo will pretty much allow you to go in charm the opponent and burst them down with foxfire and orb of deception if you follow up with the ultimate you can quickly close the distance between you assuming that the enemy not dead and they flashed away it would be ideal if you could save one or two dashes from spirit rush to get yourself out in case you end up too deep in the enemy skill skill skill skill doing this combo you can initiate a fight basically you can go in with the ultimate activate foxfire on your way in charm the unexpecting opponent and hit them with orb of deception you can dash around them with the remaining ultimate charges to get the kill or dash back out to flash skill skill skill skill combo is the ultimate allin you basically use your flash to engage the enemy player who probably doesn expect it then you charm them and follow up with the rest of the skills bursting them down you could do this underneath enemy towers as well as long as you have your skill to take you back to safetythese would be three ways in which you can combo with ahri of course there are a number of other ways you can engage disengage burst enemies down or assassinate unexpecting enemies appearing from a bush i won get into all of them because you will most likely discover them on your own however these three are some very basic ahri combos that work like a charmin what order to level up the skillsfirstly you want to max out ahri skill orb of deception then skill foxfire and finally skill charm of course every time you can level up the ultimate make sure you do solevel skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly skill best summoner spells for ahriignite ignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by you played ahri before then you know she is quite manahungry manaflow band and regeneration will help you especially during the laning phase as for hunter vampirism you can swap that out depending on the situationother viable options are triumph weakness goes well with ahri charm gathering storm for more scaling ap or brutal for more penetration choose this rune depending on what the enemy team is playingthese items are what you would call core on ahri you have plenty of burst damage ultimate haste ultimate cooldown reduction plenty of ap and magic penetration through void staff there could be a million variations to the build but in essence these are some of the best items that you could build on herdepending on the matchup you can swap out morellonomicon or void staff for liandry torment or even build infinity orb for more execute power which will have a good synergy with triumph runebootsi personally consider gluttonous stasis to be some of the best for the sheer sustain that they grant magical vamp the stasis is great because as ahri you can dive the enemy under their tower and use the active stasis to go invincible for secondsanother option would be ionian boots of lucidity ability haste with ionian shadows enchantment or ionian protobelt enchantment these are completely situational as sometimes you might want to slow enemies down with ionian shadows or have an additional dash with protobelt

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Orianna Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift orianna guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the orianna guide beloworianna is the next wild rift champion we will cover and she another one of the champions that i find extremely fun to play and strong over time orianna has been a consistent pick in pro play as well since her kit is designed in such a way that she doesn exactly have a weaknesswith tons of crowd control consistent damage and unique playstyle orianna is definitely a great pick for any team and can really turn the tides of any battle in her favor with the press of a single button command shockwave that skill is so unique to this champion that it leaves room for more or less unlimited optionsher unique kit and backstory make her a great pick for anyone trying to main a mid laner especially one that can be viable in every situation so without further ado let dive right inorianna attacks deal additional magic damage this damage increases the more orianna attacks the same targetorianna commands her ball to fire toward a target location dealing magic damage to targets along the way deals less damage to subsequent targets her ball remains at the target location afterorianna commands her ball to release a pulse of energy dealing magic damage around it this leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemiesorianna commands her ball to attach to an allied champion shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way additionally the ball grants additional armor and magic resist to the champion it is attached toorianna commands her ball to unleash a shockwave dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the ball after a short delayhow to combo as orianna in wild riftin wild rift orianna has a couple of unique things about her skill combo she can be both a support damage dealer a heavy control mage and a defenseshredding machinethis small but powerful combo works by simply poking down your opponent with the ball and a few autoattacks ori excels at short trades in lane since she can shield herself anytime and mitigate some of the damage she will receivethe best way to use your skill after your skill is because the enemy will not be able to escape it most opponents will just die to die or to the following autoattacks so it a great way to assert your lane dominancethis is the best way to surprise your enemies with an ultimate since chances are they will not spot the ball attached to the opponent charging at them it also works wonders in team fightsif you chasing down enemies doing so while casting skill is great you can place the ball in front of you on your path with skill cast skill for the boost of movement speed and keep attacking the enemiesin what order to level up the skillsfor orianna you want to level up her skills as followslevel skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill don forget to keep adding point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spells for oriannaigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by forget to check on our wild rift tier list in case you want to check what champions are currently in meta

header: LoL: Wild Rift Vi Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift vi guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the vi guide belowvi is the ideal champion for beginners not only because she is extremely mobile but also because her skills are easy to land pointandclick crowd control that means with just a few practice games she can be played in the jungle by anyone of course to master vi will take a little while longer but she still a very viable pick in low to mid eloevery third attack on the same enemy deals a percentage of their maximum health reduces their armor and grants vi attack speedvi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch carrying her forward the enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of denting blowsvi gains stacks of blast shield when hitting an enemy with an attack or ability activating blast shield generates a shield that absorbs damage at maximum stacks vi also gains movement speedvi next attack blasts through her target dealing damage to enemies behind itvi runs down an enemy knocking aside anyone in the way when she reaches her target she knocks it into the air jumps after it and slams it back into the groundhow to combo as vivi is pretty easy to play and her combos don require you to have a degree in rocket science as it would be the case for camille instead you need to time the skills right target the right enemy and that about it here is a full list of vi combos in wild riftthis combo is the ultimate allin vi combo it designed to cclock the enemy and take them down possibly with the help of another ally you will typically engage with this combo or start teamfights with it it can also work wonders when ganking a lane to leave no room for the enemy to escapeit might sound counterintuitive at first but bear with me here this combo can catch the enemy by surprise because they could see you charging your skill in a direction but then you can quickly close the game with flash when they not expecting it it brilliantthis is similar to the first combo we listed but without the use of flash it simple efficient and it will lock down any target you set your eyes onthis basic combo is what you use when ganking before you hit level or during any fight pretty much before you get your ultimatethis basic combo will lock onto your target and send you off in their direction no matter if they use flash or not once you locked down on them there no escaping it the ultimate engage toolin what order to level up the skillsfor vi you want to max your skill first then continue by levelling skill and finally skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellssmite deal true damage to a large or epic monster or minion smiting monsters restores hp slaying large monsters upgrades smite to chilling smite or challenging smite which can target enemy champions the bonuses from hunting license and tooth and nail from smite that charge once every are different items that can work well on vi depending on the matchup for instance against heavy ap team comps you can go for maw of malmortius instead of randuin omen or dead man platebootsmercury threadsis going to be your main choice of boots in order to shorten the duration of crowd controls inflicted on you and grant some more tankiness against magic damage however if the enemy has mostly ad damage you go for ninja tabisthe best choice of enchant is stasis glory or quicksilverif you would like to examine if vi is currently in meta take a look at ourwild rift tier list and if you are interested in other champion builds and not only wild rift vi check our guides for dr mundo draven evelynnand every other character from the game

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Fizz Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: fizz the tidal trickster is our next champion on the list he one of those champions that might even surprise you with the sheer amount of damage that he does not to mention the opponents his kit falls somewhere in between a mage and an assassin but i say that he definitely more of an assassinfizz is a champion that is not easy to play and requires some basic game knowledge in order to actually make him viable he is extremely mobile and that makes him one of the best champions that can dive the enemy tower for a kill and get back out without drawing tower aggro or taking damage from the tower shotsin my entire league of legends history which is about years now i say that fizz is the one champion that is always a great pick as long as the player who mastered it knows what they doing he can oneshot almost every champion if he ahead and to top it all off he also has a mean ultimate that knocks enemies upin this league of legends wild rift fizz guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the fizz guide belowfizz attacks deal additional damage over timefizz dashes through his target dealing magic damage and applying onhit effectsempowers fizz next attack to deal bonus damage and killing a unit resets rending wave cooldown additional attacks deal more damagefizz hops into the air landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable from this position fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back downfizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it slowing the target after a short delay a shark erupts from the ground knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside all enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowedso brace yourself because this is going to be a long onefizz has quite a lot of great combos since his kit allows you to dive the enemy in multiple ways catch up with them and much more however one element that often overlooked is his skill damage over time for bigger damage output you always want to wait for a couple of seconds so his skill will proc the damage over time and that should help you will most trades in the laning phaseif you can take advantage of this and autoattack enemies with your skill activated that is going to give you a big advantage over time of course this is ideal before you hit level and have the ultimate and before the opponent has their ultimate as wellskill autoattack skill autoattack skill is a great combo that will let you deal quite a bit of damage to the enemies before you hit level or even kill them since fizz can dash through to the enemy and tag to them most opponents who are not familiar with the champion or simply forget that he has damage over time will slowly die to his passive skill empowered attacksskill ultimate protobelt if you have it otherwise jump to skill skill autoattack skill skill ultimate skill skill skill assuming you need to get back to safetyskill ultimate skill skill autoattack skill you can time the skill in such a manner that you dodge some of the enemy attacksspellsanother fun combo is the following one which might take a little while to mastercast skill through a minion to close the gap between you and the opponent them use skill ultimate when you know they in range finally cast skill to the champion to finish them offthese are just a few of the skill combos that you can proc on fizz of course there can be like a million more it all up to you and the situation so i am not going to list absolutely everythingin what order to level up the skillswith fizz you want to level up the skills in the following orderlevel skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly skill add a point to skill ultimate whenever it availablethe best summoner spells for fizzignite ignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by items work amazingly well with fizz in league of legends wild rift because they will let him charge his ultimate a lot faster which will result in more allins furthermore infinity orb is almost perfectly made to fit fizz kit since he can deal even more damage to low hp enemiesbootsionian protobeltis great a great item for fizz since he can have an additional dash to help him catch the opponent by surpriseif you would like to check if fizz is currently in meta take a look at our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Xayah Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift xayah guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the xayah guide belowxayah the rebel is the next wild rift champion we are going to cover she a powerful marksman with a very longrange arguably longer than the range of several other marksmen and with a kit that makes her a powerful pick even in professional play in league of legends she just been released during the lunar beast event and is a champion that will definitely shift a lot of attention towards herselfxayah is rakan lover and together they have a unique synergy never before seen in wild rift when they are laning together both xayah and rakan gain some additional bonuses like we mentioned in the rakan guide as well with rakan gaining increasingly more significant ones but that doesn mean xayah actually needs rakan to be playable on the contrary xayah is a more than viable marksman champion even without rakan being her supportthat being said if you want to learn a powerful marksman champion that is often a goto pick even for professionals xayah should definitely be your first choice she not that difficult to play and if you keep track of all your feathers you have an impact on the game even as a complete beginner at this championafter using an ability xayah next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a featherxayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop feathers she can recallxayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a championxayah calls back all her dropped feathers dealing damage and rooting enemiesxayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throws out a fan of daggers dropping feathers she can recallhow to combo as xayahxayah has a couple of combos if you want to call them that but her kit is very situational the most basic combo is her root combo which we going to detail below apart from that we got some tips to help you better understand how xayah works in wild riftthis would be xayah main root combo if you manage to land all of her feathers behind the opponent you want to quickly cast skill as soon as you autoattacked the opponents to call back the feathers and root the target that positioned incorrectlyalthough it not the combo you use on her most of the time during the laning phase it definitely a powerful one in team fights when xayah casts her ultimate she will send out multiple feathers that she can call back towards her with skill if you catch a couple of enemies in between them they will get rooted and take damage from the feathers you want to cast your skill when trading with an opponentyou should not cast this before and without a reason because it won have such a great impact you will do a lot more damage if you are sure that you in range of the autoattacks because with the bonus movement speed you get you be able to chase them down when rakan is your support you both deal extra damagewell not quite it more like whenever you are laning with a rakan once you cast your skill missiles will fire from the both of you and the extra movement speed will also apply to rakan that works extremely well if rakan just used his ultimate and engaged upon an enemy you should always pay attention to how you position your feathersoftentimes enemies will lose focus during team fights and not pay attention to the feathers on the ground ending up between them and xayah that a great opportunity to root them and catch them by surprise resulting in an advantage for xayah and her team if you have additional feathers and cast your ultimate it basically death for the opponentsyou might have already noticed this but even in proplay many xayah players place several feathers before they cast their ultimate unless they cast the ult defensively the damage these feathers will do on the way forth and back will be quite crazyin what order to level up the skillsxayah should always have her skill maxed first then skill and finally then skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsheal restores health and grants bonus movement speed for second to you and the most wounded nearby ally champion healing is halved for champions recently affected by healif you would like to examine if xayah is currently meta check out our wild rift tier list
