header: LoL: Wild Rift Senna Guide: Best build, items, runes
content: in this league of legends wild rift senna guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in senna guide belowif you like scaling champions by all means make sure to play senna at least once her kit has been cleverly adapted to wild rift so it won take you minutes to reach the peak now when it comes to her autoattacks they take a while to charge she not like your typical marksman who can scale off well with attack speed instead she similar to jhin in a way except she gains range and damage quite a bit of itwhen units die near senna their souls are periodically trapped by the black mist senna can attack these souls to free them absorbing the mist that held them in death mist fuels her relic cannon power with increased attack damage attack range and critical strike chance attacks from senna relic cannon take longer to fire deals bonus damage and briefly grant her a portion of her target movement speedpiercing darknesss cast range matches sennas attack range and its cast time is improved with attack speed it can target anything and applies onhit effects to enemy championssenna sends forth a wave of black mist if it hits an enemy it latches onto them hungrily rooting them and everything nearby after a brief delaysenna draws the mist she has stored in her weapon into a storm around her embracing darkness and becoming a wraith within allies who enter the area are camouflaged and also appear as wraiths as the mist shrouds them wraiths gain increased movement speed are unselectable and hide their identitiessenna calls upon the relic stones of fallen sentinels splitting her relic cannon into a holy array of shadow and light she then fires a global beam that shields allies from harm while damaging enemies caught in the centrehow to combo as sennamost of senna skills are situational she will rely mainly on autoattacks and skill for damage and that about it here how you can be more effective using her skillsin what order to level up the skillsfor senna you want to max your skill first then continue by levelling skill and finally skill levelling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsigniteignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by rift senna the best itemsbootsboots of swiftness or ionian boots of lucidity will be your main base for the boots and for the enchant you want eitherquicksilver enchant to remove all crowd controls or stasisif you would like to examine if senna is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Leona Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift leona guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the leona guide belowleona arguably one of the most powerful supports in league of legends has finally arrived in wild rift i couldn be happier because she is definitely going to be one of the best picks for both beginner and experienced players alike especially more so for the experienced onesleona is not a difficult champion to learn but can take some time to master she is exceptional in most situations since she is a tank engage support her powerful kit has the ability to turn the tides of battle in her team favour and much more with leona in the team her skill point and click stun can pretty much deny any engage from the opponents as well so if you were looking for a champion to master who can be viable in of cases she is definitely the one for youdamaging spells afflict enemies with sunlight for seconds when allied champions deal damage to those targets they consume the sunlight to deal additional magic damageleona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the targetleona raises her shield to gain damage reduction armor and magic resist when the duration first ends if there are nearby enemies she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effectleona projects a solar image of her sword dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line when the image fades the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and leona will dash to themleona calls down a beam of solar energy dealing damage to enemies in an area enemies in the centre of the area are stunned while enemies on the outside are slowedthis is one of the most difficult leona combos but it also the one that basically leaves your opponents without any escape routes you want to activate your skill and skill before flashing in so when you land upon your enemy you won waste any time activating skills besides skill takes time to charge and have your point and click stun readythen you will release your combo with skill and ultimate and that should be enough to lock down on any champion you will go up againstthis combo works great if you can lock onto your target easily early on you can pull this combo from a bush from the fog of war where enemies have no vision of you you basically use your ultimate and skill to stick to your target and then finish off with skill to deem them unable to movethis is going to be the main combo you want to pull on leona you can do this as early as level because with her high basic defensive stats and a permanently cc opponent it can guarantee you an early game leadthis is the basic autoattack reset combo for leona you can do this as soon as an enemy places a ward because it will kill the ward without having to use the oracle lenswhat the best order to level up the skillson leona you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally your skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsexhaust exhausts the target enemy champion reducing their movement speed by and their damage dealt by for secondswhen it comes to runes leona can go for either aftershock or font of life they are both good so pick your favorite

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Yasuo Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: next up on the list of champions we cover is yasuo he one of two brothers whom i had the pleasure of playing against a million times and none of these times was particularly enjoyable of course playing yasuo is extremely fun because you can use his skills in a lot of ways both defensively and offensivelybut let talk about the actual champion for a second yasuo is a fighter with heavy assassin tendencies his skillset might seem quite easy to pull off at the start but in fact it not as easy as it seems you always need to think ahead see which champions and creeps you can dive to and if you have a way to get outhe can be played in the top lane baron lane or mid lane because he can heavily influence the map his wave clear is quite good especially after an item or two which will allow him to roam freely across the map there are so many other things about yasuo worth mentioning but i will start with the most important ones his skills and how to actually pull off a couple of basic combos i won write them all down because then i be writing a yasuo bookin this league of legends wild rift yasuo guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the yasuo guide belowyasuo critical strike chance is doubled additionally yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving the shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monsterthrusts forward damaging all enemies in a line on hit grants a stack of gathering storm for a few seconds at stacks steel tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks airborne steel tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same thingscreates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for secondsdashes through target enemy dealing magic damage each cast increases your next dash base damage up to a max amount cannot be recast on the same enemy for a few seconds if steel tempest is cast while dashing it will strike as a circleblinks to an airborne enemy champion dealing physical damage and holding all airborne enemies in the area in the air grants maximum flow but resets all stacks of gathering storm for a moderate time afterward yasuo critical strikes gain significant bonus armor penetrationhow to combo as yasuowe not played with yasuo enough to have fully figured out his best combos but there are plenty of places to find that out including this very informative video from assassin dave so if you want to fully grasp the power of the unforgiven make sure you check it outin what order to level up the skillsyasuo skill is one of his signature skills aka the tornado we all know and not love especially if it followed by last breath his skill is the one that allows him to dash to minions and players so these two should be your main focus with his ultimate whenever it possible to level it up wind wall is not a priority so you can keep just point in it adding more will only lower the cooldownlevel skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly skill best summoner spells for yasuoignite ignites target enemy champion dealing true damage based on level over seconds and inflicting them with grievous wounds grievous wounds reduces healing effects by teleport a short distance forward or towards the aimed directionhealrestores health and grants bonus movement speed for second to you and the most wounded nearby ally champion healing is halved for champions recently affected by healother good options to replace hunter vampirism are triumph weakness or brutal for more penetrationthis build works great on yasuo because it makes him less of a squishyfighter assassin and more like a steady damage killing machine three of these items give yasuo life steal which will make it extremely difficult for the enemy to burst him down even in extended team fights unless they have grievous woundsadditionally you could replace one of the items withstatikk shiv and another with guardian angel but believe me when i say this build is extremely strong and in situations he will be unkillable it more a matter of positioning and not taking unnecessary fightswith these items yasuo can split push and take objectives quite fast and is less likely to die to burst damage from lux annie or any other champion that has cc and burstbootsgluttonous teleportis one of the best boots you could get if you planning to win games through objectives at the moment not a lot of people are playing that because it fairly easy to get around the map however on yasuo it can work extremely well for split pushing and joining team fights getting away from difficult situations or drawing a couple of enemies towards you in a different lane yasuo could do very well in situation depending on the championsif you would like to check if yasuo is currently in meta take a look at our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Draven Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift draven guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the draven guide belowif you enjoy playing the marksman role then you definitely want to check out draven the glorious executioner he is one of the most interesting and unique champions in the rift when you play this champion you basically take the game one step further you not playing league of legends wild rift anymore but instead you playing league of draven wild rifthis axe mechanic can be challenging at start and maybe a little bit hard to get the hang of but once you do you will be rewarded with a very fun champion to play also he the kind of champion that you either love or hate because of his unique mechanics but anyway let dive right into his kitdraven gains his fans adoration when he catches a spinning axe or kills a minion monster or tower killing enemy champions grants draven bonus gold based on how much adoration he hasdraven next attack will deal bonus physical damage this axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air if draven catches it he automatically readies another spinning axe draven can have two spinning axes at oncedraven gains increased movement speed and attack speed the movement speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration catching a spinning axe will refresh the cooldown of blood rushdraven throws his axes dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside targets hit are sloweddraven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck whirling death slowly reverses direction and returns to draven after striking an enemy champion draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse directionhow to combo as dravenwelcome to the league of draven there a reason why he says that he has his own unique playstyle and in order to be effective as a draven player you need to follow it even though he has no specific combos there is one smallish combo if you could call it that which you can doonce you send your ultimate it will return to you after a while if you want to catch some enemies by surprise quickly reposition yourself by using flash most opponents don expect this also it quite difficult to pull of since you need to know the exact position of your enemies use the practice tool and spend some time just focusing on catching your axeshe can hold multiple axes but start with just one and progress once you feel comfortable to do so it is very important to learn how his mechanics work so you can reset your skill and that where all of draven damage comes from autoattacking and moving into a direction is what determines where the axe will land once you are level and you have learned your skill ultimate look around the map maybe you can surprise an enemy with your global ultimate use your skill to displace enemies that you are trying to catch or escape from during teamfights it ok to lose an axe if catching it puts you in dangerin what order to level up the skillson draven you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally your skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsheal restores health and grants bonus movement speed for second to you and the most wounded nearby ally champion healing is halved for champions recently affected by healif you want to you could replace manaflow band with pack hunterif you would like to examine if the darius is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Kai'Sa Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: so you want to play the marksman role but you find that super safe playstyle a little bit boring well how about a marksman that can dive the enemy backline still fire super longrange beams evolve her weapons and go invisibleif all the above sounds fun then chances are kai daughter of the void is just the right champion for youbut before you dive right in i need to tell you that in wild rift kai is much more than a marksmanassassin type of champion she actually more like a oneman machine gun that can really melt through any champion in the end game as long as she has a couple of kills and itemsin this league of legends wild rift kai guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the kai guide belowkai basic attacks stack plasma dealing increasing bonus magic damage allies immobilizing effects help stack plasma additionally kai item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful propertieskai shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets living weapon icathian rain is upgraded to shoot more missileskai shoots a long range missile revealing and marking enemies with her passive living weapon void seeker is upgraded to apply more plasma marks and reduce cooldown on champion hitkai briefly increases her movement speed then increases her attack speed living weapon supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant invisibilitykai dashes near an enemy champion marked by plasma and gains a temporary shieldwild rift kai how to comboshe doesn really have a standard skill rotation or combo and the most important aspect of her gameplay is to know your damageyou need to keep track of the marks spawned around your target every time you autoattack because that where most of her insane damage comes from on the attack these marks will detonate and deal damage based on the missing health of the enemy depending on the damage you do you will decide if you are going to engage or notother than keeping track of her damage output her kit is pretty straight forward reallyas an example you can use your skill from a really long distance on a squishy target then use skill to teleport behind them and give yourself a shield hit your basic attacks and your skill on the targets use skill to go invisible and try to either escape or reposition to continue the fight if the enemy not deadso what does that all mean the lower an enemy hp is the more damage kai will doin what order to level up the skillsfor kai you want to max out skill first since that the aoe damage then skill and lastly skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatewild rift kai the best summoner spellsheal restores health and grants bonus movement speed for second to you and the most wounded nearby ally champion healing is halved for champions recently affected by healif the enemy has some really powerful tanks you could replace guardian angel with mortal reminder for some armor penetrationiskai a highranking champion take a peek at our wild rift tier list to make sure you are playing a powerful meta champion

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Tristana Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift tristana guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the tristana guide belowtristana is a marksman that can quite literally explode the opponents she uses a cannon for a weapon places explosives and can jump into or out of a fight with her skill she might seem easy to play and to tell you the truth she is however if you really want to take advantage of her entire kit you will need to keep in mind all the aspects that make tristana well tristanashe got amazing carry potential when she is ahead since she is one of few marksmen that can obliterate the enemy team with just a couple of attacks and wellplaced skills all while being on the move the one downside about her though is that even if she very mobile she still a squishy marksman that can die very easily if the enemies burst her downnonetheless no matter if you new to the game or a veteran player rest assured tristana is a great pick for the marksman role and she is extremely fun to playincreases tristana attack range as she levelstristana fires her weapon rapidly increasing her attack speed for a short timetristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she landswhen tristana kills a unit her cannonballs burst into shrapnel dealing damage to surrounding enemies can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding unitstristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit this deals magic damage and knocks the target back if the target is carrying the explosive charge bomb the bomb detonation radius is doubledhow to combo as tristanatristana has a couple of combos that will help you detonate her skill much easier and when you pull them off chances are you surprise even yourself with the sheer amounts of damage that she does these are her general combosthis is one of the strongest allin combos that tristana has which you can pull off at level is the combo you can pull off at level which is basically the first time she can allin the enemy laner it a very powerful combo since her skill will detonate dealing a lot of damage that early on into the game she can probably oneshot anyone any marksmansupport if your opponents are under the tower you can use skill on the tower and then skill for faster attacks and once the bomb detonates it will do splash damage which could hit the opponents you can surprise the enemy laners by pathing back to lane through the jungle use your skill to position yourself behind them and then use your skill to push them underneath your own tower this is a fun thing that not many people expect and the best part the tower will do a lot of damage to themtristana can use her skill to cancel crowd control skills such as blitzcrank skill just time it right basically the second you about to be pulled remember that any kill resets her skill what order to level up the skillson tristana you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellshealrestores health and grants bonus movement speed for second to you and the most wounded nearby ally champion healing is halved for champions recently affected by healif you feel like you need a little bit more survivability you could get guardian angel instead of bloodthirsterconsult ourwild rift tier listif you want to check the heroes that are currently in meta

name: pocketgamer
header: How many levels does Homescapes have?
content: homescapes is one of the most popular styled game out there behind candy crush saga of course you are actually using these levels to clean up areas of your home garden and other ingame areas depending on what event is going on in homescape you might be wondering how many levels there are within the gameat the time of writing this article homescapes has levels each thursday or friday however another or so new levels are released you cannot currently replay levels in homescape unless they appear in the tournament of champions or as one shot levels within the game so once you get to the end of the rope you will need to wait until the next or so are releasedwhen levels do reappear as one shot levels they are often some of the early levels in the game that you may have forgotten about if you are a die hard homescape fan these hard levels between and have been added as one shot levels so far with more being added in the futureit is possible that levels are redesigned in the future as level and level have been completely remade and replaced for reasons not announced to the general public with new levels being added weekly you wont likely run out of homescape levels if you are just starting now i personally have been stuck on level for quite some time and had to actually take a break from the game so that homescape would gift me a welcome back bonus allowing me to use their powerups to actually complete the level without spending my own hardearned cash homescape is a pretty fun to play polished mobile game and you wont run out of content if you start it now

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Jinx Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: with this article we will begin our journey into the world of runeterra champions below i will explain the role and how to play each champion in league of legends wild rift starting with jinx she is the first champion i will cover since she is one of the most fun marksmen in the game to play and she also fairly easy to playas i mentioned jinx is a marksman adc which is played mostly in the bot lane her kit is easy to use since she relies of the time on her auto attacks thus being said she is a little bit manahungry if she is using her first skill switcheroo i am saying skill because it more like a togglethesecondaryweapon type of skill which still relies on her auto attacksin this league of legends wild rift jinx guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the jinx guide belowjinx receives massively increased movement speed and attack speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champion epic jungle monster or structurejinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between powpow her minigun and fishbones her rocket launcher attacks with powpow grant attack speed while attacks with fishbones deal area of effect damage gain increased range and drain manajinx uses zapper her shock pistol to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit slowing and revealing itjinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after seconds lighting enemies on fire flame chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them rooting them in placejinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels the rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing healthhow to combo as jinxjinx doesn exactly have a combo as many champions do but rather a skill order that will help you depending on the situation it is skill skill skill autoattack ultimatethat works especially well if the enemy is busy with the support or any other hero and you have time to place the chompers on their location if they immobilized it even better otherwise you could try to use zap to slow down an enemy then root them in place with the chompersanother thing you could do is try to make use of her passive as best as you can so if you get a kill or assist on an enemy player or destroy a tower use the passive to burst down another enemy and reactivate the passive as often as you can you can also use zap to slow down enemies and catch up with them once your passive has activatedeither way you should use the skills as you see fit best because there is no specific order for bigger damage output the best you could do is normal attack as much as you can until they deadin what order to level up the skillsfirstly you want to max out jinx skill switcheroo then skill zap and finally skill flame chompers of course every time you can level up the ultimate make sure you do solevel skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly skill best summoner spells for jinxheal restores health and grants bonus movement speed for second to you and the most wounded nearby ally champion healing is halved for champions recently affected by healoverall this is one of the best items builds for jinx that i played with and i believe it can work in about every situation items like bloodthirster gives you life steal which helps you heal rapid firecannon will increase the range of jinx attacks and infinity edge runaan hurricane are a great combo for her switcheroo now a couple of items could be swapped outfor instance you could switch statikk shiv for mortal reminder if the enemy team has some very beefy tanks as for the boots it all depends on whether or not the enemy team has a lot of engages or assassins additionally you could play with manamune charge it into muramana for some additional attack damage based on manabootsgluttonous stasis is the one you want in case the enemy has a lot of allins or assassins like zed or akali who can pretty much oneshot a squishy marksman like jinxif you would like to check if jinx is currently in meta take a look at our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Lulu Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift lulu guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the lulu guide belowlulu the fae sorceress is our next champion on our wild rift hero guide list she a powerful support champion and no matter what elo you are in she always a wise choice lulu is a funtoplay support because every time an opponent charges onto your lanerteam she can polymorph them making them unable to cast or do anythingas lulu you will have the ability to carry team fights by simply buffing your allies and making them a lot more powerful she not a very easytoplay champion but once you get a grasp of how she actually works i am sure she will be your goto pick in most gamespix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he following attacks another enemy unit these bolts are homing but can be intercepted by other unitspix and lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits an enemy can only be damaged by one boltif cast on an ally grants them attack speed and movement speed for a short time if cast on an enemy turns them into an adorable critter that can attack or cast spellsif cast on an ally commands pix to jump to an ally and shield them he then follows them and aids their attacks if cast on an enemy commands pix to jump to an enemy and damage them he then follows them and grants you vision of that enemylulu enlarges an ally knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health for the next few seconds that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemieshow to combo as luluthere are no specific combos that you need to pull off in order to make her viablesince she a support and every single skill depends on the situation however if you want to poke your opponents or slow them there are a few combos you could pull off based on pix and pix locationthis combo will send your skill straight on the opponent for additional damage and slow and you could also add an additional autoattack for some harassment during the laning phasewith this combo you will polymorph the enemies then deal more damage with skill followed up by an autoattack and skill for slowing themwhen you cast your skill on allies you can not only shield them but also send pix to their location which you can use then in combo with skill to slow them or deal damagei know i know this is a very difficult combo to pull off however this combo will take advantage of every single one of her kit abilities and perksbasically you will use your ranged abilities to crowdcontrol the opponent making them unable to do anything then you will follow up with flash to engage on them and quickly cast the ultimate on their location to knock them up lastly you will follow with more autoattacks and skill to deal additional damagein what order to level up the skillslulu skills are pretty straightforward as a support you almost never want to max out your skill first since that won add too much value instead you want to max out skill first then skill or skill depending on the situationlevel skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsexhaust exhausts the target enemy champion reducing their movement speed by and their damage dealt by for secondsadditionally you could replace zeke convergence with awakened soulstealer if you are ahead and want more ultimate cooldown but zeke is a generally good choicehow good lulu is in comparison with other champions consult ourwild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Sona Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift sona guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from her skills and how to allocate them to her build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in the sona guide belowsona is the next champion on our list and she is by far the one champion i most familiar with i personally been a sona main since season since i first started playing league and that naturally translated into wild rift as wellthe maven of the strings is an easytoplay easytosupport type of champion because she has absolutely no skillshots other than her ultimate ability she has amazing heals she can do plenty of damage and she is viable for both beginners and experienced players alike of course the builds may vary depending on the situation but for the sake of the true support role i build her as a full support enchanterafter spell casts sona next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what song sona last activatedsona plays the hymn of valor sends out bolts of sound dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies prioritizing champions and monsters sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemiessona plays the aria of perseverance sending out protective melodies healing sona and a nearby wounded ally sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shieldsona plays the song of celerity granting nearby allies bonus movement speed sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus movement speedsona plays her ultimate chord stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them each rank reduces the base cooldown of sona basic abilitieshow to combo as sona in wild riftsona doesn exactly have a set combo but rather an order of skills that you want to follow depending on what chord passive you want to proc it very easy to play as sona because you don need to target any skills basically you just need to learn the range of her skill to poke enemy champions and cast your skill and skill to buff alliesalso whenever you cast three different skills you will be able to cast one empowered autoattack that can have one of the following effects blue chord power chord staccato if this spell was last cast when power chord is ready power chord deals bonus damage green chord power chord diminuendo if this spell was last cast when power chord is ready power chord will also reduce the target damage output by per ability power for seconds purple chord power chord tempo if this spell was last cast when power chord is ready power chord will also slow the target by per ability power for secondsin short if you want to activate your blue chord fast skill skill skill skill skill or skill skill you want to activate your green chord fast skill skill skill skill skill after a couple of seconds of delay skill you want to activate your purple chord fast skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill skill rift sona guide in what order to level up the skillsfor sona you can either max out first skill or skill but never skill it all depends on whether you want slightly more damage and autoattack buffs or more healingshielding power i would recommend the followinglevel skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill and keep point into your skill ultimate whenever possiblethe best summoner spellsexhaustexhausts the target enemy champion reducing their movement speed by and their damage dealt by for secondsthe best itemsi personally strongly believe in the tank sona although it a pretty offmeta pick iceborn gauntlet has good synergy with her skill and empowered autoattack skill green chord because it provides a lot of support for the team in the form of slow and pseudoexhaustadditionally if the enemy has a lot of ap abyssal mask can be a great choice since otherwise sona would die oneshothere is where sona belongs on our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Master Yi Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: next up on the list of champions we cover is master yi the wuju bladesman this ionian blademaster is one of the most powerful lategame champions you can find in the rift in terms of difficulty of execution master yi kit is quite good for complete beginners because he has absolutely no skill shots abilities that require targeting and he will rely solely on his autoattackshe falls somewhere in between an assassin and a fighter being able to deal huge amounts of damage in little to no time he can avoid crowd controls if he times his skill right he can be quite tanky during meditate and will even regenerate some of his lost hpi would say that he one of the most forgiving junglers out there because you don actually need to worry too much about his early game and farming his kit is easy and i definitely recommend him for a complete beginnerin this league of legends wild rift master yi guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes this is what you will find in master yi guide belowevery few consecutive basic attacks master yi strikes twicemaster yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path while simultaneously becoming untargetable alpha strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters basic attacks reduce alpha strike cooldownmaster yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind restoring health and taking reduced damage for a short timegrants bonus true damage on basic attacksmaster yi moves with unparalleled agility temporarily increasing his movement and attack speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects while active champion kills or assists extend highlander duration passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assisthow to combo as master yithere is no particular skill combo for master yi since he mainly relies on the damage from his autoattacks however there is something you could do something like a combo that would greatly increase his damage outputautoattack skill autoattackthis is the goto combo that you will do most of the time as master yi because his wuju style not only grants bonus damage to his autoattacks but also resets the autoattack timer that means you don have to wait for the time it would normally take to attack againin what order to level up the skillssince master yi is heavily reliant on his autoattacks you want to focus on the skills that will help you the most from that perspective which means skill and skill will be the ones that you max first additionally whenever you can you want to add a point into his ultimatelevel skill skill skill skill skill skill skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly skill of course don forget about skill ultimate whenever it availablethe best summoner spells for master yismitedeal true damage to a large or epic monster or minion smiting monsters restores hp slaying large monsters upgrades smite to chilling smite or challenging smite which can target enemy champions the bonuses from hunting license and tooth and nail from smite that charge once every could replace pathfinder with mastermind if you trying to be a little bit more objectivefocusedthis would be a standard master yi build but since he works well with a lot of items you can pretty much build anything that will boost his attack speed and autoattacks as an alternative you could replace frozen mallet with guardian angel which will help keep you alive for longerbootsgluttonous quicksilver are the boots you want on him if the opponent has a lot of crowd control skills because outside of his alpha stance and meditate yi can be quite squishyif you would like to check if master yi is currently in meta take a look at our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: LoL: Wild Rift Braum Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift braum guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the braum guide belowbraum a manly man with the purest heart that could exist in the entire world of runeterra the heart of the freljord quite literally that his alias is the next champion we are going to cover this tanky support is ideal for mitigating skillshots for stunning enemies and for shielding the entire team from dangerbraum is an ideal wilf rift champion in most situations and he excels in team fights this powerful support can engage disengage and provide all the utility a team needs he has a very strong early game thanks to his passive so if you try to engage against him chances are you won come victorious together with a powerful marksman braum can wreak havoc during the laning phase making him a force to be reckoned withbraum basic attacks apply concussive blows once the first stack is applied ally basic attacks also stack concussive blows upon reaching stacks the target is stunned and takes magic damage for the next few seconds they cannot receive new stacks but take bonus magic damage from braum attacksbraum propels freezing ice from his shield slowing and dealing magic damage applies a stack of concussive blowsbraum leaps to a target allied champion or minion on arrival braum and the ally gain armor and magic resist for a few secondsbraum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed he negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this directionbraum slams the ground knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him a fissure is left along the line that slows enemieshow to combo as braumbraum has quite a few combos and they can be used both defensively and offensively depending on the situationthis is the easiest of combos since it takes the utmost advantage of braum passive by using your skill together with the autoattacks you basically ensure that the enemy is slowed down so they can escapethis is a fairly difficult combo to proc perfectly and you want to train it quite a bit before taking it into your ranked matches it basically relies on you casting your skill and the moment you cast it you quickly flash over towards the enemy and increase the range of your skill that doesn make much sense it because it somewhat of a hidden combo basically you can do this with akali and similar champions as well and it will start casting the skill from your final position thus increasing the range of the skill by the length of the flashthis is one of the normal engages you can expect from braum you will take enemies by surprise by knocking them up with your ultimate and then quickly follow up by skill because it will apply braum passive allowing allies to stun the enemies hit by the ultimatethis combo will take advantage of any enemy that is slightly out of position or trying to farm since you can dash to one of your melee minions and then quickly knock them up and cast skill to slow them and apply braum passivethis is a very difficult combo to pull off but is a very fun one especially once you master the champion basically you will use skill to an ally then skill and quickly flash to redirect the skill hitbox onto an enemy you can then follow up with your ultimate to knock the enemies up and slow them and when they try to attack you use your skill to mitigate incoming attacksin what order to level up the skillson braum you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally your skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsexhaust exhausts the target enemy champion reducing their movement speed by and their damage dealt by for secondsitemwise on braum you always want tanky items winter approach can be good for the additional shield but if the enemy has doesn have that much ad then you can look at apmitigating items such as adaptive helm or abyssal maskthe boots you will have on braum depend highly on the champions on the enemy team if there are a lot of ad champions you will go for ninja tabi otherwise mercury threads is a good choice as for the enchantment you want either locket or stoneplateif you would like to examine if braum is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

header: LoL: Wild Rift Rakan Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift rakan guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the rakan guide belowthe charmer better known as rakan in wild rift is our next champion receiving a guide this cool support unit is definitely a favourite among the pro players in league of legends and a solo queue favourite as well and what a better time to add the lover duo to wild rift than now around valentine dayrakan is an amazing engage support who provides shields and some heals to his allies but is mostly known for his flashy playstyle and his ability to turn any battle in his team favorthis champion kit is not too difficult but it also not that beginnerfriendly you need to know exactly when and how to combo your skills and recognise when is the best time to engage on the enemy players without losing your life but let be honest if you really want to play a goodlooking support with a generally great kit that will have an impact at any stage of the game then rakan is definitely the best choice you could go forrakan periodically gains a shieldflings a magical feather that deals magic damage striking a champion or epic monster enables rakan to heal his alliesdashes to a location knocking up nearby enemies on arrivalflies to an allied champion granting them a shield can be recast for free for a short durationgains movement speed charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touchedhow to combo as rakanthere are so many combos you could pull off as a rakan player it not even funny to start you can use your skills both offensively and defensively it all depends on the situation since rakan is extremely mobile and you can use that to your advantagethis is a really basic combo of his and you could consider this his main engage combo you will charm all enemies basically immobilizing them well not really more like trapping them and then you quickly follow up with his skill to knock them up that will allow your allies to deal plenty of damage and follow up with any crowd control they might haveduring team fights this combo is one of the deadliest ingame especially when paired with an orianna or a malphite who provide their own massive crowd controlthis would be rakan ambush combo that many new players will not expect it a really powerful one and you should take advantage of it every chance you get especially when your enemy flash is on cooldownyou can always surprise your enemies by casting flash before skill it will greatly increase the range you dash forward with skill by the distance of flash and you can catch up with enemies that are really far away like thisit also a great and unexpected combo to cast when you know you are expecting a gank from your jungler or mid lanerlike i mentioned before you can use rakan kit in a million different ways for example you can use the ultimate to start team fights because it will give your team the edge in most situationsif you see that an enemy jhin or miss fortune start casting their ultimate skill next to you for example you could ultimate them to instantly cancel theirs of course it all depends on your positioning and theirs so don go diving under enemy towers simply to cancel their ultslastly you can use the quickness to escape an enemy champion that chasing you and gaining speed rather quickly if you don have flash or would rather not burn it then using the ultimate for a boost of movement speed might be a wise choice though should be a last resort as you will be without it whilst it on cooldownas weird as it might seem your shield might not always be there for shielding purposes instead you can use it to dash to an ally who is in front and from there you can continue with your skill or skill skill comboalso during the laning phase don be afraid to use skill to dash to your laner if you are trying to dodge some incoming skills consider it a fauxflash probably not what your laner would like to see but hey even supports need some support sometimesalthough skill provides some healing it really not that great so don go ham on it expecting to get some crazy healing results because chances are you won see themwhat the best order to level up the skillson rakan you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally your skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsexhaust exhausts the target enemy champion reducing their movement speed by and their damage dealt by for seconds

header: LoL: Wild Rift Ezreal Champion Guide: Best build, items, and everything you need to know
content: in this league of legends wild rift ezreal guide you find everything you need to know about the champion from his skills and how to allocate them to his build skill combo and runes here is what you will find in the ezreal guide belowezreal is one of the few marksmen with a powerful kit that almost makes it more convenient to focus on a single target rather than on multiple enemies the prodigal explorer is the next champion on our list and if you played him before then you probably know how incredibly fun and exciting it is to play himezreal is one of the only two marksmen that can fully disengage a blitz pull because his skill basically gives him unlimited flashes but all that comes with a price ezreal has no crowd control skills at all not even a slow and all of his abilities are single target except for his ultimate which can hit multiple enemies if it targeted correctlyezreal gains increasing attack speed each time he successfully hits a spell stacking up to timesezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unitezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit if ezreal hits an enemy with the orb it detonates and deals additional damageezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit prioritizes enemies stuck with essence fluxezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through damage is reduced for minions and nonepic monstershow to combo as ezrealmost of ezreal combos rely on his autoattacks and skill to proc and deal increased damage also since you buy trinity force or iceborn gauntlet sheenbased items you want to proc that as often as possible here are a few combos you can use for increased damage or damage and repositioningthere are many other variations of these combos so make sure that you do your best and try to proc as many empowered autoattacks as you can for the utmost damagein what order to level up the skillson ezreal you want to max out your skill first then skill and finally your skill leveling skill until it maxed then focus on skill and lastly on skill course whenever you can you want to add point into your skill ultimatethe best summoner spellsheal restores health and grants bonus movement speed for second to you and the most wounded nearby ally champion healing is halved for champions recently affected by healmany runes can work on ezreal and that why kleptomancy is a great choice his autoattacks will proc kleptomancy very often giving ezreal various power spikes during the laning phase however for the late game you can also look at conqueror which could work better in certain situationsitemwise you should always try to get a sheenbased item trinity force iceborn gauntlet luden echo these items have a very good synergy with ezreal and take advantage of his passive and short skill cooldown alikeif you would like to examine if ezreal is currently in meta check out our wild rift tier list

name: pocketgamer
header: Answered: Can you link accounts in Rogue Company?
content: rogue company is a popular game that uniquely blends tactical shooting with a battle royale style approach and is played from a thirdperson perspective split into teams you can take part in various modes where your squad needs to complete certain goalsthere is a unique cast of characters you can choose from each with its own abilities for you to take advantage of from ronin the duelist to saint the support to anvil the defender and other characters in between and each one has their own special personality to bootrogue company is available on essentially every platform possible but you might be wondering if account linking is possible in the game the good news is that yes you certainly can link other accounts from other platforms we give you a quick stepbystep guide on just how to accomplish thatlog ingo to the linking websiteand when you do you see a screen showing different platforms this is where all of the linking magic happens a critical thing to keep in mind is that whichever platform you play rogue company on the most is the one you should log in with firstif you play the game equally on more than one platform then just think about which one you do play on the absolute most this primary account you log in with will be the one that stores all of your progress on for any others you link in futureadd extra accountsthis is where you can go and officially link your other accounts once you log in to your primary account for rogue company you can go and select the next one once you do this any rewards and new items that you earn from the main account will also be added to the others you includedjust make sure to log in to those additional platforms don worry you be redirected automatically and it will ask you to sign in if you haven already if you did then it should automatically add the accountverifying your main platformonce you connect the accounts you want you can then head back to the main page where you can see which platform is your primary for playing rogue company make sure that the one you wanted is listed as primary if it isn you can unlink it and link again as long as you already didn make too much progressif you accidentally switch your primary account then you can switch back to the original primary account without worry and you won lose anything overall linking is a simple process and is fun if you enjoy playing the game on different platforms seeing your rewards on other platforms is always neat happy hunting
